NK013(pa)015:0: ma n+da la bi d+h+ai b+ai shu d+d+ha r+aa m+aa
NK013(pa)015:1: le sh+r+ai gu h+ya ga r+b+ha sh+aa n+ta s+ya bi
NK013(pa)015:3: dpal gsang ba snying po zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga rnam dag gser phreng bzhugs so //
NK013(pa)015:4: dpal gsang ba snying po zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga rnam dag gser phreng zhes bya ba /
NK013(pa)015:5: dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
NK013(pa)015:6: gzung 'dzin dgra bcom snang ba stong pa zung 'jug chen po'i rgyal srid skyong //
NK013(pa)015:7: dpal ldan bde stong nyin byed zer gyis go 'phang pad dkar rab tu bzhad //
NK013(pa)015:8: dri med mkha' ltar dwangs pa'i lus can shes rab snying rje'i mtshar sdug mnga' /
NK013(pa)015:10: / rmad byung bla ma gsang ba'i bdag po snying dbus chu skyes mchog tu rol //
NK013(pa)015:11: zab yangs mdo sgyu sems kyi bang mdzod la //
NK013(pa)015:12: dbang sgyur grub pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi rje //
NK013(pa)015:13: ma nor rgyal ba'i lam bzang mtshon pa'i mig /
NK013(pa)015:14: sbyin mdzad kahthoga pa der bdag phyag 'tshal /
NK013(pa)015:15: gsang chen bla med rgya mtsho chen pa las //
NK013(pa)015:16: sgyu 'phrul snying po dgos 'byung nor bu'i dbyig /
NK013(pa)015:17: brten pa tsam gyis mchog thun char 'bebs pa //
NK013(pa)015:18: dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rnam par dbye //
NK013(pa)015:19: de'ang bcom ldan sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i lam mtha' dag rim pa dbang gis bgrod cing /
NK013(pa)015:20: de ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la ltos pas //
NK013(pa)015:21: de'i thog mar shes par bya ba bsdus pa'i don la //
NK013(pa)015:22: slob dpon dam pa rin po ches //
NK013(pa)015:23: gnas pa gzhi yi dkyil 'khor dang //
NK013(pa)015:24: rtogs pa mngon gyur de bzhin nyid /
NK013(pa)015:28: de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang //
NK013(pa)015:29: rags pa rtags kyis lhag pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:30: snang tshul gnyis ni gzugs brnyan te //
NK013(pa)015:31: mtshan mar byas pa rtags kyi lhag /
NK013(pa)015:32: rang byung byang sems ngo shes dang //
NK013(pa)015:33: rtsa sogs mtshan ma'i lus kyis lhag /
NK013(pa)015:34: tshogs pas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
NK013(pa)015:35: mdzad pa mthar phyin lhun grub bo //
NK013(pa)015:38: mdor sdus gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum //
NK013(pa)015:39: rang bzhin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
NK013(pa)015:40: dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ni //
NK013(pa)015:41: ma bcos snang bas bzhu ru bsdus //
NK013(pa)015:42: sogs gsungs pa ltar bsdu na gsum //
NK013(pa)015:43: shes par bya ba gzhi'i dkyil 'khor //
NK013(pa)015:45: shes pa mthar phyin pa 'bras bu'o //
NK013(pa)015:46: dang po la nang gses su /
NK013(pa)015:47: 'khor 'das thams cad snang dus nyid nas ngo bo dbyer med /
NK013(pa)015:49: mtshan nyid ma 'dres par mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs pas /
NK013(pa)015:50: sems kyi chos nyid bde gshegs snying po dkyil dang /
NK013(pa)015:51: brtag pa gnyis chos 'khor du gnas pa rang bzhin gzhi yi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK013(pa)015:52: sems phung khams skye mched bgas chag kyis bgos pa glo bur dri mas ma rtogs 'khrul dus kyang /
NK013(pa)015:53: don chos dbyings las ma g.yos pa ma rtogs dbyings gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor te /
NK013(pa)015:54: gzhi la rang bzhin ye gnas dang /
NK013(pa)015:56: gnyis pa la phyi nang gsang ba gnyis gnyis te /
NK013(pa)015:57: don dam chos nyid gzhi la bzhugs pa /
NK013(pa)015:58: rig pa dgag bsgrub las 'das pa'i rtsal gyis rang
NK013(pa)015:59: rnyed de goms pas ye shes lnga rdzogs pa chen
NK013(pa)015:60: po kun bzang khyab bdal gyi don mngon du byed
NK013(pa)015:61: pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK013(pa)015:62: dbyings las rags snang rtags kyi phyag rgyar bzhengs pa
NK013(pa)015:63: kun rdzob chos can zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas
NK013(pa)015:64: rig pa ltar smin pa lhag pa ting nge 'dzin
NK013(pa)015:65: gyi dkyil 'khor te de gnyis gsang ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:66: rtog tshogs zhe gnyis bsdu na phung po lngar 'dus shing /
NK013(pa)015:67: de'ang rnam shes phung po la 'dus pas /
NK013(pa)015:68: tshogs dgu ye shes chen por bla ma'i man ngag gis ngo sprad pa ltar mthong ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:69: lha rtog dbyer med du shes pas ma dag pa
NK013(pa)015:70: nyid dag pa dang mnyam pa'i don go ba mngon
NK013(pa)015:71: du gyur pa lta gdes byang chub sems kyi dkyil
NK013(pa)015:72: 'khor dang / 'khor lo drug srog shing gsum rtsa
NK013(pa)015:73: mdud yi ge'i tshogs bcas ldan pa'i rdo rje'i lus
NK013(pa)015:74: la rtsa lung khams ye shes bzhi ngo bo nyid
NK013(pa)015:75: kyis grub pa gnad du bsnun pas bde chen 'dren
NK013(pa)015:76: pa lhag pa byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te
NK013(pa)015:77: de nyid nang gi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK013(pa)015:78: de ltar snang ba thams cad rdo rje gsum du
NK013(pa)015:79: gnas pa de mtshon byed brda bris 'bur sogs bcos
NK013(pa)015:80: ma phyi rdul du chu tshon sogs kyi lhag pa
NK013(pa)015:84: sngags kyi yan lag lnga sogs tshangs bas /
NK013(pa)015:88: 'dus pa rdo rje tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor thams cad phyi nang sprad de /
NK013(pa)015:89: mchog gi tshogs bsgrub pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
NK013(pa)015:90: de ni de kho na'am thun mong gi dkyil 'khor
NK013(pa)015:91: te lam bgrod pa phyi dkyil las dang po pa
NK013(pa)015:92: dang / ye shes la cung zad dbang bas nang
NK013(pa)015:93: dkyil dang de kho na nyid dkyil sbyor lam pa'i
NK013(pa)015:94: dang / dang / gsang dkyil mthong lam yan chad
NK013(pa)015:95: kyi spyod yul yin pas de ltar lam la drug
NK013(pa)015:96: dang / dang / dang / gsum pa mthar phyin 'bras dus su /
NK013(pa)015:97: gzhi gnas lugs ma mthong ba 'khor ba /
NK013(pa)015:98: phyogs rer mthong ba lam pa /
NK013(pa)015:99: gsang sngags sbyang ba'i stobs kyi mthong goms mngon du
NK013(pa)015:100: gyur pa rang don du spangs rtogs mthar phyin de
NK013(pa)015:102: dbyings ye gnyis su med pa'i mkhyen pas yul bral
NK013(pa)015:103: sems can gyi khams la rtag pa rgyun du dmigs
NK013(pa)015:104: pa med pa'i thugs rje chen pos gzigs pa thugs
NK013(pa)015:106: de mtshon byed phyir gsal bzhin lag gi rnam pa can gyi lha skur ston pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:107: rtogs pa ye shes gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK013(pa)015:108: dag ma dag gi gdul bya la lugs 'byung ldog zhi khro rab 'byams sku gsum dang /
NK013(pa)015:110: mkhyen gnyis ye shes kyi thugs te 'dul ba gsum gyis gzhan don mdzad pa /
NK013(pa)015:112: 'bras bu la bzhi dang bcu gnyis su gnas pa gsum du 'dus so //
NK013(pa)015:115: kun rdzob gnyis su bsdu ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:117: de'ang dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid la ma 'dres yongs
NK013(pa)015:118: su rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig
NK013(pa)015:119: pu ste / dbye bsdu mang du snang ba'ang /
NK013(pa)015:120: rgyud don mtha' dag dkyil 'khor du gnas pas dkyil 'khor rgya che ba yin cing /
NK013(pa)015:121: 'dir de dag las lhag pa gzugs dkyil lam phyi dkyil drang don ni /
NK013(pa)015:124: yang gsal de kho na nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi gzhi dang mtshon byed /
NK013(pa)015:126: rim pa dbang gi lam gyis bgrod pa la /
NK013(pa)015:127: lo tog 'dod pas sa bon ltar med ka med du 'ong ba'i phyir de chad pa la /
NK013(pa)015:129: sa gzhi mnyam dang tshangs thig dang //
NK013(pa)015:130: tshon dang 'bri dang rnam pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:131: rab gnas sbyin bsreg dkyil 'khor du /
NK013(pa)015:133: / 'jug dang zhugs pa'i yon tan no //
NK013(pa)015:134: zhes don bcur gsung ba'i dang po la'ang /
NK013(pa)015:135: las kyi nyer bsdogs bya ba /
NK013(pa)015:138: dang po dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon slob ma'i mtshan nyid /
NK013(pa)015:142: thog mar rdo rje slob dpon bzang //
NK013(pa)015:143: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bdag /
NK013(pa)015:144: sangs rgyas theg pa kun ldan pas //
NK013(pa)015:145: snying rje cher ldan 'gro drug bzung //
NK013(pa)015:146: mngon par sgrol ba'i lam kun gyis //
NK013(pa)015:147: rgya ba chen po gzhan don spyad //
NK013(pa)015:148: thabs kyi theg pa kun ldan zhing //
NK013(pa)015:149: shes rab chen po'i bdag nyid can //
NK013(pa)015:150: blo gros dri ma med pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:151: mya ngan 'das lam mngon par sbyor //
NK013(pa)015:152: gsang ba'i rgyud rnams tshul shes shing //
NK013(pa)015:153: de dag don rnams bsgrub nas spyod //
NK013(pa)015:154: dkyil 'khor chen po'i lam la mkhas //
NK013(pa)015:155: de dag sngags pa'i gdams ngag dang //
NK013(pa)015:156: de nyid rdo rje slob dpon mchog /
NK013(pa)015:157: rab tu bzung bar 'dod pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:158: zhes sogs gsungs pa'i don lam rim ltar /
NK013(pa)015:159: gsang chen bla na med pa'i lta sgom spyod pa'i mdzod gsum ldan pa /
NK013(pa)015:160: phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dbang gi chu bo bzhi rdzogs pa /
NK013(pa)015:161: snying rjes slob ma mi gtong ba'i gnyer dang ldan pa /
NK013(pa)015:162: rgyud sde la mkhas shing don khrol ba /
NK013(pa)015:163: phrin las kyi chog 'grig la mkhas pa /
NK013(pa)015:164: bla ma brgyud pa'i man ngag nyams myong gi drod
NK013(pa)015:165: 'chang ba ste mtshan nyid brgyad ldan gyi slob dpon
NK013(pa)015:166: des / ston pa slob dpon mchod cing /
NK013(pa)015:167: dbang thob brtson 'grus dang dam tshig gis lta ba rtog pa'i shes rab dang /
NK013(pa)015:168: de bzhin nyid sogs ting nge 'dzin gsal ba /
NK013(pa)015:169: rtsa ba yan lag gi dam tshig ma nyams pa /
NK013(pa)015:170: sngags dang phyag rgya shes shing /
NK013(pa)015:171: yo byad dang ldan pa ste gsang sngags kyi sngags
NK013(pa)015:172: changs ba'i mtshan nyid brgyad ldan gyi slob ma brtags
NK013(pa)015:173: nas / snod dang ldan pa rin po che lta
NK013(pa)015:174: ba'i gang zag la brtse bas rjes su 'dzin pa
NK013(pa)015:175: nas / bya zhing / slob ma des kyang dge
NK013(pa)015:176: slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bla ma gong gi mtshan
NK013(pa)015:177: nyid dang ldan pa brten par bya ba mchog tu
NK013(pa)015:178: nas / bya zhing / gsungs so // gnyis pa
NK013(pa)015:179: mos slob tsam du slob ma la dbang bskur ba
NK013(pa)015:180: nas / bya zhing / gsungs so // dang /
NK013(pa)015:181: tshogs sgrub kyis lam nges rdzogs kyi tshul gnyis kyi
NK013(pa)015:182: phyi ma logs su shes par bya zhing /
NK013(pa)015:183: 'dir snga ma'i dbang du ni dang por slob dpon gyis bsnyen sogs dag par bya bar gsungs pas /
NK013(pa)015:184: phyi nang gsang gsum gyi bzlas pa rab rtags ma byung gi bar dang /
NK013(pa)015:185: 'bring zla ba drug la sogs pa dus dang /
NK013(pa)015:189: de las gzhan pa khri ru bzla /
NK013(pa)015:190: zhes gsungs pa ltar sngon du 'gro ba gzhir byas
NK013(pa)015:191: nas khyad par bsnyen pa kha gso ba la 'jug
NK013(pa)015:192: pa'o // gsum pa lam rim las /
NK013(pa)015:193: sde dpung chen pos mi tshugs shing //
NK013(pa)015:194: sa gzhi bar snang shis pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:195: lo rgyus rnam pa gnyis ka ldan //
NK013(pa)015:196: yid 'ong sa btsal rgyas par bya //
NK013(pa)015:197: zhes pa'i sa chog la las rim las /
NK013(pa)015:198: gzhi dang rang mtshan slong dbang dang //
NK013(pa)015:199: sbyangs byin bsrung dang bzung ba ni //
NK013(pa)015:200: dang po'i nying la gnyid du bshad //
NK013(pa)015:203: gnam sa bar snang brtag pa gsum gsungs pas gnam 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dra ba /
NK013(pa)015:205: logs bkra shis rtags brgyad tshangs pa /
NK013(pa)015:206: bar snang 'o kha'i chu ltar dwangs ba /
NK013(pa)015:211: shar lhor slob dpon tshe la gnod pa'i brag ri
NK013(pa)015:212: rdo zang nge ba gshin rje gdug pa'i mdung rtse
NK013(pa)015:213: dang / lho nub mtshams bye ma shal le ba
NK013(pa)015:214: srin mo ngus pa'i mchi rjes 'khor mi dge bar
NK013(pa)015:215: dang / 'byung ba dang / nub byang na grog
NK013(pa)015:216: po'i yul ris gnod sbyin gyi sbar rjes lta bu
NK013(pa)015:218: byang shar mdud drung shul lta bu ni mar mo'i
NK013(pa)015:219: spar rjes te slob ma la gnod pa'i sa dgra
NK013(pa)015:221: shar stag skya bo dza lam dang /
NK013(pa)015:223: nub na bya dmar po ste brag mtho ba /
NK013(pa)015:224: byang na rus sbal nag po ste shing skam mchu mig yod pa /
NK013(pa)015:227: chu bo dbang phyogs nas 'bab pa /
NK013(pa)015:229: bya skad snyan pa sogs te /
NK013(pa)015:231: zur brgyad la sogs rtse mang dang //
NK013(pa)015:232: chu bo bzhin du ma bo zhing //
NK013(pa)015:233: mnyam zhing 'o kha'i chu ltar dang //
NK013(pa)015:234: nyi ma shin tu gnas pa ni //
NK013(pa)015:235: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid shes par bya //
NK013(pa)015:236: mtho dang 'dud pa nub byang yin //
NK013(pa)015:237: shar lhor gzhol zhing 'jam pa la //
NK013(pa)015:238: tho sgro grog tho chu sna tshogs //
NK013(pa)015:239: dkyil 'khor dbang sgra mtshams rtags bya //
NK013(pa)015:240: lhun sdug ri bo nags tshal ldan //
NK013(pa)015:241: rab tu mnyam zhing snum bag ldan //
NK013(pa)015:242: chu bo dbang gi phyogs yin te //
NK013(pa)015:243: cung zad tsam gyis rlung nyung zhing //
NK013(pa)015:244: me tog shing tshal bya skad brtags //
NK013(pa)015:245: lo rgyas shis pa'ang mchog tu gsungs //
NK013(pa)015:248: sa gzhi phyogs mtshams steng 'og dag /
NK013(pa)015:249: brdal zhing spungs dang bskor ba dang //
NK013(pa)015:250: rab tu brtsegs pa'i ljongs dang bcas //
NK013(pa)015:251: g.yas su 'khyil zhing bgyed pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:253: bar chad gnod byed mi gnas pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:254: sngon byung grub pa'i bkra shis mchog /
NK013(pa)015:255: yang dag rtog ste shis pa'i gar //
NK013(pa)015:256: zhes brtag par bya ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:258: grong khyer yul 'khor bzang po dang //
NK013(pa)015:259: skyed tshal ba glang slas dang dang //
NK013(pa)015:260: ri bo nags tshal spang gshong nyid //
NK013(pa)015:261: rgya mtsho'i ngos dang lung pa'i phug /
NK013(pa)015:262: sbyor ba'i bkod pa'i gnas rnams su //
NK013(pa)015:263: dkyil 'khor bzang po brtsams pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:264: phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas 'jug bya //
NK013(pa)015:265: gsungs pas bkra shis pa dang ldan pa btsal bar bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:266: gnyis pas rang gi mtshan nyid la /
NK013(pa)015:268: thang ka sog le lta bu dang //
NK013(pa)015:269: rma dang pho ba'i mtshan nyid dang //
NK013(pa)015:270: tsh+wa rko zug sngo rus sbal dang //
NK013(pa)015:271: ram pa thal ba shing sol dang //
NK013(pa)015:272: gyo mog rus pa gsong la sogs //
NK013(pa)015:273: nya gro d+ha dang p+aa la sha /
NK013(pa)015:275: ardzu na la sogs pa'i tshul /
NK013(pa)015:277: / 'dod pa ma yi spyad spong bya //
NK013(pa)015:278: bkra shis gtsang ma me tog shing //
NK013(pa)015:279: gzhan dang kha dog ldan pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:280: rtsib ma rgyus pa rab nyung zhing //
NK013(pa)015:281: lhag par gyur pa mchog tu bshad //
NK013(pa)015:282: ces pa'i spang blang ma nor ba bya ste /
NK013(pa)015:285: rtsi shing mi skye ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:291: rus pa srog chags med pa /
NK013(pa)015:292: gyong ba gas grum ma song ba'i gzhi legs par bkra shis pa'i rtsa dang me tog yod pa /
NK013(pa)015:293: kha dog bzang zhing snum bag che ba /
NK013(pa)015:294: brkos pa'i khung bus des bkang ba ni lhag par 'gyur ba'o //
NK013(pa)015:295: gsum pas bslang ba la snang ba la bslang ba dang mi snang ba las so //
NK013(pa)015:296: dang pa rang la dbang ba btsal mi dgos shing /
NK013(pa)015:298: dge 'dun sde bo che'i mnga' ris yin na /
NK013(pa)015:301: rin mjal ba gang rung gis bdag dbang bar chad med par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:302: gnyis pa las lha las slong ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:303: zhing skyong las slong ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:304: bde bar gshegs pa la slong ba'o //
NK013(pa)015:306: sa lha'i man+dala ba byung byugs //
NK013(pa)015:307: bzang po'i dris brlan ga bur dang //
NK013(pa)015:308: tsan+dana thig ler tshom bu bkod //
NK013(pa)015:309: steng du many+dza'i la gnas pa //
NK013(pa)015:310: sa bdag gtso 'khor dkar zlum ni //
NK013(pa)015:311: pad 'dab bzhi pa mdzes par bkod //
NK013(pa)015:312: shar du zhabs bsil mchod yon snod //
NK013(pa)015:313: shar lhor mtshams 'dzin lho nub spos //
NK013(pa)015:314: nub tu mar me nub byang dri //
NK013(pa)015:315: byang du zhal zas byang shar ni //
NK013(pa)015:316: me tog dag gi phung po'o //
NK013(pa)015:317: rin chen gser skyems zung bshams nas /
NK013(pa)015:319: / 'dus pa yod na gsol gdab dang //
NK013(pa)015:320: bdag gi rnal 'byor bzlas pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:322: / 'od gsal ngang du bsdus nas slar //
NK013(pa)015:325: rang nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:326: las rim las mi 'chi tha bar sbyor bskyed par gsungs kyang /
NK013(pa)015:327: slob dpon pad+ma'i man ngag la rdor sems kyis mdzad gsungs /
NK013(pa)015:330: zag pa med pa'i 'dod yon gyi mchod sprin nam mkha' gang bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:332: stong pa'i ngang las pad zla la l+aam ser po
NK013(pa)015:333: las byung ba'i sa yi lha mo gser mdog can
NK013(pa)015:335: dar dang rin po ches brgyan cing /
NK013(pa)015:336: g.yas gser gyi bum pa rin po ches gang ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:337: g.yon mchog sbyin gyi rgyas dpang por khas len pa'i phyag rgya can /
NK013(pa)015:338: lha mo sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rang bzhin phag gi
NK013(pa)015:339: khri la rol cing 'jam tshon sna lnga'i 'od zer
NK013(pa)015:340: 'phro bar gyur / ma h+aa sh+au ny+aa ta sogs rnam snang bdag po'i rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan dang /
NK013(pa)015:341: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya sogs lngas byin rlabs /
NK013(pa)015:342: h'u gi 'od kyis bskul bas sa 'og nas sa yi lha mo 'khor bcas spyan drangs /
NK013(pa)015:343: badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dza zhes snyan bsnan la /
NK013(pa)015:344: don dam gser gyi sa la mnga' mdzad pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:345: rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang yid 'ong gdal //
NK013(pa)015:346: nyi zla skar ma dag gis rab brgyan te //
NK013(pa)015:347: yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dbus na bzhugs //
NK013(pa)015:348: me tog dbus kyi sa la mnga' mdzad de //
NK013(pa)015:349: dbus kyi sa bdag lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
NK013(pa)015:350: sku mdog gtso ma rin chen gser gyi mdog /
NK013(pa)015:351: phyag g.yas rin chen gser gyi bum pa bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:352: phyag g.yon mchod sbyin phyag rgya ston mdzad pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:353: dbus kyi lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
NK013(pa)015:354: bdud rtsi mchod sbyin mgron du spyan 'dren na //
NK013(pa)015:355: byams thugs brtse phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK013(pa)015:356: e h+ya hi ba sud+ha r+ai ma h+aa ka ru
NK013(pa)015:357: ni ka dri sh+ya hoh sa ma ya hoh sa
NK013(pa)015:358: ma s+t+wam / dzahmh'u bam hoh gnyis su med par thim /
NK013(pa)015:359: pri thi wi de w+ai sa pa ri w+aa re b+h+yah argam /
NK013(pa)015:361: badz+ra push+pe pra tits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:365: +aa ka ro sogs btags pa lan gsum gyis gtor ma 'bul /
NK013(pa)015:366: lha mo chen mo sa 'dzin 'jig rten skyong //
NK013(pa)015:367: gser mdog phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams /
NK013(pa)015:369: / 'ja' tshon 'od ldan phag gi khri la bzhugs //
NK013(pa)015:370: de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul //
NK013(pa)015:371: rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar dam bcas nas //
NK013(pa)015:372: rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung rgyal ba byang chub kyi //
NK013(pa)015:373: shing gi drung bzhugs bdud sde las rgyal ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:374: dbang por mdzad pa'i lha mo khyed la bstod //
NK013(pa)015:376: ma lus sa 'dir dbang byed pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:377: bdag po khyed kyis dpang mdzod cig /
NK013(pa)015:378: ma lus mchod dang gtor ma'i rdzas //
NK013(pa)015:379: bdag gis phul ba 'di bzhes la //
NK013(pa)015:380: sngon gyi bde gshegs bka' bzhin du //
NK013(pa)015:381: da lta byin rlabs lhag pa'i gnas //
NK013(pa)015:382: dus gsum kun tu bsten pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:383: sa gzhi bzang po shes pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:384: dngos grub thams cad nye bar mdzod //
NK013(pa)015:385: lha mo khyod ni blo dang ldan //
NK013(pa)015:386: gser mdog bum pa'i mtshan mas mdzes /
NK013(pa)015:388: / 'og gi bgegs tshogs mnga' mdzad cing //
NK013(pa)015:389: gnas rnams bskyod pa'i blo ldan yang //
NK013(pa)015:390: dus tshod 'di nas dpang por mdzod //
NK013(pa)015:393: 'dod pa'i las rtsol ba la dgyes pa'i mdangs phyung ste 'khod par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:395: sgrub thabs las 'byung ba'i dkar gtor bsang sbyang nas /
NK013(pa)015:397: gang dag 'dir gnas lha dang klu //
NK013(pa)015:398: gnod sbyin srin po'am gzhan dag la //
NK013(pa)015:400: bdag zhugs khyed kyis stsal du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:401: ces dang gser skyems kyang phul la /
NK013(pa)015:402: ya ti gats+tsha sa rang gnas su btang ste mchod gtor gshegs /
NK013(pa)015:403: lag g.yas mchog sbyin gyi rgya bstan te /
NK013(pa)015:404: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK013(pa)015:405: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
NK013(pa)015:406: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
NK013(pa)015:407: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
NK013(pa)015:408: sa yi phyogs 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul
NK013(pa)015:409: d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa la dbang por mdzad
NK013(pa)015:410: du gsol / lag khu tshur gyen bstan mathe'u chung sprel /
NK013(pa)015:413: lha mo nam mkha' la bzhugs par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:415: rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas bde bar gshegs pa nam mkha' gang bar spyan drangs /
NK013(pa)015:416: badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dzah h'u h+aum h+aum h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:417: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gi lus la thim ste lus 'od kyi gor bur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:419: skad cig gis stong pa'i ngang las /
NK013(pa)015:420: rang nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang rdo
NK013(pa)015:421: rje sku mdog sngo nag g.yas rdo rje g.yon dril
NK013(pa)015:424: zhes pa'i bar sgrub thabs nas 'byung ba ltar brjod /
NK013(pa)015:425: de yi spyan nyi zla dang /
NK013(pa)015:427: rkang mthil la rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi 'bar ba'i h'u res mtshan par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:429: stobs chen lha dang klur bcas pa //
NK013(pa)015:430: gnod sbyin srin po bgegs kyi tshogs //
NK013(pa)015:432: lha srin lto 'phye nam mkha' lding //
NK013(pa)015:433: dri za gru bum gsang ba po //
NK013(pa)015:434: ma lus bgegs kyi tshogs bcas rnams //
NK013(pa)015:435: rdo rje 'chol ba'i mtshon cha yis //
NK013(pa)015:436: bshig cing dpral gtub brlag byed pas //
NK013(pa)015:437: gnas 'dir phyogs su gnas ma byed //
NK013(pa)015:438: na mo dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)015:439: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:440: rje btsun rtsa brgyud kyi bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bden pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:441: don dam rnam par dag pa'i kun rdzob bslu ba med pa'i bden pa chen po'i nus mthus /
NK013(pa)015:443: sems can thams cad rdo rje 'chang chen po thob pa'i ched du /
NK013(pa)015:444: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba
NK013(pa)015:445: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su
NK013(pa)015:461: g.yogs dang 'khor du bcas pa thams cad /
NK013(pa)015:462: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin gzhan du dengs shig /
NK013(pa)015:463: bka' las 'da' bar byed pa thams cad gnyis su
NK013(pa)015:464: med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhe sdang rdo
NK013(pa)015:465: rje'i phyag na bsnams pa'i rdo rje me rab tu
NK013(pa)015:466: 'bar ba 'di'i sprul pa'i sprin gyis mgo bo tshal
NK013(pa)015:468: yungs dkar h'u dang khro bo dang /
NK013(pa)015:472: dril bu drag tu 'khrol zhing h'u gi glu dang /
NK013(pa)015:473: rdo rje snyams pas gsor ba'i 'gying bag dang bcas
NK013(pa)015:474: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' nas rdo rje'i 'gros kyis g.yas
NK013(pa)015:477: dz+wa la badz+ra h+aum sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:480: khro bo thams cad slar 'dus nas srung ba'i gur
NK013(pa)015:481: khang sna tshogs rdo rje rab tu 'bar bas phyogs
NK013(pa)015:484: lag pa g.yas pa'i mathe'u chung mnan pa tri shu la'i rgyas /
NK013(pa)015:485: ji ltar che mchog rdo rje yis //
NK013(pa)015:486: dpung bzhi bdud kyi sde bdul nas //
NK013(pa)015:487: rgyal srid chos kyis dpang btsugs pas //
NK013(pa)015:488: de bzhin du ni bdag gis kyang //
NK013(pa)015:489: nges par bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri //
NK013(pa)015:490: sa ya dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:491: rat+na p+aa sham sid+d+hi ku ru sa ma ya stam /
NK013(pa)015:493: lha mo rang bzhin gnyis med phyir /
NK013(pa)015:496: thams cad rin chen ngo bo ste //
NK013(pa)015:497: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin du //
NK013(pa)015:498: brtan byas dngos grub mchog tu gyur //
NK013(pa)015:499: rig pa 'dzin pa khyed dkyil 'khor las ci bde bar byos shig /
NK013(pa)015:502: rol mo dang bcas mchod pa gshegs /
NK013(pa)015:504: dbus der sngar bzhin mchod pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:505: gtor ma rgyan ldan legs par bshams /
NK013(pa)015:506: sa slong 'di dbus lugs pa gong du mdzad kyang /
NK013(pa)015:507: bshad rgyud dang khams lugs pa'i man ngag gi lugs la la 'dir mdzad gsungs /
NK013(pa)015:508: nam mkha' gang ba'i bde bar gshegs pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:509: mdun gyis gzhir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor rten dang brten par bcas pa gsal bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:510: thos bsam mchod yon sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:511: na ma sarba sogs argam nas shap+ta'i bar dang /
NK013(pa)015:518: rol mo bcas sgrub thabs nas 'byung bas mchod /
NK013(pa)015:519: +aahmh'u sarba ban+dza sa nang mchod phul /
NK013(pa)015:521: rdo rje gsor dril bu 'khrol ba dang bcas /
NK013(pa)015:522: gtor ma'i rtser spos phul la /
NK013(pa)015:523: lce h'u las skyes pa'i rdo rjer gyur //
NK013(pa)015:524: phyogs rnams kun bzhugs sangs rgyas dang /
NK013(pa)015:525: sras dang dkyil 'khor dgongs su gsol /
NK013(pa)015:528: dngos grub dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhi //
NK013(pa)015:529: sa 'di bdag la stsal du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:530: thugs rje nyi mas khyad mdzad pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:531: rgyal ba rnams ni mngon bzhugs te //
NK013(pa)015:532: ma lus 'gro rnams thams cad dang //
NK013(pa)015:533: khyad par bdag gis slob ma la //
NK013(pa)015:534: byin rlabs lhag par gnas pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:536: thams cad mkhyen pa lha yi mchog /
NK013(pa)015:537: yang dag bstod cing 'dud pa'i gnas //
NK013(pa)015:538: dkyil 'khor bzang po'i gnas rdzogs par //
NK013(pa)015:539: byin rlabs dbang bskur kun stsol cig /
NK013(pa)015:540: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu //
NK013(pa)015:541: bdag cag bsam pa brtan bskyed pas //
NK013(pa)015:542: phyogs rnams kun nas dgongs mdzad de //
NK013(pa)015:543: lam mchog dpal ldan bla na med //
NK013(pa)015:544: dus gsum kun tu basngagasa pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:545: bya ba chen po yongs rdzogs mdzod //
NK013(pa)015:546: lan gsum gyis gsol ba btab pas /
NK013(pa)015:547: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ka dang /
NK013(pa)015:548: dkyil 'khor gyi thugs ka nas 'od kyis sa la phog pas sa de bkra shis par bsam la //
NK013(pa)015:549: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
NK013(pa)015:550: sogs sho lo ka gsum dang rten snying brjod /
NK013(pa)015:553: h'u be g+aa kra ma yam /
NK013(pa)015:554: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la gshegs par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:556: bzhi pa dbang du bya ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:557: zangs sam tsan+dana sogs dmar po'i shing phur bu rtse
NK013(pa)015:558: zla gam byas pa gdan bcas mdun du bkod de
NK013(pa)015:560: stong pa'i ngang las h+aum las byung ba'i dbang mchog
NK013(pa)015:561: khro bo pad+ma r+aa ga'i mdog dang 'dra ba zhal
NK013(pa)015:563: dang po gnyis pad+ma dang zhags pa /
NK013(pa)015:564: 'og ma gnyis phur bu sgril ba /
NK013(pa)015:565: smad phur bu zla gam 'bar bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:569: k+aa ya badz+ra sogs sku gsung thugs byin rlabs /
NK013(pa)015:570: pad+ma k+ai li k+ai la ya wa sham sa ma ye h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:571: wa sham ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:572: zhes dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btabs pa /
NK013(pa)015:573: phur bu las byung ba'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor gyis thams cad bdag gi dbang du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:576: sbyang ba las me sngags phyag rgya /
NK013(pa)015:577: ting nge 'dzin gyis dag par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:578: zhes pas bzhi yis dang po las dang /
NK013(pa)015:579: bya ba bas sbyangs pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:580: drang srong gnas dang ba glang lhas //
NK013(pa)015:581: phug dang ri yi rtse mo dang //
NK013(pa)015:582: sa gzhi gang na 'thas pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:583: khang stong dang ni rdo leb dang //
NK013(pa)015:584: mchod rten drung dang 'bab chu'i gling //
NK013(pa)015:585: mtsho 'gram ma gtogs gzhan dag tu /
NK013(pa)015:587: / 'jig rten sa la dbang byed pa //
NK013(pa)015:588: sa bdag lto 'phye brtag par bya //
NK013(pa)015:589: ma nor mtshams su zur bstan pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:590: gru bzhir bcad la phyogs bzhi gang //
NK013(pa)015:591: cha bcu re dbye cha chen yin //
NK013(pa)015:592: re re cha phran dgu rer dbye //
NK013(pa)015:593: phyogs rer dgu bcu dgu bcur 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:594: khyim zla gsum re'i zhag dang mnyam //
NK013(pa)015:595: mtha' bskor re'u mig bsdoms pa ni //
NK013(pa)015:596: khyim zhag gsum brgya drug cur mtshungs //
NK013(pa)015:597: khrum nya ston rar brtsis pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:598: bu mo'i khyim zla nas brtsams te //
NK013(pa)015:599: ston gsum mgo shar dgu gsum lho //
NK013(pa)015:600: dpyid gsum nub la dbyar gsum byang //
NK013(pa)015:601: gzhog g.yon 'og bcug g.yas bskor gyis //
NK013(pa)015:602: zhag rer re'u mig re re 'pho //
NK013(pa)015:603: lto ba'i thad nas brko bar bshad //
NK013(pa)015:604: de phyir brko sa glo bur du //
NK013(pa)015:605: brtag pa'i thabs ni tshangs zur btab //
NK013(pa)015:606: de steng mgo bo gang gnas pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:607: zla zhag btsal la de'i thad drang //
NK013(pa)015:608: phyogs gzhan thig btab tshangs thig ste //
NK013(pa)015:609: de dkyil gyis ni gdengs ka'i bar //
NK013(pa)015:610: cha mnyam lnga ru bgo byas la //
NK013(pa)015:611: de yi cha gcig gis tshad pas //
NK013(pa)015:612: gdengs ka'i rtse nas mar gsum dang //
NK013(pa)015:613: tshangs thig mdun du phyed dang gnyis //
NK013(pa)015:614: dor ba'i yas mar cha gcig dang //
NK013(pa)015:615: phrad la cho phyed gnas pa de //
NK013(pa)015:616: lto ba'i thad yin brko ba'i sa'o //
NK013(pa)015:617: khyim gyi zla zhag tshol lugs kyang //
NK013(pa)015:618: gang brtsi'i nyi skar mkha' ros bsgyur //
NK013(pa)015:619: chu tshod bcug la mda' yon zlas //
NK013(pa)015:620: thob pa lug khyim nas brtsams te //
NK013(pa)015:621: khyim zla 'das pa'i grangs yin la //
NK013(pa)015:622: lhag ma mkha' mes bsgyur ba la //
NK013(pa)015:623: chu srang mig gis bgos thob gzhug /
NK013(pa)015:624: mda' yon zlas phog brtsi bzhin pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:625: zhag 'di dang bcas da ltar ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:627: lug glang 'khrig kar seng bu mo //
NK013(pa)015:628: srang sdig gzhu chu bum nya rnams //
NK013(pa)015:629: dpyid 'bring nag zla nas bzung ste //
NK013(pa)015:630: lto 'byor khyim zla bcu gnyis ming //
NK013(pa)015:631: de la lto 'phye ro stong mi //
NK013(pa)015:632: gdengs ka dang ldan ro smad sbrul //
NK013(pa)015:633: lag g.yon rna ba g.yon la bkab //
NK013(pa)015:634: g.yas pa rin chen thogs nas su //
NK013(pa)015:635: dkur bstan ro smad lto phye'i gzugs //
NK013(pa)015:636: de yang ngo bo mtha' yas dkar //
NK013(pa)015:637: mjug rtser rigs ldan sngon po dang //
NK013(pa)015:638: gsang bar stobs rgyu du ba'i mdog /
NK013(pa)015:639: lte bar dung skyong dkar po dang //
NK013(pa)015:640: dpung pa pad chen gser gyi mdog /
NK013(pa)015:641: nor rgyas snying gar ljang khu dang /
NK013(pa)015:643: / 'jog po dmar po mgrin pa la //
NK013(pa)015:644: rna bar pad+ma dkar po mdzes //
NK013(pa)015:645: spyi ru mtha' yas sngon po gnas //
NK013(pa)015:646: bgegs mthar byed pa mig tu bsgom //
NK013(pa)015:647: sa mkhan sngags pa rang nyid kyang //
NK013(pa)015:648: bgegs mthar byed dang tog tse ni //
NK013(pa)015:649: gser rdor rtse lnga lag g.yas steng //
NK013(pa)015:650: g.yon 'og gis bzung shar ltas nas //
NK013(pa)015:651: dbus shar lho nub byang rnams nas //
NK013(pa)015:652: kham lnga brkos pa dngos grub sa //
NK013(pa)015:653: snod btsal sa gzhan bsre byas la //
NK013(pa)015:654: rnam 'joms gzung chu bsil gtor chus //
NK013(pa)015:655: sa kun khyab par bzhi sde yi //
NK013(pa)015:657: brkos pa'i mtshan la brtag pa la sas brtag pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:658: khru gang ngam pus nub tsam brkos pas sa yi ro lnga bsal te /
NK013(pa)015:659: sems can gyi ro rus pa /
NK013(pa)015:664: sa'i phud kyis bde bar gshegs pa mchod /
NK013(pa)015:665: sa de nyid kyis bkang bas mtho na bzang /
NK013(pa)015:669: dong de khru gang tsam brus pa 'thas par bcag la chus bkang ste /
NK013(pa)015:670: yi ge brgya pa bzla bzhin shar phyogs su goms pa drang po lnga bcu rtsa bzhir phyin /
NK013(pa)015:672: chu 'gram du phyin tsa na gang na rab /
NK013(pa)015:676: ldog na ngan pas sbyang ba dgos so //
NK013(pa)015:677: der bum pa'i nang du rten snying dang /
NK013(pa)015:678: srog shing la tram yig dang 'bru gsum bris pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i rdzas sum cu dang /
NK013(pa)015:679: 'bru sna tshogs pas gang ba bsangs sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:680: stong pa'i ngang las a las zla ba'i steng du
NK013(pa)015:681: tram las bum pa rin po che'i mchod sdong dgos
NK013(pa)015:682: 'dod thams cad lhun gyis grub par 'byung ba'i gter
NK013(pa)015:683: chen por gyur / de nyid nang du sbas nas
NK013(pa)015:684: bkra shis pa grub pa'i gnas chen gyis sna bzang
NK013(pa)015:685: po la spos chus btab pa 'thas pa bcags pa'i
NK013(pa)015:686: stegs bu dpangs su khru gang dang /
NK013(pa)015:687: rgyar khru gang sogs ci 'dod brtsigs pa'i ngos dang /
NK013(pa)015:690: ba byung lnga dang bcas pa'i gom ye ste skyang nul gyis khyab par byugs shing mnyam par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:691: de la ba byung lnga ni /
NK013(pa)015:692: dmar thal ba yi mgrin pa na //
NK013(pa)015:693: dag byed rdzas yod nus pa des //
NK013(pa)015:694: gtsang ba'i las kun mchog tu gsungs //
NK013(pa)015:695: sa gtsang rtsa zos ba mchog gi //
NK013(pa)015:696: gci ba sa la ma lhung dang //
NK013(pa)015:697: gcin nyid sa la ma lhung ba //
NK013(pa)015:699: dang por mar ni ci tsam pa //
NK013(pa)015:700: srang du byas pa'i lci ba gcin //
NK013(pa)015:702: mar gyi sum 'gyur ldan byas la //
NK013(pa)015:703: dang po lci ba chu gnyis bsre //
NK013(pa)015:704: tshags btsags de la 'o zho mar //
NK013(pa)015:705: bsres te gtsang ma'i snod du bkol //
NK013(pa)015:706: kha yi chu dang 'og gi tshigs //
NK013(pa)015:707: dor te bar gyis lde gu des //
NK013(pa)015:708: man+dala byugs pa'i rdzas su bshad //
NK013(pa)015:709: nyi ma bdun du lag snum byug /
NK013(pa)015:710: de ni mi brtan par yang bshad //
NK013(pa)015:711: zur ni legs byugs mnyam po yi //
NK013(pa)015:713: mar gyi lde gus bkus pa na //
NK013(pa)015:714: me long dang ni chu shel bzhin /
NK013(pa)015:716: / 'di la dgos pa rnam lnga yod //
NK013(pa)015:717: gdon bgegs thub cing 'du nad sel //
NK013(pa)015:718: dri zhim 'gro ba dbang du sdud //
NK013(pa)015:719: shin tu gtsang ma'i yon tan lnga //
NK013(pa)015:720: gnyis pa mes sbyang ba ni //
NK013(pa)015:721: mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg gis sbyang ste //
NK013(pa)015:723: kun nas mtshan ma ngan gyur na //
NK013(pa)015:724: gzhan du bgrod dam zhi ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:725: me yis rab tu dag par 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:727: gsum pa sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:729: rang gi phyag g.yas mthil sor mo lnga yi steng
NK013(pa)015:730: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lnga la h'u mthing ga re
NK013(pa)015:731: re yongs su gyur pa rdo rje rtse lnga h'u
NK013(pa)015:733: badz+ra ha na ha na kro d+ha h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:734: ces chos nyid dag pa'i rgyas lan gsum bsnun /
NK013(pa)015:736: rdo rje h+aum gi 'od kyis sa yi nyes skyon
NK013(pa)015:737: thams cad dag pa ye shes rang snang gi gzhir
NK013(pa)015:738: gyur / bzhi pa ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba la /
NK013(pa)015:739: mtshan med kyis sbyang ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:740: mtshan bcas sbyang ba gnyis kyi /
NK013(pa)015:742: thams cad rang sems rnam pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:743: mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya ni //
NK013(pa)015:744: nam mkha' lta bur rang bzhin nas /
NK013(pa)015:748: / 'khrul bcos chos can la gnas phyir //
NK013(pa)015:749: dag par bltas na mtshan nyid med //
NK013(pa)015:750: rang rig stong pa'i ye shes la //
NK013(pa)015:751: gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med phyir //
NK013(pa)015:752: spyod yul yongs su dag par bya //
NK013(pa)015:753: ma h+aa sh+au nya t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)015:754: stong nyid du bsgom pa'i blos sa sbyang ba'i phul du gyur pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:755: gnyis pa snod gzhal yas khang gis sbyang ba /
NK013(pa)015:756: rang rig ye shes kyi rdo rje sngon po mthing nag h'u yig 'bar bas mtshan par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:757: de las ee yam bam lam sum ram rnams chad /
NK013(pa)015:760: de yi steng du b+h+r+aum kha dog sna tshogs pa gsal /
NK013(pa)015:761: 'od zer spro bsdus tha mal pa'i sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:762: ye shes kyi 'od zer mtha' yas par spro ba'i
NK013(pa)015:763: rgyan dang bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gsal
NK013(pa)015:765: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dbyings //
NK013(pa)015:766: stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin las //
NK013(pa)015:767: h'u gyur nam mkha' e gzugs can //
NK013(pa)015:768: thams cad kun gyi gzhir gnas pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:769: dran spyod rlung ni yam sngon po //
NK013(pa)015:770: sa bon chu ste bam dkar bshad //
NK013(pa)015:771: ma lus gzhi ste gser mdog la //
NK013(pa)015:772: skad cig sgra med dmar ser ram //
NK013(pa)015:773: ma nges kun gzhi sna tshogs b+h+r+aum /
NK013(pa)015:775: / 'byung ba rim brtsegs rten dang bcas //
NK013(pa)015:776: rdo rje rgya gram sa gzhi dag /
NK013(pa)015:777: sngags dang phyag rgyas brtan par gyur //
NK013(pa)015:778: b+h+r+aum las rin chen khang bzang ni //
NK013(pa)015:779: gdan gyi dkyil 'khor cha rdzogs pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:780: drug pa byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:781: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los bzung ba'ang ste /
NK013(pa)015:782: rdo rje slob dpon 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs /
NK013(pa)015:783: rgyas pa'i gos bcas dkyil 'khor mtha' bskor gyis shar nas zhugs te dbus su bzhugs /
NK013(pa)015:784: zhal shar bstan mdun stegs la rnam bdun phreng tshar dang /
NK013(pa)015:786: phyogs bzhir stegs bu bzhi la mchod pa lan bzhir bkod /
NK013(pa)015:787: de'ang slob dpon mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:788: g.yas nas mgo brtsams mchod yon dang /
NK013(pa)015:789: zhabs bsil bdug spos me tog sgron /
NK013(pa)015:790: dri dang zhal zas sman gtor raka /
NK013(pa)015:791: de ltar bskor phyogs ma 'khrul pa /
NK013(pa)015:794: rang rig rdo rje h'u mtshan pa las 'od 'phros 'phags pa mchod /
NK013(pa)015:795: gsang ba gsum gyi byin bsdus /
NK013(pa)015:796: sems can gyi sgrib pa sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:798: tshur 'dus seng khri rin po che pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan gyi lte ba la yongs su gyur pas /
NK013(pa)015:801: rang nyid bcom ldan 'das sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba nas sgrub thabs su /
NK013(pa)015:803: zhes pa'i bar gsal btab cing brjod /
NK013(pa)015:804: yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa h+aum dang /
NK013(pa)015:805: yum gyi gsang ba'i pad ma 'dab bzhi la m+aum gyis mtshan cing /
NK013(pa)015:806: bu ga phata kyis bkag pa /
NK013(pa)015:808: sa ma ya hoh a nu r+aa go&a ham /
NK013(pa)015:809: a nu r+aa ga ya mye /
NK013(pa)015:810: sbyor ba'i brda' bzhis phan tshun bsnol mar bskul te /
NK013(pa)015:811: dzahh+aum bam hoh zhes snyoms par zhugs pas byang chub
NK013(pa)015:812: sems lnga'i sprin gyi 'od zer gyis sems can thams
NK013(pa)015:813: cad bkug dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod /
NK013(pa)015:814: bdag cag dkyil 'khor du sbyor cig /
NK013(pa)015:815: ces gsol ba btab pa gsan nas mkha' gsang du bcug ste phyir bton /
NK013(pa)015:816: de thams cad kyis yab kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis
NK013(pa)015:817: rang gi lus lhar shis pas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
NK013(pa)015:818: rol gnas te ched du brjod pa /
NK013(pa)015:820: rdo rje phung pa'i yan lag kun /
NK013(pa)015:821: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
NK013(pa)015:822: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
NK013(pa)015:823: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
NK013(pa)015:824: sa chu spyan dang ma m+aa ki /
NK013(pa)015:825: me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste //
NK013(pa)015:826: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
NK013(pa)015:827: srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing //
NK013(pa)015:828: thams cad ma lus chos so cog /
NK013(pa)015:829: sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin //
NK013(pa)015:830: sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos //
NK013(pa)015:831: btsal kyang rgyal bas ma rnyes so //
NK013(pa)015:832: yang yum gyis byin gyis rlabs kyis chos thams cad stong nyid du rtogs nas ched du brjod pa /
NK013(pa)015:834: phyogs bcu stong khams ye nas dben //
NK013(pa)015:835: srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing //
NK013(pa)015:836: snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas //
NK013(pa)015:837: phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas //
NK013(pa)015:838: thams cad mchog gi snying po las //
NK013(pa)015:839: gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal //
NK013(pa)015:840: nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos //
NK013(pa)015:841: btsal kyang rgyal bas mi mnyes so //
NK013(pa)015:842: de thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du gyur nas so so'i zhing du 'khod /
NK013(pa)015:843: slar yang gdod nas grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug /
NK013(pa)015:844: thugs srog gi yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis su gyur /
NK013(pa)015:845: mkha' gsang nas phyir thon sku rdzogs par gdan la 'khod par gyur pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:855: h'u la s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK013(pa)015:857: t+r+aam ma l+ye sa ma ya ho /
NK013(pa)015:858: h+r+aim ha h+aum pad+ma ba da ma /
NK013(pa)015:860: dz+rim ku ru pa na h+r+ai /
NK013(pa)015:861: a nirti r+aa ga y+aa mi /
NK013(pa)015:862: meem d+ha ra ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:863: dzahd+h+au p+pe pra we sha ya /
NK013(pa)015:864: th+l+him ni s+sa ram pa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:865: h'u push+pe a we sha ya /
NK013(pa)015:866: h+aum s+pha ra dza ya s+w+aa ha /
NK013(pa)015:867: b+aam d+ai pa su g+ai ni /
NK013(pa)015:868: m+aum sh+r+ai am r+aa g+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:870: h'u h'u h'u badz+ra tsit+ta a /
NK013(pa)015:871: a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa ma nya a /
NK013(pa)015:873: mu ni h+aum t+r+aum s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:880: ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa r+ai dz+wa li ni h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:883: ma h+aa kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa l+ai ni h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:886: ma h+aa kro d+he shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai n+ai h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:889: ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai ni h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:890: ces brjod pas zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis thugs srog dang /
NK013(pa)015:892: byin rlabs kyis lha dang bcas pa gsal bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:893: 'khor la rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
NK013(pa)015:894: g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:895: myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas //
NK013(pa)015:896: gru chad la ni mthong byed dang //
NK013(pa)015:897: thos byed myong byed snom byed rnams //
NK013(pa)015:898: btsun mo yi ni tshogs dang bcas //
NK013(pa)015:899: bar khyams la ni thub drug dang //
NK013(pa)015:900: mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:901: bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan //
NK013(pa)015:902: sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni //
NK013(pa)015:903: btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas /
NK013(pa)015:905: / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur ni /
NK013(pa)015:908: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
NK013(pa)015:909: rnam dag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
NK013(pa)015:910: mi shig dri ma kun dang bral //
NK013(pa)015:911: thugs rje 'od zer nyi dkyil bzhin //
NK013(pa)015:912: sa gnas lam kun rdzogs mdzad pa //
NK013(pa)015:913: rab tu sbyangs ba'i stobs rdzogs shing //
NK013(pa)015:914: tha snyad mig gnyis yul dang bral //
NK013(pa)015:915: byang chub sems mchog sgrib pa med /
NK013(pa)015:917: / 'gro gnas thugs rje'i rgyun bcas pas //
NK013(pa)015:918: rang gi ye shes 'dus ma byas //
NK013(pa)015:919: theg pa mchog ldan sngags kyi rgyan //
NK013(pa)015:920: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsang mdzad cing //
NK013(pa)015:921: rang bzhin phyag rgya'i gnas su 'jug /
NK013(pa)015:922: ma h+aa sh+au nya t+aa sogs dbang bskur /
NK013(pa)015:924: thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
NK013(pa)015:925: dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas mdun mkhar spyan drangs
NK013(pa)015:926: / badz+ra sa m+aa dzah sa bsnyan brnan /
NK013(pa)015:929: dza h'u bam hoh zhes bstim /
NK013(pa)015:930: na ma sarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo bi shwa sogs kun bzang /
NK013(pa)015:931: na ma sarba ta th+aa ga te de wa s+ya
NK013(pa)015:932: man+da las b+aa ri wa ra badz+ra argam pra tits+tsha
NK013(pa)015:934: a ha ra a ha ra sogs zhabs bsil /
NK013(pa)015:935: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au sh+pe d+hu /
NK013(pa)015:939: badz+ra gan+de d+hurma ra ni ta /
NK013(pa)015:943: badz+ra girti h+r+aih badz+ra nirti ah de dag phyi mchod dang /
NK013(pa)015:944: sarba ta th+aa ga t+aa a nu ra ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)015:945: ram yam kham h+aum s+pha ra na phata /
NK013(pa)015:946: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kha hi /
NK013(pa)015:947: ma h+aa ba lin+ta kha hi /
NK013(pa)015:948: de dag ni na nga gi mchod pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:949: swa b+h+aa wa sh+aud+ha sarba d+h+aarma swa b+h+aa wa sh+aud+d+ho ham /
NK013(pa)015:950: zhes de kho na nyid dran pa gsang ba'i mchod pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:951: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs //
NK013(pa)015:952: ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu zab //
NK013(pa)015:954: rdo rje yid la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)015:955: zhes bstod de ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi nga rgyal bzung ste gnas par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:956: de nas phyogs bzhir gnas pa'i slob ma bzhis thun
NK013(pa)015:957: mong du sgrubs thabs nas 'byung ba'i mchod pa byin
NK013(pa)015:958: rlabs sngags dang rol mor bcas pa'i mthar /
NK013(pa)015:965: de kho nar bcas pa'i mchod pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:968: lus ngag yid gsum nam mkha' ltar //
NK013(pa)015:969: rang bzhin 'od gsal dwangs pa las //
NK013(pa)015:970: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i slob dpon bzhin //
NK013(pa)015:971: de dang brtag par bdag phyag 'tshal //
NK013(pa)015:972: shar phyogs pa thun mong du /
NK013(pa)015:974: rang nyid sangs rgyas spyan ma dkar mo 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:975: g.yon rang rtags dril bu las /
NK013(pa)015:976: g.yas thams cad thugs kar thal mo bkod pa can du bskyed gsungs /
NK013(pa)015:981: ma h+aa a d+aar+shasa bdag por byas pa'i rigs lngas dbu brgyan /
NK013(pa)015:982: k+aa ya w+aaka sogs gnas lnga byin rlabs zin nas man+dala /
NK013(pa)015:983: ma tshang ba med pa 'di nyid dkyil 'khor chen
NK013(pa)015:984: por byin gyis rlabs pa zhu ba'i don du 'bul
NK013(pa)015:987: zhi ba'i ye shes rang snang ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:988: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab mdzes pa //
NK013(pa)015:989: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /
NK013(pa)015:990: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:993: rang nyid m+aa m+aa k+ai ser mo rin po che'i dril bu 'dzin par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1000: yon tan rin chen 'byung ba'i gtso //
NK013(pa)015:1001: ma lus kun gyi re skong ba //
NK013(pa)015:1002: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mchog /
NK013(pa)015:1003: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol /
NK013(pa)015:1006: rang nyid gos dkar mo dmar mo pad+ma dril bu 'dzin pa'i skur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1008: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med /
NK013(pa)015:1010: / 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
NK013(pa)015:1011: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog /
NK013(pa)015:1012: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:1015: rang nyid dam tshig sgrol ma ljang gu ral gri dril bu 'dzin pa'i skur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1017: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pas //
NK013(pa)015:1018: thams cad sgrol ba'i ded dpon mchog /
NK013(pa)015:1019: sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las bdag /
NK013(pa)015:1020: dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:1021: thams cad kyis thun mong du /
NK013(pa)015:1022: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs shing //
NK013(pa)015:1023: rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil //
NK013(pa)015:1025: dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:1027: bzhi med na gcig gis de dag tu song nas bya bar gsungs /
NK013(pa)015:1028: slob dpon gyis rdor dril 'dzin cing 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta ba bcas /
NK013(pa)015:1029: phyogs bcu ma lus dus gsum gyi //
NK013(pa)015:1030: rgyal ba sras bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK013(pa)015:1031: che ge mo sogs don gyi phyir //
NK013(pa)015:1032: dkyil 'khor chen po bdag bgyid pas //
NK013(pa)015:1033: bdag cag rjes su bzung ba'i slad //
NK013(pa)015:1034: sa 'di shis par byin rlabs pas //
NK013(pa)015:1035: bde bar gshegs pas mdzad du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:1036: nam mkha' gang ba'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rang la thim par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1039: slar yang rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje'i mig gnyis ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba /
NK013(pa)015:1040: mig 'bras h'u gi yi ger gyur //
NK013(pa)015:1041: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyi ma dang //
NK013(pa)015:1042: chos dang rta mchog snang mdzad dang //
NK013(pa)015:1043: bdag nyid chen po nga nyid yin //
NK013(pa)015:1044: thams cad bka' las deng ma 'da' /
NK013(pa)015:1046: / thugs ka nas khro bo'i sprul pa'i sprin phung mtha'
NK013(pa)015:1047: yas par spro ba'i rkang mthil gnyis su 'bar ba'i
NK013(pa)015:1049: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi cis kyang mi shigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du brtan /
NK013(pa)015:1052: rang gi mig g.yas kyi mes bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad sreg /
NK013(pa)015:1054: dz+wa la badz+ra h'u sogs sgrub thabs nas /
NK013(pa)015:1055: r+aa dza dzah zhes bgegs brgyal bar slar bslang /
NK013(pa)015:1056: slar yang de yi dbus su b+h+r+aum las byung ba'i 'khor lo ser po rtsibs brgyad la sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1057: rtsa rtse steng 'og tu phyogs shing rno ba'i dbal dang ldan pa /
NK013(pa)015:1058: sbub stong rab tu yangs shing /
NK013(pa)015:1059: lte ba chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbus su
NK013(pa)015:1060: bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs ka'i h+aum yig
NK013(pa)015:1062: rtsibs nang rnams su nyi gdan bcur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1063: yang rang gi thugs las khro bo d+aak+ki r+aa dza
NK013(pa)015:1064: sngo skya lcags kyu dang tho ba thogs pa spros
NK013(pa)015:1065: / phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams bgegs kyi gtso bo phyogs skyong bcu la bstim /
NK013(pa)015:1066: de dag rnams lcags kyus snying nas drangs te bkug
NK013(pa)015:1067: pas myos shing dran pa nyams nas nyi gdan rnams
NK013(pa)015:1068: kyi steng du 'gyel thabs su 'khod par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1081: dzahh+aum bam hoh yangs sbyor mtshams nas khro bo bcu phyung ste /
NK013(pa)015:1082: mdun gyi phur bu rnams la thim ste stong pa nyid du zhugs /
NK013(pa)015:1083: stong pa'i ngang las h+aum las byung ba'i rdo rje'i khro rgyal bcu po phyogs rnams phyogs mdog /
NK013(pa)015:1085: steng 'og gnyis mthing ka kun kyang zhal gcig /
NK013(pa)015:1086: phyag gnyis tho ba dang phur bu 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)015:1087: smad phur bu 'bar ba'i rnams pa can du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1088: steng phur shar stod du bkod pas /
NK013(pa)015:1089: badz+ra kro d+ha h+aum k+aa ra h+aum gardza gardza h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1090: shar phur shar smad du btab /
NK013(pa)015:1091: badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya h'u ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:1093: badz+ra krod+ha ya m+aan+ta ka h+aum pa tsa pa tsa h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1095: badz+ra kro d+ha h+ya g+h+ri wa h+aum hu lu hu lu h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:1097: badz+ra kro d+ha a mri ta kun+da li h+aum tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1099: byang shar gyi phur pa der btab /
NK013(pa)015:1100: badz+ra kro d+ha tree lo kya bi dza ya h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1101: b+han d+ha b+han d+ha h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1102: nub byang phur pa der btab /
NK013(pa)015:1103: badz+ra kro d+ha a p+aa ra dzi ta h+aum tish+tha tish+tha h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1104: lho nub phur pa der btab /
NK013(pa)015:1105: badz+ra kro d+ha +aar+ya a tsa la h+aum b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1106: shar lho'i phur ba der btab /
NK013(pa)015:1107: badz+ra kro d+ha n+ai la dan+da h+aum da ha da ha h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1111: badz+ra kro d+ha m+aa h+aa ba la h+aum s+pho ta h+aum phata de dag so so'i sngags mthar /
NK013(pa)015:1112: g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+h+aa ta ya sarba dush+tana h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)015:1113: k+ai la ya k+ai la ya sarba p+aa pam phata /
NK013(pa)015:1115: badz+ra k+ai la ya badz+ra d+ha ra a dz+ny+aa pa
NK013(pa)015:1116: ya ti sarba big+h+nam k+aa w+aaka tsit+ta badz+ra k+ai la
NK013(pa)015:1117: ya h'u phata / zhes sbyar zhing stang stabs bya /
NK013(pa)015:1123: byang shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal /
NK013(pa)015:1124: nub byang du 'dod pa'i rgyal po /
NK013(pa)015:1125: lho nub tu mi g.yo ba /
NK013(pa)015:1126: shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po /
NK013(pa)015:1127: 'og tu bgegs 'joms stobs po che rnams d+aak+ki r+aa
NK013(pa)015:1128: dzas bgegs rnams la btab pas lus thal gyis phug
NK013(pa)015:1129: ste g.yo 'gul med cing gnas par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1130: slar yang zhe sdang rdo rje'i rngams pa'i gar gyi
NK013(pa)015:1131: thugs kyi h+aum gi 'od zer mtha' yas pas dkyil
NK013(pa)015:1132: khor gyis brtan cing dag par bgegs kyis mi tshugs
NK013(pa)015:1133: par gyur / h+aum gis glu len cing phata kyis
NK013(pa)015:1134: sgra drag pos rdo rje gsor zhing bsdigs nas pad
NK013(pa)015:1135: dkor dang bsgrags g.yas brkyang dang sdigs mdzub g.yas su
NK013(pa)015:1136: bsgyur zhing rdo rje thugs ka dang dril bu dkur
NK013(pa)015:1137: brten pa'i rdo rje g.yas bskor gyis 'gros kyis sa
NK013(pa)015:1138: lan gsum 'thas par gcag pa rdo rje sems dpa'i
NK013(pa)015:1139: par gyur / dgyes gar ro // yum gyi chags
NK013(pa)015:1140: pa'i gar gyis thugs kyi m+aum yig gi 'od zer
NK013(pa)015:1142: des bar du gcod pa la sogs pa'i 'khor gsum stong nyid du sbyangs par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1143: m+aum gyi glu dang h+ai zhes dril bu drag tu
NK013(pa)015:1144: 'khrol bas gar bskor dang g.yon brkyang gi sdigs mdzub
NK013(pa)015:1145: g.yon bsgyur mthar thugs kar 'khyud rgya bya ba /
NK013(pa)015:1146: rdo rje g.yon 'gros kyis sa lan gsum du bcag pa /
NK013(pa)015:1147: dbyings phyug yum gyis bde gar ro //
NK013(pa)015:1148: spro na zhi ba'i tshogs gar chen mo bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:1151: nga yi dkyil 'khor brtan bya'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:1153: pa ta la pany+tsa h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:1155: mthar chos thams cad sems kyi snang ba la /
NK013(pa)015:1156: de'ang stong nyid du gnas pas 'khor gsum rnam par
NK013(pa)015:1157: mi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid du shes pas
NK013(pa)015:1158: / rnam par rtogs pa bgegs yin te //
NK013(pa)015:1162: brgyad pas bzung na phyag len gyi dbang gis 'og tu 'byung ngo //
NK013(pa)015:1163: sa chog de dag kyang dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa gsar pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1164: ma dul ba'i sa phyogs su sa chog gsar du bya dgos pa sogs kyi dbang las /
NK013(pa)015:1165: rdul tshon gyi sgrub mchod dkyus tsam dkyil 'khor khang pa rnying pa las brtag pa /
NK013(pa)015:1168: gter sba ba sogs dor zhing /
NK013(pa)015:1169: ras bris kyi sa chog zhag chod la ni mi snang ba las slong ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:1171: sngags rgya ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba /
NK013(pa)015:1172: byin gyis rlabs pa tsam dang /
NK013(pa)015:1173: sta gon dang sbrel ba'i dbang du na /
NK013(pa)015:1178: de dag kyang rgyas bsdus 'byin 'jug ma 'khrul par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:1179: de yan chad nub dang por bya ba sa chog gi rim pa'o /
NK013(pa)015:1181: / 'di man chad sta gon gyi khongs su sa bcad lnga gsungs pa'i gnyis pa mnyam par bya ba'ang /
NK013(pa)015:1182: de yi gzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad bstan pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1183: de la ji ltar bya ba'o //
NK013(pa)015:1185: drang don phyi dkyil lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi tshad dang /
NK013(pa)015:1186: nges don nang dkyil lhag pa ting 'dzin nam mchog dkyil gyi tshad bstan pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:1187: dang po chung ba la rtsa brgyud las /
NK013(pa)015:1188: de la khru gang tshad du bya //
NK013(pa)015:1189: yang na lus gang tshad du bya //
NK013(pa)015:1190: zhes log re la khru gang res khru bzhi pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1191: lus gang res lus bzhi pa gnyis sgyu 'phrul gyi
NK013(pa)015:1192: dkyil 'khor bsdus pa lha bco brgyad pa'i bri gzhi
NK013(pa)015:1193: dang / yang na lus ni bcu gnyis sam /
NK013(pa)015:1194: yang na khru ni bcu drug pa /
NK013(pa)015:1195: zhes pas ngos re la 'dom gsum gsum bcu gnyis pa'am /
NK013(pa)015:1196: ngos re la khru gsum gsum bsdus pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:1197: ngos re la khru bzhi bzhi pa'am /
NK013(pa)015:1198: 'dom bzhi bzhi pa ste bcu drug pa rgyas bsdus
NK013(pa)015:1199: bzhi ni lha bzhi bcu zhe gnyis pa'i 'bri gazhi'o
NK013(pa)015:1200: // nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya /
NK013(pa)015:1201: zhes pas khru nyi shu ni ngos re la 'dom lnga pa /
NK013(pa)015:1202: nyi shu rtsa lnga ni ngos re la 'dom drug dang khru gang re yod pa /
NK013(pa)015:1203: de gnyis sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa'i bri gzhi ste /
NK013(pa)015:1204: de dag kyang tshad ni rkyen gyis ma nges te /
NK013(pa)015:1205: zhes gsungs pas gnas khang gi yang dogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1206: slob ma'i 'du byed cha rkyen 'byor pa che chung dang /
NK013(pa)015:1207: rdo rje slob dpon phyag gzo ba mi gzo ba la ltos nas gsungs so //
NK013(pa)015:1208: gnyis pa ni rnal 'byor pa ting 'dzin rtsal chung na /
NK013(pa)015:1209: gzhu 'dom lnga brgya ste rgyang grags kyi tshad dang /
NK013(pa)015:1210: 'bring ni dpag tshad kyi bar du lhas gang bar bsgom pa ni chos mchog man dang /
NK013(pa)015:1211: de nas sangs rgyas stong dang /
NK013(pa)015:1212: mthong lam pa yan gyis nyi khri bzhi stong dang /
NK013(pa)015:1213: mthar lam pa'i slob dpon gyis bsam yas lhun gyis
NK013(pa)015:1214: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' khyab
NK013(pa)015:1215: par mtha' klas pa srid du bsgom pa ste /
NK013(pa)015:1216: slob dpon dgongs pa zab mi zab dang /
NK013(pa)015:1217: slob bu las tshab che chung gi dbye bas phye zhing slob dpon 'phags pas /
NK013(pa)015:1218: drod thob pa'i slob ma la bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du tshad rgya che ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:1219: slob dpon pad+ma jo mo mkhar chen bza' la rdo rje phur pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:1220: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas ti ser mtsho ma
NK013(pa)015:1221: pham la thig dor nas dkyil 'khor rgyang grags su
NK013(pa)015:1222: sprul te sgyu 'phrul du dbang bskur ba'i lo rgyus
NK013(pa)015:1223: lta bu'o // de yang las rim las /
NK013(pa)015:1224: slob dpon mthar nye'i lam gnas pas //
NK013(pa)015:1225: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phro zhing //
NK013(pa)015:1226: sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor sogs //
NK013(pa)015:1227: rdo rje'i thig tshad dor tsam gyis //
NK013(pa)015:1228: rgyang grangs la sogs mtshan ma yi //
NK013(pa)015:1229: dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar gsal ldan pa //
NK013(pa)015:1230: ting 'dzin lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan yin //
NK013(pa)015:1232: gnyis pa ji ltar bya ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:1233: rdzas dang yo byad la gnam rgyan /
NK013(pa)015:1234: bar logs yol ba sogs cha rkyen rnams 'di nas bsogs /
NK013(pa)015:1235: zhag gis bar chod pa la bdag gi rnal 'byor
NK013(pa)015:1236: bsdu ldang bcas zin nas go ma yes chags chags
NK013(pa)015:1237: gdab pa'i sngon du rdor dril byin rlabs bya bar
NK013(pa)015:1238: gsungs pas / rdor dril mdun du bzhag ste /
NK013(pa)015:1241: stong pa'i ngang las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lte ba la kun tu bzang po /
NK013(pa)015:1242: yar rwa lnga rgyal ba rigs lnga /
NK013(pa)015:1243: mar gyi r+aa lnga rigs kyi yum lnga /
NK013(pa)015:1244: yas mas kyi pad 'dab sems dpa' yab yum bcu drug /
NK013(pa)015:1246: pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir rigs kyi yum lnga /
NK013(pa)015:1247: mtshams bzhir gsang ba'i yum bzhi /
NK013(pa)015:1248: zhal shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin ma /
NK013(pa)015:1249: rtse mo'i rdo rje rigs lnga yab lnga'i skur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1250: rdo rje'i rigs bdag por byas pa'i sh+au nya t+aa sa dbang bskur /
NK013(pa)015:1256: las kyi rdo rjes mchod pa'i rwa bar mchod pa bkod pa btegs nas phyi nang gis mchod /
NK013(pa)015:1257: h+aum +aa zhes brjod pas lha rnams 'od du zhu /
NK013(pa)015:1258: rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga yi ngo bo /
NK013(pa)015:1259: dril bu shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong nyid chos kyi sgra dbyangs sgrogs pa /
NK013(pa)015:1260: gnyis ka'ang don dam byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no //
NK013(pa)015:1263: thugs kar rdo rje bzung ba sku yi dam tshig la dran pa bzhag pas //
NK013(pa)015:1264: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
NK013(pa)015:1265: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
NK013(pa)015:1266: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
NK013(pa)015:1267: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i gtso //
NK013(pa)015:1269: dril bu 'khrol ba gsung gi dam tshig gi /
NK013(pa)015:1270: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyi bdag /
NK013(pa)015:1271: rang bzhin du ni dngos med byas //
NK013(pa)015:1272: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' rnams //
NK013(pa)015:1273: dam pa'i srid pa thob par shog /
NK013(pa)015:1274: thugs kar 'khyud rgya bya ba thugs kyi dam tshig gis /
NK013(pa)015:1275: rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:1276: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa /
NK013(pa)015:1279: chos la de bzhin dbang sgyur shog /
NK013(pa)015:1280: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra s+w+aa b+h+aa w+aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)015:1281: stegs bu la thod pa'i nang du rdzas sum cu pa'i go ma yo bya ste /
NK013(pa)015:1282: phung lnga dag cing sku lnga thob pa'i phyir /
NK013(pa)015:1286: dbang po lnga dag cing phrin las lnga thob pa'i phyir /
NK013(pa)015:1291: yul lnga dag cing yon tan lnga thob pa'i phyir /
NK013(pa)015:1296: nor bu gsungs pas de'i rgyu ring bsrel lam yang
NK013(pa)015:1297: na in+da n+ai la lta bu'i rin po che dngos
NK013(pa)015:1298: te lnga / gzhan sel rnam shes lnga dag cing /
NK013(pa)015:1299: don gnyer ye shes lnga thob par bya ba'i yir chu'i snying po lan tsh+wa /
NK013(pa)015:1300: me tog gi snying po sbrang rtsi /
NK013(pa)015:1301: shing tog gi snying po bu ram /
NK013(pa)015:1304: 'dod yon lnga dag cing gsung lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir /
NK013(pa)015:1305: bya kri te sta ga tshe ra /
NK013(pa)015:1307: ta pa de wa ste chu dag g+h+ri ta ri dbang lag /
NK013(pa)015:1308: kan+da ka ri ste sle tres rnams sam /
NK013(pa)015:1312: kan+ta ka ri ste shu zur /
NK013(pa)015:1313: a p+aa ra dzi ta ste snying zho sha rnams dang /
NK013(pa)015:1314: khams lnga dag pas rigs lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir /
NK013(pa)015:1317: sha chen dang bdud rtsi lnga de dag kyang sum cu rab bsnyams bskam par bya /
NK013(pa)015:1318: zhes pa ltar sbyar ba'i 'de gus 'thug srab glang
NK013(pa)015:1319: ko tsam du byugs par bya ba gsungs pa rgya
NK013(pa)015:1320: gar bas de ltar mdzad pa'i rkyang nul gyi dod
NK013(pa)015:1321: de ngas bod kyi lag len la 'thor zhing 'deb
NK013(pa)015:1323: de yang dang por rab gnas bya ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:1325: stong pa'i ngang las dam rdzas kyi steng du /
NK013(pa)015:1326: h'u +amo s+w+aam +aam h+aa las sangs rgyas thams cad
NK013(pa)015:1327: kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi de
NK013(pa)015:1328: bzhin gshegs pa lnga re yang rigs lnga'i rang bzhin
NK013(pa)015:1330: shu ny+aa ta sa bdag por byas pa'i bskur /
NK013(pa)015:1337: h'u zhes brjod pas 'od du zhu ba ye shes kyi bdud rtsir 'khyil par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1338: des dkyil 'khor gyi gzhir chag chag 'debs te /
NK013(pa)015:1339: +aahh+aum sarba sam sho d+ha ni h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:1342: yan lag can thig gi bya ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:1343: yan lag dngos lha dang bum pa slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:1345: rgyu grogs tshad grangs rab gnas dang /
NK013(pa)015:1346: gdab thabs spyod lam bdun du bshad /
NK013(pa)015:1348: phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang /
NK013(pa)015:1350: thig gi don mi 'gyur bar phyed pa la bshad
NK013(pa)015:1351: phyir de yi rgyu 'gying phur bskor phur gnyis dang
NK013(pa)015:1352: / srad bu zhes pas ye thig gi rgyu me
NK013(pa)015:1353: tog pad ma'i rtsa ba las byas pa'i rgyus pa'i
NK013(pa)015:1354: / skud pa / dam tshig gi thig skud ras bal dkris pa las byas pa ste /
NK013(pa)015:1355: snga ma la dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ste kha dog lnga dang /
NK013(pa)015:1356: phyi ma la dkar dmar mthing gsum dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:1358: rgyal rigs kyi bu mo lo bcu drug ma yum du byin rlabs pa'am /
NK013(pa)015:1359: slob ma las kyi rdo rje yum kun tu bzang mor mos pa la /
NK013(pa)015:1361: ring thung 'dzin pa de nyid ma gtogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur dang /
NK013(pa)015:1362: sboms su sgo yi nyi shu'i cha'o //
NK013(pa)015:1366: stong pa'i ngang las nyi zla'i gdan lnga'i steng du /
NK013(pa)015:1367: rang gi thugs ka nas h+aum s+w+aa am h+aa rnams 'phos /
NK013(pa)015:1368: ye shes kyi thig skud la thim /
NK013(pa)015:1370: slar yang nyi zla'i gdan gsum gyi steng du thugs ka nas +aahmh'u 'phros /
NK013(pa)015:1371: dam tshig gi thig skud la thim yi ge gsum du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1372: 'og min nas sa bon gyi tshogs bkug /
NK013(pa)015:1373: slar yang thugs ka'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
NK013(pa)015:1374: sras dang bcas pa mdun mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzah
NK013(pa)015:1376: thig gi srad bu 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK013(pa)015:1377: 'bar ba'i lta stangs ni rdzim bskyod bzhin par /
NK013(pa)015:1378: rang gi mig gnyis dzahyiga las skyes pa'i nyi zlar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1379: dip+ta drish+tha ang+ku sha dzah nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyor bar mdzad par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1380: ma h+aa sh+au nya t+aa sogs ye shes lnga'i sngags
NK013(pa)015:1381: brjod de rnams kyi sbyor mtshams nas ye shes lnga'i
NK013(pa)015:1382: rang bzhin gyi 'od zer kha dog lnga 'bar ba
NK013(pa)015:1384: de yongs su gyur pa las rigs lnga yab yum bcur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1385: slar yang 'od kyis de 'dra ba spyan drangs /
NK013(pa)015:1392: yab yum sbrel ba'i sngags lan bdun bdun gyis bsnyen /
NK013(pa)015:1394: ye shes lnga yi 'od kyi srad bur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1395: slob dpon yab tu gsal bas dkyil 'khor gyi shar du zhal gzigs /
NK013(pa)015:1396: slob ma yum du gsal bas nub bltas su bzhugs /
NK013(pa)015:1397: slob dpon la slob mas thig skud phul /
NK013(pa)015:1398: slob dpon gyis re re nas yab kyi 'bru lnga
NK013(pa)015:1399: brjod bzhin g.yas sor gyis slob ma la gtod pa
NK013(pa)015:1400: / slob mas re re nas g.yon sor la yar bsgril te /
NK013(pa)015:1416: yang yum gyi 'bru lnga brjod gyin mar 'khal ste /
NK013(pa)015:1418: yab yum gnyis ka'i 'bru bcu brjod bzhin thams cad
NK013(pa)015:1419: gcig tu 'khal te gser ram dngul snod du bzhag
NK013(pa)015:1420: go // k+aa ya badz+ra sogs rdo rje gsum sngags brjod pas /
NK013(pa)015:1421: nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas gsum
NK013(pa)015:1422: nas rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin 'od zer dkar
NK013(pa)015:1424: dam tshig gi thig skud so so la thim /
NK013(pa)015:1425: de nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rjer gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1431: bde gshegs sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi shigs rgyal ba'i rdo rje gsum /
NK013(pa)015:1432: sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yi /
NK013(pa)015:1433: rdo rje mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)015:1435: lha de dag zhu ba las /
NK013(pa)015:1436: sku gsung thugs kyi srad bur gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1437: sngar bzhin gnas pas 'bru gsum slob ma la gtad de /
NK013(pa)015:1445: yang lan gcig gis thams cad 'khal bas snod du bzhag go //
NK013(pa)015:1446: drug pa ni skud pa chad na slob dpon 'chi /
NK013(pa)015:1447: thig sna shor na slob bu 'chi //
NK013(pa)015:1448: phyogs 'khrul bas ni gnyis ka nyams //
NK013(pa)015:1449: rgyun chad las la gnod par 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:1450: de phyir mkhas ldan sgrims te bya //
NK013(pa)015:1451: zhes bshad pa bzhin shes pas ye thig gis gnas thig 'debs pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1452: las thig gis sa thig 'deb pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:1454: slob dpon nub nas shar gzigs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1455: slob ma zhal shar nas nub gzigs kyis lha yab yum gyi nga rgyal bya /
NK013(pa)015:1456: dzahdzahdzah zhes ye shes thig skud smin mtshams su bzung nas //
NK013(pa)015:1457: phyogs bcu ma lus dus gsum gyi //
NK013(pa)015:1458: rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus kun //
NK013(pa)015:1459: thig gi sgra 'dis bskul nas kyang //
NK013(pa)015:1460: byin gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:1461: badz+ra sa ma ya mu tra g+sha ma h+aum zhes
NK013(pa)015:1462: sam badz+ra s+au tras ma ma ti kra ma h'u
NK013(pa)015:1463: phata / ces se gol nam mkha' la gtogs pa bcas shar nub tshangs thig dang /
NK013(pa)015:1464: slob dpon lhor gnas te byang du blta bas slob
NK013(pa)015:1465: mas rgyab 'gros bya ba bcas tshangs thig gnyis pa
NK013(pa)015:1466: dang / mer gnas te rlung du blta bas zur thig dang po dang /
NK013(pa)015:1467: bden bral nas dbang ldan du blta' bas zur thig gnyis pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1468: mer gnas te byang du blta' bas rgyab 'gros bcas shar gyi rtsa thig dang /
NK013(pa)015:1469: rlung nas lhor blta' bas rgyab 'gros bcas nub kyi rtsa thig dang /
NK013(pa)015:1470: slar yang rlung nas shar du blta' ba rgyab 'gros bcas pas byang gi rtsa thig dang /
NK013(pa)015:1471: me nas nub tu blta' ba rgyab 'gros bcas pas
NK013(pa)015:1472: lho yi rtsa thig ste thig chen brgyad po nam
NK013(pa)015:1473: mkha' gdab bo de yi tshe /
NK013(pa)015:1474: thig skud kyi sgras 'jig rten khams kyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la /
NK013(pa)015:1475: khyed kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i dus yin
NK013(pa)015:1476: no zhes bskul bas nam mkhas khyab tshad zhi khro
NK013(pa)015:1477: rab 'byams kyi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs lhun gyis grub
NK013(pa)015:1480: phyogs mtshams 'di dag kyang phyogs dkyil 'khor dang bstun te /
NK013(pa)015:1482: 'jig rten pa'i phyogs ma nor ba dgos so //
NK013(pa)015:1484: dam tshig gi thig dri zhim po'i spos chal gyis byug pas sa la thig chen brgyad btab nas /
NK013(pa)015:1485: 'gying phur lte bar btsug sa la zlum bskor skor ba nas thig gi las ni /
NK013(pa)015:1487: bla ma rdo rje sems la 'dud //
NK013(pa)015:1489: thig gi rim pa bshad par bya //
NK013(pa)015:1490: stegs bu ji ltar mtshams pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:1491: dbus mtho mtha' gzhol 'joms zhing snyoms //
NK013(pa)015:1492: shar lho shin tu gzhol mi bya //
NK013(pa)015:1493: tshe dang nor la gnod pa yin //
NK013(pa)015:1494: des na kun nas gru bzhir bya //
NK013(pa)015:1495: slob dpon slob ma nub shar du //
NK013(pa)015:1496: sngar bzhin gnas nas stegs de la //
NK013(pa)015:1497: dang po shar nub tshangs thig gdab //
NK013(pa)015:1498: de yi dbus su mtshan ma bya //
NK013(pa)015:1499: de ni dkyil 'khor dbus yin no //
NK013(pa)015:1500: dbus nas shar nub tshad mnyam pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:1501: mtshan ma byas pa brkyang ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:1502: lho byang gnyis su bya rjes bya //
NK013(pa)015:1503: de steng tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab //
NK013(pa)015:1504: de bzhin lho byang tshangs thig la'ang //
NK013(pa)015:1505: shar nub lta bu'i mtshan ma bya //
NK013(pa)015:1506: phyogs bzhir mtshan ma'i steng bzung bas //
NK013(pa)015:1507: zur bzhir bya rjes mtshan ma bya //
NK013(pa)015:1508: de steng zur thig gnyis po gdab //
NK013(pa)015:1509: kun nas gru bzhir gyur de la //
NK013(pa)015:1510: ji ltar shong ba'i zlum bskor bya //
NK013(pa)015:1511: de ni me ri'i phyi yin no //
NK013(pa)015:1512: lte ba nas bzung de yi bar //
NK013(pa)015:1513: zur thig steng nas ang+ku bcas //
NK013(pa)015:1514: cha ni bcu drug dag tu bgo //
NK013(pa)015:1515: de yi bco lnga me ri'i nang //
NK013(pa)015:1516: de yi cha phran gcig dang gnyis //
NK013(pa)015:1517: slar yang cha phran gcig bcas pa //
NK013(pa)015:1518: rdo rwa pad+mas rtsibs rten bri //
NK013(pa)015:1519: bcu gsum ngos na mda' yab kyi //
NK013(pa)015:1520: logs thig bzhi pos gru bzhir bcad //
NK013(pa)015:1521: mda' thig nas ni lte ba'i bar //
NK013(pa)015:1522: cha bzhir bgegs la gsum po ni //
NK013(pa)015:1523: nang gi lha gnas nyid yin no //
NK013(pa)015:1524: bzhi pa rtsa thig nyid shes bya //
NK013(pa)015:1525: mda' thig dang ni rtsa thig bar //
NK013(pa)015:1526: phyed bgos cha chen gnyis 'byung ngo //
NK013(pa)015:1527: nang ma dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab //
NK013(pa)015:1529: cha chen phyi ma phyed du bgo //
NK013(pa)015:1530: phyi ma de yang phyed du bcad //
NK013(pa)015:1531: d+r+wa phyed shar bu mda' yab 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:1532: sgo thig phyir du rtsa thig nas //
NK013(pa)015:1533: rta bab phyi thig bar du ni //
NK013(pa)015:1534: tshangs thig g.yas g.yon cha chen ni //
NK013(pa)015:1535: gnyis gnyis nang ma phyed gdab cing //
NK013(pa)015:1536: phyi ma phyed gdab phyi ma ni //
NK013(pa)015:1537: cha bzhir dgos pas sgo 'khyud dang //
NK013(pa)015:1538: sgo 'gram sgo log mun pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:1539: ka ba ka ba'i rgyan rnams 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:1540: ka brgyan mtha' ru cha phran bsnan //
NK013(pa)015:1541: mda' yab phyi rol rta bab la //
NK013(pa)015:1542: snam bu brgyad ma cha chen gsum //
NK013(pa)015:1543: nang ma gnyis po bzhi bzhir bgo //
NK013(pa)015:1544: rta bab snam bu brgyad yin no //
NK013(pa)015:1545: phyi ma dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab //
NK013(pa)015:1547: rta rkang ka rgyan mtha' dang mnyam //
NK013(pa)015:1548: chu skyes dang ni sgrom bu gnyis //
NK013(pa)015:1549: de las cha phran gcig gi ring //
NK013(pa)015:1550: zar tshags de las gnyis kyi thung //
NK013(pa)015:1551: sna 'phyong de las gcig gi ring //
NK013(pa)015:1552: chun 'phyang de las gnyis kyis thung //
NK013(pa)015:1553: shar bu de las gcig gi ring //
NK013(pa)015:1554: de las khyung mgo gcig phyar ro //
NK013(pa)015:1556: rgya tshad cha phran gnyis re ste //
NK013(pa)015:1557: pad+ma'i g.yas g.yon cha phran phyed //
NK013(pa)015:1558: dor sar ri dwags re re bri //
NK013(pa)015:1559: bsil khang 'khyog dgu bya ba'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:1560: snam bu dang po phyed dang bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:1561: gnyis pa gsum pa drug drug go //
NK013(pa)015:1562: bzhi pa la ni bzhi nyid do //
NK013(pa)015:1563: snam bu lnga pa cha phran gsum //
NK013(pa)015:1564: drug pa de ni tshangs rtser sleb //
NK013(pa)015:1565: de rnams phyi ru phyed re bcad //
NK013(pa)015:1566: glang rgyab mig gsum bya 'dod na //
NK013(pa)015:1567: snam bu gsum pa'i phyi thig dang //
NK013(pa)015:1568: tshangs thig 'dzom pa nas bzung ste //
NK013(pa)015:1569: cha phran gnyis kyi dbus ma bskor //
NK013(pa)015:1570: mun pa pa ti'i phyi thig dang //
NK013(pa)015:1571: tshangs thig 'jom pa'i g.yas g.yon du //
NK013(pa)015:1572: cha phran gnyis re phyin pa nas //
NK013(pa)015:1573: cha phran gnyis kyi g.yas g.yon bskor //
NK013(pa)015:1574: de rnams phyi ru cha re bskor /
NK013(pa)015:1577: mda' thig zur nas cha chen phyed //
NK013(pa)015:1578: dor ba'i zlum bskor nang du'ang //
NK013(pa)015:1579: cha phran bskor ba rtsibs rten yin //
NK013(pa)015:1580: rtsa thig dang ni sgo khyud thig /
NK013(pa)015:1581: 'dzoms pa nas bzung rtsibs rten la //
NK013(pa)015:1582: rtse reg g.yas nas g.yon pa bskor //
NK013(pa)015:1583: g.yon nas g.yas pa bskor bar bya /
NK013(pa)015:1585: / 'di ni rdor sems sgyu d+r+wa'i lugs //
NK013(pa)015:1586: nang gi lte ba'i lha gnas la //
NK013(pa)015:1587: khyams kyi lha snam cha chen gcig /
NK013(pa)015:1588: glo 'bur la ni cha phran no //
NK013(pa)015:1589: de nang gru chad yang po 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:1590: zur thig steng gi ang+ku las //
NK013(pa)015:1591: lnga steng rdo rje'i gdung zlum bskor //
NK013(pa)015:1592: gsum steng lte ba'i mu khyud de //
NK013(pa)015:1593: gnyis kar cha phran nang zlum bskor //
NK013(pa)015:1594: de bar thig rtse 'dzom pa yis /
NK013(pa)015:1596: / 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i ri mo dbye //
NK013(pa)015:1597: sgo dang rta bab la sogs pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:1598: ri mo rnam par dbye ba yis //
NK013(pa)015:1600: mkhas pas ma nor zhib mo'i mig /
NK013(pa)015:1601: mthong ba brgyud pa goms pa gces //
NK013(pa)015:1602: dge 'dis lus can mtha' klas pa //
NK013(pa)015:1603: stug po bkod pa nyid 'grub shog /
NK013(pa)015:1604: de yi tshe'ang thig skud mi 'gong bar gal che zhing /
NK013(pa)015:1605: 'gong dgos pa byung tshe h+r+aihzhesa sgra ring po dang /
NK013(pa)015:1606: 'degs pa'i rgyas nam mkhar btegs pa'i 'og tu 'dzul bar mos te /
NK013(pa)015:1607: rab gnas ldan pa'i thig 'gong na /
NK013(pa)015:1608: bde gshegs bskur ba btab dang mtshungs //
NK013(pa)015:1611: slob dpon rdor dril thogs shing pad kor dang bcas
NK013(pa)015:1612: te lha yi nga rgyal gyis g.yas rdo rje thugs
NK013(pa)015:1613: ka dang g.yon dril bu dkur brten pas h+r+aihh+r+aihzhesa brjod
NK013(pa)015:1614: la sgo rnams bye bar bsam la /
NK013(pa)015:1615: thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i gegs su gyur pa thams cad dabye'o //
NK013(pa)015:1616: zhes dri bzang gi chus sgo khang kyi rtsa thig phyis la /
NK013(pa)015:1617: slar yang thig skud la mchod nas /
NK013(pa)015:1618: badz+ra muh zhes thig skud kyi ye shes pa nam mkhar gshegs /
NK013(pa)015:1619: gnyis pa la gsum lha dang /
NK013(pa)015:1623: gong gis bzung ba'ang 'di nyid de dri bzang gi chus gtso bo'i gnas su gru bzhi /
NK013(pa)015:1624: 'khor gnas su zlum po byas te 'bras sam nas mar las bcos pa'i tshom bu bkod de /
NK013(pa)015:1630: ka ya waka tsit+ta tish+tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK013(pa)015:1631: 'khor sngags tshang ma la'ang k+aa ya sogs kyi sngags de btags pas bkod /
NK013(pa)015:1632: lha grangs dang mnyam pa'am phyogs bzhir mchod pa cha bzhi /
NK013(pa)015:1634: rtsa mchod ltar mchod pa cha lnga lngar 'god /
NK013(pa)015:1635: de dag kyang gnas so so nas ma 'khrul par bya zhing mthar gong gi gsal gdab pa'i tshig /
NK013(pa)015:1637: rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni /
NK013(pa)015:1639: btsal kyang rgyal bas mi mnyes so //
NK013(pa)015:1642: phyogs bcu stong khams ye nas dben //
NK013(pa)015:1644: btsal kyang rgyal bas mi mnyes so //
NK013(pa)015:1646: 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
NK013(pa)015:1649: ces brjod de rang gi rdo rje'i lus dang /
NK013(pa)015:1650: de'i rtsa thig rlung gsum gyi cho 'phrul du shar
NK013(pa)015:1651: ba'i phyi nang snod bcud 'khor 'das dag ma dag
NK013(pa)015:1652: thams cad rang byung ye shes kyi rol rtsal /
NK013(pa)015:1653: chos nyid don gyi lhar gnas pa'i byin rlabs chos
NK013(pa)015:1654: can lha yi dkyil 'khor du ye gdod ma nas
NK013(pa)015:1655: gnas pa'i lha don dran pas nges shes bskyed /
NK013(pa)015:1656: slar yang nam mkhar btegs pa'i lha rnams de la thim /
NK013(pa)015:1658: phyi nang gi mchod pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1660: mchod pa rnying pa dag barje /
NK013(pa)015:1664: dang po bshad rgyud rol pa las /
NK013(pa)015:1665: rin chen sna tshogs rgyu las byung //
NK013(pa)015:1666: kha dog dbyibs dang rgyan ldan pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:1667: dkyil 'khor pho brang bzang pa nyid /
NK013(pa)015:1669: / 'bru lnga spos lnga snying po lnga //
NK013(pa)015:1670: rin chen sna lnga sman lnga dag /
NK013(pa)015:1671: nye bar sbyar bas sngags kyi mchod //
NK013(pa)015:1672: kha rgyan 'gul chings bzungs thag bcas //
NK013(pa)015:1673: lnga'am bcu gnyis nyi shu gcig /
NK013(pa)015:1674: rigs kyi mtshan ma grangs bzhin bya //
NK013(pa)015:1675: zhes gsungs pas gser dngul zangs gsum gang rung las grub pa'i bum pa mi gnag cing /
NK013(pa)015:1676: gsus pa che ba lhung bzed kyi dbyibs lta bu /
NK013(pa)015:1680: zhabs zhum pa tshad dang mtshan nyid rdzogs pa lha
NK013(pa)015:1681: yi grangs dang mnyam pa ste yab yum dbyer med
NK013(pa)015:1688: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che /
NK013(pa)015:1690: las te rigs lnga'i bum pa lnga /
NK013(pa)015:1691: dbus su bum gdan dang drug /
NK013(pa)015:1692: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ste bdun nam /
NK013(pa)015:1693: bum gdan phri ba'i bum pa drug shin tu ma
NK013(pa)015:1694: 'dzom na rnam par rgyal ba dang las bum gnyis
NK013(pa)015:1695: te gang yang gtsang zhing dag par byas la /
NK013(pa)015:1696: sum+b+ha nis yungs dkar brab ste bgegs bskrad /
NK013(pa)015:1697: h'u gi glu len pa bcas gu gul gyis bdug ste skyon med par bya /
NK013(pa)015:1698: bsangs chu'i sngags bzla zhing dri bzang dang bsang chu sbyar bas byugs /
NK013(pa)015:1699: kun bzang yab yum gyi sngags bzla bzhin du chu gtsang srog chags med pas sum gnyis par /
NK013(pa)015:1700: bkang ba'i nang du rdzas sum cu so sor ram
NK013(pa)015:1701: cig char du 'debs te rigs lnga yab yum gyi
NK013(pa)015:1702: sngags brjod / phyogs mdog ni na bza' dang mgul chings sems dpa' yab yum sngags kyis dkri /
NK013(pa)015:1703: yal ga lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa'i shing gis sam /
NK013(pa)015:1704: gtsang ma'i r+ts+wa ku shas kha rgyan sgo ba yab yum sngags kyis 'dzugs /
NK013(pa)015:1705: rdo rje rtse dgu la me tog gi phreng ba
NK013(pa)015:1706: skud pa kha dog lnga ldan gyis bsgril ba'i gzungs
NK013(pa)015:1707: pa thag thub drug gi sngags kyis bzhag /
NK013(pa)015:1708: yi ge brgya pa'i sngags bzla zhing mtshan ma 'dogs te /
NK013(pa)015:1709: lha grangs dang mnyam pa'i bum pa la ni sgrub
NK013(pa)015:1710: thabs kyi thugs phyag mtshan bskyed pa nas 'byung ba'i
NK013(pa)015:1711: phyag mtshan so so ma nor bar 'dogs /
NK013(pa)015:1712: dkyil 'khor gyi tshom bu'i lha gsan ltar bkod /
NK013(pa)015:1713: nyer gcig pa la las bum ma gtogs pa'i phyogs bzhir bzhi pa zhi /
NK013(pa)015:1714: dbus su bzhi ste rang mtshan dang /
NK013(pa)015:1715: bcu gnyis pa las bum zur du phyi ba'i phyogs rer gnyis gnyis dang /
NK013(pa)015:1716: lnga pa la shar du 'khor lo /
NK013(pa)015:1719: byang du rgya gram ma ma ral gri /
NK013(pa)015:1720: dbus su rdo rje rnams dang /
NK013(pa)015:1721: bum pa gcig yin na de thams cad kyi mtshan ma /
NK013(pa)015:1722: las thams cad kyi bum par sna tshogs rdo rje
NK013(pa)015:1723: rnams bkod la de dag dkyil 'khor gyi dbus dang
NK013(pa)015:1724: phyogs bzhir ku sha'i gdan la gnas ma 'chol bar
NK013(pa)015:1725: bzhag / mchod pa lha grangs mnyam pa'am /
NK013(pa)015:1726: shar du chu brgyad lho yi char //
NK013(pa)015:1727: me tog bzhi dang lho nub tu //
NK013(pa)015:1728: spos bzhi nub tu mar me bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:1729: nub byang ngos su dri chab bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:1730: byang du zhal zas rnam pa bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:1731: byang shar mtshams 'dzin me tog bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:1732: de dag shar du gtor ma dang //
NK013(pa)015:1733: slob dpon mdun du sman rnams bkod //
NK013(pa)015:1734: mdun du thod pa'i nang dag tu //
