NK013(pa)015:1735: sngar gyi chag chag btab pa'i lhag /
NK013(pa)015:1736: dri bzang sum cu'i rdzas ldan blugs //
NK013(pa)015:1738: sgrub thabs nas 'byung ba'i mchod pa byin rlabs bya /
NK013(pa)015:1739: gnyis pa ni bum pa rgyas 'bring la rim gyis bskyed pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1740: bum pa bsdus pa la cig char du bskyed pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:1742: 'og tu 'byung ba'i bum pa bskyed pa zin nas /
NK013(pa)015:1743: de 'dra'i bum pa nyer lnga pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:1744: dang po'i nang du pad zla nyi ma rin po che seng ges btegs pa'i khril /
NK013(pa)015:1747: bcom ldan 'das dpal thugs sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:1749: bum pa gnyis pa'i nang nas lnga pa'i bar du /
NK013(pa)015:1750: glang rta rma bya mkha' lding gis btegs pa'i khri
NK013(pa)015:1751: pad nyi zla ba lnga brtsegs kyi shar bum du
NK013(pa)015:1754: gzugs phung dang gti mug nas 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)015:1765: 'du byed kyi phung po dang sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:1767: bum pa drug pa nas bcu gsum pa'i bar gyi
NK013(pa)015:1768: nang du khri chung pad nyi zla ba bzhi brtsegs
NK013(pa)015:1769: re la / phyogs bzhir nang sems bzhi ni nas /
NK013(pa)015:1770: don yod grub pa'i thugs dang sku las skyes pa /
NK013(pa)015:1771: mtshams bzhir phyi sems bzhi ni nas /
NK013(pa)015:1772: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o //
NK013(pa)015:1773: bum pa bcu bzhi pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1774: bco lnga pa shar nub tu gnas pa'i nang pad nyi zla ba sum brtsegs kyi gdan la /
NK013(pa)015:1775: rtog tshogs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du shar bas sogs /
NK013(pa)015:1780: bum pa bcu drug pa nas nyer gcig pa'i bar
NK013(pa)015:1781: gyi nang du pad rkyang re la thub drug ni
NK013(pa)015:1785: bum pa nyer gnyis nas nyer lnga pa'i bar gyi
NK013(pa)015:1786: nang du nyi rkyang re la sgo ba bzhi ni
NK013(pa)015:1792: rol pa khro bo'i chas thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
NK013(pa)015:1793: de thams cad rdo rje'i sku'o //
NK013(pa)015:1794: las thams cad pa'i bum par /
NK013(pa)015:1796: nyer gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:1797: lnga pa dang phal cher mtshungs te lag len mdzad pa nyung bas ma bkod de /
NK013(pa)015:1798: 'bring po lnga pa'i lugs la rten bum pa bskyed pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:1801: kro d+hi shwa ri h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:1804: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma dang /
NK013(pa)015:1805: a las zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du b+h+r+aum las
NK013(pa)015:1806: byung ba'i rin po che'i bum pa lto ba ldir
NK013(pa)015:1811: lha rdzas kyi gos kyis mgul chings dang /
NK013(pa)015:1812: dpag bsam shing gis kha brgyan pa'i nang snying po thams cad kyis yongs su gdab /
NK013(pa)015:1813: ta p+te ta p+te ma h+aa ta ste s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:1814: la yi chu bo gang+g+aa dal gyis 'bab pas yongs su gang bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1816: de 'dra'i bum pa lnga yi dbus ma'i nang du seng khri pad nyi zla ba lnga brtsegs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1817: pad nyi zla ba sum brtsegs gnyis dang /
NK013(pa)015:1818: pad rkyang drug la rim pa bzhin /
NK013(pa)015:1822: thub drug gi sngags brjod la /
NK013(pa)015:1823: dbus su mi bskyod rdo rje mthing //
NK013(pa)015:1824: dbu gsum mthing dkar dmar ba'i zhal //
NK013(pa)015:1825: phyag drug g.yas gsum rdo rje dang /
NK013(pa)015:1828: dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon /
NK013(pa)015:1829: rdo rje dbyings phyug yum dang sbyor //
NK013(pa)015:1830: de yi nub dang shar dag tu //
NK013(pa)015:1831: kun bzang mthing ka rdo rje 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:1832: bzang mo dkar mo chos 'byung phyag /
NK013(pa)015:1833: shar lho byang lho nub byang dang //
NK013(pa)015:1834: lho nub byang shar phyogs rnams su //
NK013(pa)015:1835: brgya phyin dkar po pi wang 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:1836: sh+aaka thub ser po spar bsreg bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1837: dam brten dmar po glegs bam 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:1838: kha 'bar ljang gu zhal zas bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1839: thag bzang sngon po go cha 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:1840: chos rgyal nag po me chu bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1841: de rnams mi bskyod cod pan can //
NK013(pa)015:1842: shar bum du glang po che'i khri pad nyi zla ba lnga brtsegs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1843: khri chung pad nyi zla ba sum brtsegs gnyis /
NK013(pa)015:1844: nyi rkyang bcas pa'i gdan la /
NK013(pa)015:1847: sa snying yab yum dang byams pa'i sngags yab yum /
NK013(pa)015:1848: gshin rje gshed yab yum bcas pa'i sngags brjod /
NK013(pa)015:1849: de dbus rnam par snang mdzad dkar //
NK013(pa)015:1850: dbu gsum dkar mthing dmar ba'i zhal //
NK013(pa)015:1851: phyag drug g.yas gsum 'khor lo dang //
NK013(pa)015:1852: rdo rje rin chen 'bar ba bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1853: dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon //
NK013(pa)015:1854: sangs rgyas spyan dang gnyis med 'khril //
NK013(pa)015:1855: sa snying dkar mo la se yum //
NK013(pa)015:1856: myu gu dril 'dzin rdo rje bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1857: byams pa dkar mo d+h+au pe yum //
NK013(pa)015:1858: klu shing dril 'dzin bdug spos bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1859: gshin rje mthing nag 'dzin gyed yum //
NK013(pa)015:1860: thod dbyug dug khrag lcags kyu bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1861: de rnams rnam snang cod pan can //
NK013(pa)015:1862: lho bum du rta mchog khri pad nyi zla ba lnga brtsegs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1863: khri chung pad nyi zla ba sum brtsegs gnyis /
NK013(pa)015:1864: nyi rkyang bcas pa'i gdan la /
NK013(pa)015:1869: stobs po che yab yum rnams sngags brjod /
NK013(pa)015:1870: de dbus rin chen 'byung ldan ser //
NK013(pa)015:1871: dbu gsum ser dkar dmar ba'i zhal //
NK013(pa)015:1872: phyag drug g.yas gsum rin chen dang //
NK013(pa)015:1873: rdo rje rtse lnga 'khor lo bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1874: dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon //
NK013(pa)015:1875: m+aa m+aa ki dang gnyis med 'khril //
NK013(pa)015:1876: nam snying ser po m+aa l+yee yum //
NK013(pa)015:1877: ral gri dril 'dzin phreng ba bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1878: sgrib sel ser po push+pe yum /
NK013(pa)015:1881: stobs chen ser nag 'dren byed yum //
NK013(pa)015:1882: rdor dbyug thod khrad zhags pa 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:1883: de rnams rin 'byung cod pan can //
NK013(pa)015:1884: nub bum du rma bya'i khri pad nyi zla ba lnga brtsegs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1885: khri chung pad nyi zla ba sum brtsegs dang nyi rkyang bcas pa'i gdan la /
NK013(pa)015:1888: kun bzang yab yum spyan gzigs yab yum rta mgrin yab yum bcas pa'i sngags brjod /
NK013(pa)015:1889: de dbus snang ba mtha' yas dmar //
NK013(pa)015:1890: dbu gsum dmar dkar mthing nag zhal //
NK013(pa)015:1891: phyag drug g.yas gsum pad+ma dang //
NK013(pa)015:1893: dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon //
NK013(pa)015:1894: gos dkar mo dang gnyis med 'khril //
NK013(pa)015:1895: kun bzang dmar mo d+ai p+aam yum //
NK013(pa)015:1896: snye ma dril 'dzin mar me bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1897: spyan gzigs dmar mo girti yum //
NK013(pa)015:1899: rta mgrin dmar nag 'ching byed yum //
NK013(pa)015:1900: be con dung khrag lcags sgrog bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:1901: de rnams snang mtha'i cod pan can //
NK013(pa)015:1902: byang bum du nam mkha' lding gi khri pad nyi zla ba lnga brtsegs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1903: khri chung pad nyi zla ba sum brtsegs dang /
NK013(pa)015:1904: nyi rkyang bcas pa'i gdan la /
NK013(pa)015:1909: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yab yum rnams kyi sngags brjod la /
NK013(pa)015:1910: de dbus don yod grub pa ljang //
NK013(pa)015:1911: dbu gsum ljang dkar dmar ba'i zhal //
NK013(pa)015:1912: phyag drug g.yas gsum ral gri dang //
NK013(pa)015:1914: dril bu rin chen pad+ma g.yon //
NK013(pa)015:1915: dam tshig sgrol ma gnyis med 'khril //
NK013(pa)015:1916: phyag rdor ljang ku nirti yum //
NK013(pa)015:1917: rdo rje dril 'dzin zhal zas bsnams /
NK013(pa)015:1921: bdud rtsi ljang nag brlag byed yum //
NK013(pa)015:1922: rgya gram thod khrag dril bu 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:1923: de rnams don grub cod pan can //
NK013(pa)015:1924: las thams cad pa'i bum pa sna tshogs rdo rjes
NK013(pa)015:1925: mtshan pa'i nang du nyi gdan la h'u las sna
NK013(pa)015:1926: tshogs rdo rje h'u gis mtshan pa yongs su gyur
NK013(pa)015:1927: pa las / h'u big+h+n+aan+ra ta kritra phata /
NK013(pa)015:1928: khro bo mi 'chi thab sbyor ljang nag la /
NK013(pa)015:1929: rgya gram dril bu 'dzin cing khro chas rdzogs //
NK013(pa)015:1930: dbu skra dmar ser rab 'bar gyad 'dor stabs //
NK013(pa)015:1931: nyi ma'i gdan la 'gying zhing rol pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:1932: rnam bum rnams la lnga tshan lngas bskur /
NK013(pa)015:1933: las bum las rigs bdag por byas pa'i rigs lngas dbang bskur /
NK013(pa)015:1934: gnas lnga byin gyis brlab bo //
NK013(pa)015:1939: phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod /
NK013(pa)015:1940: zhi ba'i glu drug gis bstod /
NK013(pa)015:1942: 'jigs pa'i h+aum sgra nges sgrog cing //
NK013(pa)015:1943: bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms mdzad pa //
NK013(pa)015:1944: dngos grub ma lus stsol ba'i slad //
NK013(pa)015:1945: bgegs kyi dgra la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK013(pa)015:1950: de dbus seng glang rta rma bya //
NK013(pa)015:1951: mkha' lding khri pad nyi zla lnga //
NK013(pa)015:1952: rin chen khri pad nyi zla brgyad //
NK013(pa)015:1953: pad nyi zla ba sum brtsegs gnyis //
NK013(pa)015:1954: pad rkyang drug dang nyi rkyang bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:1955: rang rang lha yi gdan gyi steng //
NK013(pa)015:1963: k+shim trum srum pram k+sham ye /
NK013(pa)015:1966: 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las so so'i phyag mtshan sa bon gyis mtshan par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1972: sogs zhi ba bzhi bcu zhe gnyis kyi sngags brjod la /
NK013(pa)015:1973: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
NK013(pa)015:1974: te bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
NK013(pa)015:1975: 'khor lo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1976: 'khor la rgyal po rgyal mo dang /
NK013(pa)015:1980: las thams cad pa'i bum pa nas 'gying zhing rol pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:1988: bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer gzungs thag la 'khril te song bas gtso bo'i thugs dam rgyud bskul /
NK013(pa)015:1989: de'i 'od zer 'khor rnams la phog pas /
NK013(pa)015:1990: yab yum thams cad kyi thabs shes bde chen byang chub sems kyi 'od kyis kun la khyab /
NK013(pa)015:1991: de dag gi byin rlabs kyang gtso bo yab yum gyi thugs kar 'dus /
NK013(pa)015:1992: de dag gi sku las bde chen ye shes kyi bdud rtsir bab pas bum pa gang bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:1993: pad bskor dang gar bskor bsgrags gzungs thag slob dpon gyi thugs kar 'dzin /
NK013(pa)015:1995: kun bzang yab yum bcas brgya rtsa re /
NK013(pa)015:1996: 'khor la mar phyed res nyung bar bya ste lnga bcu re bzla /
NK013(pa)015:1997: mthar gtso sngags lan bdun bzlas nas thod chu bum nang du phul nas /
NK013(pa)015:1999: lha thams cad kyang chags pa chen po'i ye shes
NK013(pa)015:2000: kyi bdud rtsir zhu ba bum chu dang ro gcig
NK013(pa)015:2001: tu gyur / slob dpon gyis pad bskor bcas me tog dkar po bum pa'i nang du 'bul /
NK013(pa)015:2002: las rdor gyis bdug spos bdug ste /
NK013(pa)015:2003: slob dpon gyi logs su stegs la gral thabs su bkod par gsungs so //
NK013(pa)015:2004: yang bum pa lnga pa la'ang 'di ltar byas na 'thus pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:2006: thams cad rang rig ye shes phyir /
NK013(pa)015:2007: gtso bo 'pho yang mi dgos so //
NK013(pa)015:2008: zhes kyang yig rnying las gsungs so /
NK013(pa)015:2010: / 'dir o rgyan gter bdag gling pas /
NK013(pa)015:2013: bsgrub pa dngos grub kyi dbang len rnams la bum pa nges par dgos med /
NK013(pa)015:2014: sgrub mchod tsam la nges par mi dgos kyang 'grub na legs so //
NK013(pa)015:2016: mchod rdzas rnying pa rnams dor /
NK013(pa)015:2018: slar yang mchod pa bshams te /
NK013(pa)015:2020: slob ma sta gon gyi chas rnams stegs la 'du bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2021: gsum pa slob ma lhag par gnas pa sta gon gyi cho ga la /
NK013(pa)015:2022: gsang ba spyi rgyud las gsungs pa ltar snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma 'du byas la /
NK013(pa)015:2023: dbang gi cho ga las 'byung ba ltar rjes 'dzin bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2024: slob ma sta gon zin phral /
NK013(pa)015:2025: lha lta gon gyi 'jug bsdu ba'i phyir /
NK013(pa)015:2026: sgrub thabs nas byung ba'i mchod pa byin rlabs phyi nang gsang ba sngags tsam gyi mchod /
NK013(pa)015:2028: slob dpon gtso bo gnyis pa'i tshul gyis shar sgor bzheng ste /
NK013(pa)015:2031: grogs dang bcas pas sta gon gyi dkyil 'khor btegs
NK013(pa)015:2032: pa'i gsol btab dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di skad do
NK013(pa)015:2033: // mgon po kun mkhyen bdag nyid can //
NK013(pa)015:2034: gcig dang du ma spros bral cing //
NK013(pa)015:2035: ma lus bdag nyid dgongs su gsol //
NK013(pa)015:2036: khyed rnams mos shing mchod pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:2037: khams gsum yongs su gzung bya zhing //
NK013(pa)015:2038: rang bzhin mnyam par bya ba'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:2039: che ge mo bdag dkyil 'khor gyi //
NK013(pa)015:2040: las rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyi //
NK013(pa)015:2041: thugs rjes nges par dgongs nas kyang //
NK013(pa)015:2042: dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlabs nas ni //
NK013(pa)015:2043: sa gzhi yongs su bzungs bar mdzod //
NK013(pa)015:2048: sta gon gyi lha nam mkhar gshegs par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:2050: bzhi pa tshon gyi bya ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:2051: lnga pa bri ba la thun mong du /
NK013(pa)015:2052: dgos ched rgyu grangs rab gnas dang /
NK013(pa)015:2053: dbye lugs nyes po spong ba drug /
NK013(pa)015:2055: ma mthong rmongs la bstan phyir tshon //
NK013(pa)015:2057: gzhi sems nyid ye nas ye shes lnga dang /
NK013(pa)015:2058: 'bras bu rang bzhin lhun grub 'og min na bzhugs
NK013(pa)015:2059: pa mthar phyin sku dang ye shes ma mthong rmongs
NK013(pa)015:2060: pa'i gdul bya la bstan pa'i phyir ro //
NK013(pa)015:2064: pu sha r+aa ga byu ru bzang //
NK013(pa)015:2065: ma rga ta las byas pa dbye //
NK013(pa)015:2066: zhes pa ltar rin chen lnga'i phye ma dang /
NK013(pa)015:2068: 'bras s+aa lu'am nas sogs 'bru tshon sna lngas kha dog bsgyur ba ste /
NK013(pa)015:2070: 'bras dang s+aa lu la sogs pa /
NK013(pa)015:2071: kha dog bsgyur ba de bzhin no //
NK013(pa)015:2073: tha ma bkra shis pa'i yul phyogs nas byung bas tshon kha dog sna lnga pa'am /
NK013(pa)015:2075: rdo dkar phye mar byas pa kha dog lnga pa sogs so //
NK013(pa)015:2076: gsum pa sgyu 'phrul zhi ba rgyas pa la /
NK013(pa)015:2077: tshon sna nyi shu rtsa lnga ste /
NK013(pa)015:2078: mthing dkar ser dmar ljang ba'i kha dog lnga re re la'ang /
NK013(pa)015:2084: 'dir zhi ba 'bring po'i lugs kyi rdul tshon kha dog lnga pa ste /
NK013(pa)015:2085: de la ji ltar bya ba /
NK013(pa)015:2086: rdo phye btag brdung chur bsings btul //
NK013(pa)015:2087: dar gyi tshags mas btsag par bya //
NK013(pa)015:2088: dmar rtsi 'bri mog yang na skag /
NK013(pa)015:2089: 'o shang gis brlan byugs pa de //
NK013(pa)015:2090: nyi 'od la bsregs ma skam tsam //
NK013(pa)015:2091: sa bsres rang mdog ma lon par //
NK013(pa)015:2092: legs par mnyes pas dmar legs 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:2093: de bla na ma bral kha khug byed //
NK013(pa)015:2094: rdo zho dang sbyar bya rdo mer //
NK013(pa)015:2095: bsregs pa grang dus brdung phye 'phul //
NK013(pa)015:2096: mthing gi mdang 'od zil gyis gnon //
NK013(pa)015:2097: ram btul de dang sa sbyar nas //
NK013(pa)015:2099: ba mos ma reg ston dus kyi //
NK013(pa)015:2100: spang rgyan mnyed btub byas pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:2101: rtse mo'i cha rnams zhib mor brdung //
NK013(pa)015:2102: de dang sa bsres slar brdungs nas //
NK013(pa)015:2103: nyi ma'i 'od du mnye zhing bsregs //
NK013(pa)015:2104: lag gnyis lan gsum bskyur ba na //
NK013(pa)015:2105: kha dog sngon po phyi bzhin legs //
NK013(pa)015:2106: de la rdo zho btul po ni //
NK013(pa)015:2107: zhib btags cung zad btab byas nas //
NK013(pa)015:2108: btud cing mnye nas nyi 'od la //
NK013(pa)015:2109: bsreg pas kha dog ljang ku 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:2110: gro ljang gzhon nu h+aa la'i 'dab //
NK013(pa)015:2111: sran ma zhon nu sogs brdung nas //
NK013(pa)015:2112: sa bsres mnye zhing nyi mar skam /
NK013(pa)015:2115: yung ba zhib btags zho sbyar nas //
NK013(pa)015:2116: sa dkar bsres pas grib skam bya //
NK013(pa)015:2117: gtso ma gser gyi kha dog 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:2118: yang ni rdo zho'am bul tog dang //
NK013(pa)015:2119: sbyar bas ngur smrig bzang po 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:2120: gro phye snum sbyar mer bsregs na //
NK013(pa)015:2121: mig sman mdog dang rnam par mtshungs //
NK013(pa)015:2125: h'u shar du dkar po la /
NK013(pa)015:2135: mthar phyi nang gi mchod pas bskor /
NK013(pa)015:2136: mdun stegs la sman gtor bkod /
NK013(pa)015:2138: stong pa'i ngang las nyi zla'i gdan lnga'i steng du /
NK013(pa)015:2140: thigs skud ces pa'i tshab tu rdul tshon la thim dpa' bo 'bru lngar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:2141: slar yang nyi zla'i gdan lnga'i steng rang gi thugs ka nas /
NK013(pa)015:2146: 'og min nas sa bon gyi tshogs bkrag /
NK013(pa)015:2148: badz+ra sa m+aa ya dzah tshon la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK013(pa)015:2149: 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyi rdzi ma bskyod bzhin par /
NK013(pa)015:2150: rang gi mig gnyis sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:2156: yab yum sbrel ba'i sngags bdun bdun bdun bsnyen /
NK013(pa)015:2158: +aahsarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye h+aum h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:2161: lha rnams 'od du zhu bas rin po che'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul tshon 'bar bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:2162: bden pa dri ma med gang gi //
NK013(pa)015:2163: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis //
NK013(pa)015:2164: sems can la brtse'i bden pa des //
NK013(pa)015:2165: phra mo'i rdul tshon 'bar gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:2167: g.yon bskor gyis rdo rjes rdul tshon dbyi bar bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2168: dbang phyug rgyas pa'i chas su zhugs te /
NK013(pa)015:2169: dkyil 'khor gyi lte khung du tshon sna lnga rigs bsdeb pa /
NK013(pa)015:2174: ser ba'i rim po lnga 'byung ba rim brtsegs su sgom la /
NK013(pa)015:2176: slar yang g.yas pa'i theb srin gyi tshon rtsi lnga cung zad blangs pa g.yon mthil du bzhag la /
NK013(pa)015:2177: tshon byin rlabs kyi sngags bzlas la /
NK013(pa)015:2178: don ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i rtags rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i ri rab tu gyur /
NK013(pa)015:2179: chos rnams bdag sems rtog byas nas //
NK013(pa)015:2180: byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:2181: shin tu dkar ba'i mdog tu bstan //
NK013(pa)015:2182: de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog /
NK013(pa)015:2183: chos rnams sems su mngon chags pa //
NK013(pa)015:2184: pad+ma r+aa ga zhes brjod de //
NK013(pa)015:2185: chags dang chags par bya ba med //
NK013(pa)015:2186: chags med phyir na dmar po'o //
NK013(pa)015:2187: yon tan gter ldan zad mi shes //
NK013(pa)015:2188: thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te //
NK013(pa)015:2189: dbyings nyid mi zad gter yin pas //
NK013(pa)015:2190: kha dog gser gyi mdog tu bstan /
NK013(pa)015:2192: / 'khrul snang phyin ci log rnams la //
NK013(pa)015:2193: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK013(pa)015:2194: dbyings bsdud las rnams rdzogs mdzad pas //
NK013(pa)015:2195: kun tu las kun ljang gu'i mdog /
NK013(pa)015:2196: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la //
NK013(pa)015:2197: cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med //
NK013(pa)015:2198: kha dog nag po'i dngos dang bzhin //
NK013(pa)015:2199: de nyid mtshon phyir mthing gar bstan //
NK013(pa)015:2200: zhes tshon gyis dag dran bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2201: slar dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
NK013(pa)015:2202: brtsig pa phyi nas ljang dmar ser dkar mthing cha
NK013(pa)015:2203: phran lnga yi tshad du snyams pa sgo tshad gcig
NK013(pa)015:2204: gi tshad tsam du bris te k+aa p+aa las bkab
NK013(pa)015:2205: nas bzhag / 'di ni dbang ldan nas bgegs mi 'jug pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:2206: dngos grub kyi 'bras bu thob pa la bar chad yod med brtags pa ste /
NK013(pa)015:2207: de yan chod nub gnyis pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:2208: nang par rtsig pa sprel ran pa nam kha phye la pra brtag ste /
NK013(pa)015:2210: re kha dma' bas mi 'grub cing //
NK013(pa)015:2211: yon pos gdung ba bskyed par byed //
NK013(pa)015:2212: chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag /
NK013(pa)015:2214: chad lhag las ni nang 'byung zhing //
NK013(pa)015:2216: zhes gsungs pa ltar shes par bya zhing /
NK013(pa)015:2217: skyon thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis sel ba yin no //
NK013(pa)015:2218: lnga pa nang par slob dpon slob ma dang bcas
NK013(pa)015:2219: pas bdag gi rnal 'byor bsdus pa bsdu ldang bcas
NK013(pa)015:2220: grub phral slob dpon gyi phyag byin gyis brlab ste
NK013(pa)015:2221: lag sor rigs lnga yab yum bcur par bsam /
NK013(pa)015:2222: slob mas kyang lag pa byin rlabs nas tshon gyi bri tshul /
NK013(pa)015:2223: dbus kyi lte ba mthing ka la //
NK013(pa)015:2224: de yi mu khyud sna lnga'i phreng //
NK013(pa)015:2225: mthing skya dkar ser dmar ljang ngo //
NK013(pa)015:2226: rtsibs mchan gru chad glo bur dang //
NK013(pa)015:2227: bar khyams sgo dang ka bar bcas //
NK013(pa)015:2228: phyogs mdog rtsibs brten mu khyud ni //
NK013(pa)015:2229: rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba la //
NK013(pa)015:2230: phyogs rer gnyis gnyis ka ba brgyad /
NK013(pa)015:2233: ral gri rnams kyi mtshan ma bri //
NK013(pa)015:2234: rtsig pa rim pa lnga sbrag ste /
NK013(pa)015:2236: / 'dod snam dmar ba'i gzhi dag gi //
NK013(pa)015:2237: sgo dang sgo khyud grwa bzhi mtshams //
NK013(pa)015:2238: zla phyed la gnas rin po che //
NK013(pa)015:2239: dmar po la ni rdo rjes mtshan //
NK013(pa)015:2240: phyogs rer me long dkar po dang //
NK013(pa)015:2241: pi wam sngon po spos khang ser //
NK013(pa)015:2242: zhal zas dmar po snod ser ba //
NK013(pa)015:2243: reg bya ljang gu lhab lhub 'phur //
NK013(pa)015:2244: cha res mdzes par brgyan par bya //
NK013(pa)015:2245: pha gu ser po d+r+wa ba'i gzhi //
NK013(pa)015:2246: nag po la gnas d+r+wa ba ser //
NK013(pa)015:2247: d+r+wa phyed dril bu zla ba dang //
NK013(pa)015:2248: rnga yab rlung gis bskyod pas brgyan //
NK013(pa)015:2249: d+r+wa phyed mgo de ser mgo bya //
NK013(pa)015:2250: mdzes gdung rin chen phra tshom can //
NK013(pa)015:2251: mnan pa'i ka thung nyer brgyad pa //
NK013(pa)015:2252: gzhi sngo dag la shar bu dkar //
NK013(pa)015:2253: mda' yab dkar po mchod rten ris //
NK013(pa)015:2254: pad+ma'i gdan la zur bzhi ru //
NK013(pa)015:2255: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
NK013(pa)015:2256: rdo rje'i 'phan bcas phyogs re ru //
NK013(pa)015:2257: brgyad brgyad sna tshogs mdog tu bya //
NK013(pa)015:2258: rgyal mtshan ba dan gnas pa'i gzhi //
NK013(pa)015:2259: bum pa dag nas ser po bya /
NK013(pa)015:2261: / 'khyog dgu'i glang rgyab mun par bcas //
NK013(pa)015:2262: nag po bya zhing glang rgyab gzhung //
NK013(pa)015:2263: seng mgo d+r+wa ba dkar pos brgyan //
NK013(pa)015:2264: rta babs dag la snam bu brgyad //
NK013(pa)015:2265: rta rkang sngo skyar rdo rje yi /
NK013(pa)015:2267: / 'greng bu sngo zhing chu skyes dmar //
NK013(pa)015:2268: sgrom ni mdzes tshon zar tshags dkar //
NK013(pa)015:2269: gzhi nag sna 'phyong phra can ser //
NK013(pa)015:2270: sgril 'phyang gzhi nag d+r+wa ba ser //
NK013(pa)015:2271: shar bu dkar po sngon po'i gzhi //
NK013(pa)015:2272: rgya phub khyung mgo mthing ka la //
NK013(pa)015:2273: mda' yab ris te pad+ma dmar /
NK013(pa)015:2275: / 'khor lo ser po ri dwags ni //
NK013(pa)015:2276: ser skya steng gi gdungs dkar po /
NK013(pa)015:2279: gzhi yi phyi khyams ljang gu la //
NK013(pa)015:2280: sna tshogs pa tra ris su bya //
NK013(pa)015:2281: rtsibs rten ser po'i phyi rol du //
NK013(pa)015:2282: me tog 'dab ma sna tshogs bya //
NK013(pa)015:2283: rdo rwa gzhi mthing rdo rje ser //
NK013(pa)015:2284: me ri sna tshogs mdog can gyi //
NK013(pa)015:2285: pa tra'i ser khong nag pos len //
NK013(pa)015:2286: dkar po'i ri mos bcad par bya //
NK013(pa)015:2287: sgo yi phyi rol g.yas g.yon du //
NK013(pa)015:2288: bzhi bzhi phyogs rer brgyad re bcas //
NK013(pa)015:2290: so gnyis tshang bar bya dgos gsungs //
NK013(pa)015:2291: de phar la 'dab gyin bstan cing //
NK013(pa)015:2292: me tog 'bras bu mngon brgyan pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:2293: dpag bsam shing ni de yi grangs //
NK013(pa)015:2294: t+aa la ljang ser dpag bsam sngo //
NK013(pa)015:2295: rtsa ba dmar skya mu tig dang //
NK013(pa)015:2296: gser gyi d+r+wa ba dril bus sbrel //
NK013(pa)015:2297: rtsa bar rin chen phung po dang //
NK013(pa)015:2298: khrus rdzing de yi grangs sam bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:2299: phyogs rer bri bar bya bar gsungs //
NK013(pa)015:2301: re kha dma' bas mi 'grub cing //
NK013(pa)015:2302: yon pos gdung ba bskyed par byed //
NK013(pa)015:2303: chad na thig dang mtshungs pa ste //
NK013(pa)015:2304: phyogs 'khrul bas ni gnyis ka nyams //
NK013(pa)015:2305: tshon rtsi srab na dbul por 'gyur /
NK013(pa)015:2308: tshon thal shor na nad rim 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:2309: de phyir skyon rnams spong ste bya //
NK013(pa)015:2310: drug pa rnam pa 'god pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:2312: sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas //
NK013(pa)015:2313: rnam grol rim par thob gyur na //
NK013(pa)015:2314: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs pas //
NK013(pa)015:2315: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
NK013(pa)015:2316: zhes gsungs pas rin po che'am sa sogs las byas pa'i sku rten dang /
NK013(pa)015:2317: ri mor bris pa'i tsaka li sogs lha gnas su ma 'chol bar dgod /
NK013(pa)015:2318: med na tshon gyis dal byas par rab sku yongs rdzogs /
NK013(pa)015:2320: dal bsdus bar tha ma yig 'bru /
NK013(pa)015:2321: yang tha lha rang mdog dang mtshungs pa'i thig le'i tshon spungs bya ba'am /
NK013(pa)015:2324: phal pa la yig 'bru bkod pa yang yod de 'dir slob dpon pad+ma'i lugs kyis /
NK013(pa)015:2325: rigs lnga la sku gsung thugs gsum 'god sems dpa' rnams la thugs dang gsung dgod /
NK013(pa)015:2326: thub pa khro bo la gsung ngam thugs sam re re dgod gsungs pas de yi dbang du na /
NK013(pa)015:2327: dbus su seng khri pad nyi zla //
NK013(pa)015:2328: mi bskyod mthing dkar dmar ba'i zhal //
NK013(pa)015:2329: phyag drug dang gnyis rdo rje dang //
NK013(pa)015:2330: dril bu thugs kar bsnol g.yas lhag /
NK013(pa)015:2331: 'khor lo rin chen g.yon lhag na //
NK013(pa)015:2333: dbyings phyug mthing ka dril bsnams 'khyud //
NK013(pa)015:2334: h'u m+aum yi ges rab tu mtshan //
NK013(pa)015:2335: des mtshon te sgrub thabs su shes par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2336: tshon lhag la phyi nang gsang bas mchod /
NK013(pa)015:2338: badz+ra muh sa ye shes pa rnams nam mkha'i lha yi thugs kar gshegs /
NK013(pa)015:2339: de nyid dben par bskyal lo //
NK013(pa)015:2340: bdun pa dkyil 'khor rab gnas la /
NK013(pa)015:2343: dang po ni slob dpon gyis rnam rgyal bum pa /
NK013(pa)015:2345: sgrub grogs gzhan gyi bum pa mang po yod na
NK013(pa)015:2346: thogs te dkyil 'khor shar sgo nas rten snying dang
NK013(pa)015:2347: / che ba'i che mchog sogs dkon mchog gsum gyis
NK013(pa)015:2348: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas te
NK013(pa)015:2350: gtso bo yab yum gyi sngags sbrel mar bzla zhing
NK013(pa)015:2351: rol mo dang bcas lan gsum bskor shar du gnas
NK013(pa)015:2352: pas / bum pa so so nas lha rnams la
NK013(pa)015:2353: 'bul ba'i stang ka byas la rang gi spyi bor
NK013(pa)015:2355: bcom ldan 'das dpal sgyu 'phrul dra bas bdag la mngon par dbang bskur du gsol /
NK013(pa)015:2356: bum pa ma lags rgyal po lags //
NK013(pa)015:2357: rgyal po sngags kyis btab nas kyang //
NK013(pa)015:2358: rgyal po chen por mnga' gsol gyis //
NK013(pa)015:2359: rgyal po'i tshul du bzhugs su gsol //
NK013(pa)015:2361: dkyil 'khor gyi lha gnas ma 'chol bar so so
NK013(pa)015:2362: many+dzi la 'god pa'am ste gzur pa la dbus dang
NK013(pa)015:2363: phyogs bzhir bkod pa'am bum pa mang po yin tshe
NK013(pa)015:2364: rgyab phyogs su gral thabs kyi bkod pas bshams kyang
NK013(pa)015:2365: chog par bla mahkahthoga pa yab sras kyi 'grel pa
NK013(pa)015:2367: rnam bum la rigs so sor phye tshe phyag mtshan lnga so so'am /
NK013(pa)015:2368: yang na pad ma 'dab brgyad yin /
NK013(pa)015:2369: mchod g.yogs pas las bum thogs te slob dpon /
NK013(pa)015:2370: mdun stegs kyi bum ldan sna tshogs rdo rje'i re kh+aa can la bzhugs su gsol nas /
NK013(pa)015:2371: khro bo chen pos dkyil 'khor gyi bar chad thams cad srung du gsol /
NK013(pa)015:2373: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' dri bzang gi chu dang /
NK013(pa)015:2375: me tog dkar po'i sil ma legs par bkram /
NK013(pa)015:2378: mtha' kun tu ras bzang po'i yol bas dkri /
NK013(pa)015:2379: ba dan bkod legs pa brgyad phyogs rer gnyis gnyis dang /
NK013(pa)015:2380: las bzhi'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rten 'brel du /
NK013(pa)015:2381: dkyil 'khor gyi gra bzhir bum pa mgul chings dang
NK013(pa)015:2382: bcas pa bzhi'i steng nya phyis kyi nang du bdud
NK013(pa)015:2385: shar du nang mchod sman dang /
NK013(pa)015:2386: zhi gtor pad zlum gyi dkyil dbyibs can /
NK013(pa)015:2387: khams drug lha mo can dang /
NK013(pa)015:2388: rak+ta byang du bka' srung gi gtor ma lhor mkha' 'gro so gnyis kyi gtor ma /
NK013(pa)015:2389: byang shar du mtshams 'dzin me tog gi bum pa che legs /
NK013(pa)015:2390: shar du ting phor legs pa bzhi bcu zhe gnyis
NK013(pa)015:2391: kyi nang du lung pa dgu 'dus kyi chu dwangs
NK013(pa)015:2392: bsil rnyog pa med pa la 'bras yos /
NK013(pa)015:2395: ba dmar zal 'o ma bcas mchod yon /
NK013(pa)015:2396: de'i phyin ting phor zhe gnyis la dag byed kyi
NK013(pa)015:2397: sur pa dang bul tog shing shun sogs sbyar ba'i
NK013(pa)015:2399: shar lhor shing tsh+wa chu yi tshul /
NK013(pa)015:2402: spang spos tsha yi tshul rnams la /
NK013(pa)015:2405: tsan+dana dkar dmar rnams snga ma las phyi mas mang rim du btab /
NK013(pa)015:2406: sbrang bur gyi kha tshar dang /
NK013(pa)015:2408: sug smel gyi phab btab pa sbyar ba'i spos kyi ring bu chen po'i kong bam dang /
NK013(pa)015:2409: de nas lhan skyes dang sbyar spos sna tshogs pa'i spos snod zhe gnyis lho stod du bshams /
NK013(pa)015:2410: lho smad nas dbyar yin na dug rigs ma yin pa chu dang thang las skyes pa'i me tog /
NK013(pa)015:2411: dgun yin na sman dang 'bru la tshon gyis kha dog bsgyur ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:2412: dar zab btsos pa'i me tog zhe gnyis /
NK013(pa)015:2413: lho nub nas nub gzhung bar mar me zhe gnyis /
NK013(pa)015:2414: de nas nub byang gi bar ta phyis dung chos gang rung du ga bur /
NK013(pa)015:2418: sir+ya rnams sbyar ba'i dri chab zhe gnyis /
NK013(pa)015:2419: de nas byang stod dang byang stod nas byang smad bar /
NK013(pa)015:2423: phye sogs las btsos pa'i zhal zas bza' bca' btung ba ste /
NK013(pa)015:2426: bu ram chang sogs zhe gnyis dang /
NK013(pa)015:2427: sha mthud mar khur sogs sam de dag gis rgyu las byas pa'i g.yos kyi bye brag zhe gnyis /
NK013(pa)015:2428: ma 'byor na re re 'phan rgyad brgyad dang /
NK013(pa)015:2429: shin tu ma 'byor na re res mdzad do //
NK013(pa)015:2431: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
NK013(pa)015:2432: dri dang me tog bdug spos dang //
NK013(pa)015:2433: mar me brgya ni dbul bya zhing //
NK013(pa)015:2434: rgyal mtshan lha bshos brgya brgya 'bul //
NK013(pa)015:2435: zhes pas brgya stong khri sogs 'byor ba bzhin gtsang zhing /
NK013(pa)015:2436: bsam sbyor dag pa gsum ldan du bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2438: bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang //
NK013(pa)015:2439: rgyan phreng btung dang bro bas bskor //
NK013(pa)015:2440: zhes pa ltar te phyogs su mda' brgyad la tshon skud kyi d+r+wa bas mdzes par bris /
NK013(pa)015:2441: slob dpon la sogs par rdo rje dril bu /
NK013(pa)015:2442: rol mo'i khyad par sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:2443: nye bar mkho ba thams cad 'du bye'o //
NK013(pa)015:2444: gnyis pa la rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i dbye ba mang mod /
NK013(pa)015:2446: dkyil 'khor la sogs gang byas pa //
NK013(pa)015:2447: rab gnas ye shes mi ldan rnams //
NK013(pa)015:2448: sogs dang bri ba'i nus pa med //
NK013(pa)015:2449: de phyir mkhas des rab tu bsgrims //
NK013(pa)015:2450: zhes gsungs pas 'di la don gsum /
NK013(pa)015:2452: dang po la bshams bkod dang cho ga'o //
NK013(pa)015:2454: dkyil 'khor mdun du khrus stegs pad+ma 'dab brgyad la rin po che'i khrus gzhong du me long /
NK013(pa)015:2455: de'i nub stegs la dbang bum so lnga'i bcud ldan ni sngar sta gon gyi rnam bum mo //
NK013(pa)015:2456: shar du sman dang ba byung sbyar ba'i khrus bum /
NK013(pa)015:2458: ras kha tshar ma nyams pa dkar po dri ma
NK013(pa)015:2459: med pa la dri yi thig le lnga la +amo
NK013(pa)015:2460: h'u t+r+aam h+r+ai +aa rnams bris pa /
NK013(pa)015:2461: g.yas su dri zhim pos bgos pa'i 'bru mar phyi snod /
NK013(pa)015:2462: dri dang ba byung sbyar snod /
NK013(pa)015:2466: par+pa ta te de lnga'am tshab tu ba lu'i me tog lcug ma legs pa /
NK013(pa)015:2469: shug shun ste shing lnga'i shun pa /
NK013(pa)015:2471: khu stegs g.yon du stegs la /
NK013(pa)015:2479: dung gi so mang gser gyi spu gri rnams dang /
NK013(pa)015:2486: man+dala gyi bkod pa bcas tshogs par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2488: bum pa byin rlabs bgegs sbyang bkru /
NK013(pa)015:2489: gsol btags bcas pa'i sa bcad bzhi /
NK013(pa)015:2491: sgrub thabs las 'byung ba'i gsol gdab dang /
NK013(pa)015:2492: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK013(pa)015:2495: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
NK013(pa)015:2496: ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang //
NK013(pa)015:2498: e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos /
NK013(pa)015:2499: sogs don dam sems bskyed dang ting 'dzin gsum gyi tshigs bcad rjes /
NK013(pa)015:2500: gong gis byin rlabs dang sbyang ba'i skabs /
NK013(pa)015:2501: h+aum gyur nam mkha' e gzugs can /
NK013(pa)015:2505: rang rig rdo rje h+aum mtshan las 'od 'phros /
NK013(pa)015:2511: rdo rje yid la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)015:2515: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he phata dzah sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:2516: dz+ny+aa na d+ha rtu ah bar brjod /
NK013(pa)015:2518: bzlas pa'i lta ba gsal gdab nas /
NK013(pa)015:2519: bsdu ldang go bgo lus bsrung bcas zin par bya /
NK013(pa)015:2520: dbang bum bsang sbyangs las bum chus dag par byas te /
NK013(pa)015:2521: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum zhes brjod pas rin po
NK013(pa)015:2522: che'i bum pa mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i nang
NK013(pa)015:2523: du h+aum +amo s+w+aa +aam h+aa rnams yongs su gyur
NK013(pa)015:2524: pa las rigs lnga yab yum gyi skur bkra lam
NK013(pa)015:2534: sogs rigs lnga yab yum sngags la /
NK013(pa)015:2535: ye d+h+aarma sogs rten 'brel snying po ci nus btags pa bzlas /
NK013(pa)015:2536: yig brgyas bzod par gsol te lha mi zhu bar bzhag /
NK013(pa)015:2537: swa b+h+aa wa sogs chos nyid rnam dag gi sngags
NK013(pa)015:2538: rgyas khrus bum rdzas dang bcas pa'i dri ma sbyang
NK013(pa)015:2539: / na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo sogs nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags rgyas spel /
NK013(pa)015:2540: badz+ra a mri ta sogs bdud rtsi thab sbyor sngags
NK013(pa)015:2541: kyis dri ma sbyong ba la thogs pa med par
NK013(pa)015:2542: byas / sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi shi ka te sa ma ya sh+ri ye h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:2544: h'u big+h+na n+ra ta kri tra phata /
NK013(pa)015:2546: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las zla ba la gnas
NK013(pa)015:2547: pa'i bum par rten 'brel snying po'i 'od zer 'bar
NK013(pa)015:2548: bas 'khor 'das kyi bdud rtsi thams cad bsdus par
NK013(pa)015:2549: gyur / rten snying brgya rtsa bzlas ye shes kyi bdud rtsis bum pa gang bar bsam mo //
NK013(pa)015:2553: skad cig gis stong pa'i ngang las /
NK013(pa)015:2554: rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:2558: thal ba bzhin du brlag par byed //
NK013(pa)015:2560: sa yi phyogs 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul
NK013(pa)015:2561: d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu gnas par
NK013(pa)015:2562: bgyi yi / gang su yang rung ba'i 'byung po
NK013(pa)015:2563: gdug pa can 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir ma gnas
NK013(pa)015:2565: gal te mi 'gro na ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar bas brlag ta re /
NK013(pa)015:2567: rang gi mig g.yas ma las nyi ma /
NK013(pa)015:2568: g.yon pa a las zla ba /
NK013(pa)015:2570: pa ta la pany+tsa h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:2571: ces pa'i bar brjod par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2573: rten gyi gzugs brnyan me long du 'char bas las rdor gyis me long dang /
NK013(pa)015:2574: las g.yogs pas khrus gzhong btegs /
NK013(pa)015:2576: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya bi shwa d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:2577: zhes ba byung dang dri bzang gi chu sbyar ba byug /
NK013(pa)015:2579: +aahmh'u h+r+ai thah til lam 'bru mar dri zhim por byas pa dur ba'i spir gyis byug /
NK013(pa)015:2581: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya bo sho d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:2582: zhes shing shun lnga yi phye mas phyis /
NK013(pa)015:2583: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyi ni //
NK013(pa)015:2584: lha rnams kyi ni khrus gsol ltar //
NK013(pa)015:2585: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:2586: de bzhin bdag gi khrus bagyi'o //
NK013(pa)015:2587: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi shi ka te sa ma ya sh+r+ai h'u /
NK013(pa)015:2588: shes rol mor bcas bri sman ba byung sbyar ba'i bum chus bkru /
NK013(pa)015:2589: rat+na pra b+hany+tsa ra ha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:2590: zhes kha tshar ma nyams pa'i ras kyis bu /
NK013(pa)015:2593: zhes dri lnga'i chu thugs kar byug go //
NK013(pa)015:2594: bzhi pa lag g.yas rdo rje dang bcas pas spos snod thogs la g.yon dril bu bsil bas /
NK013(pa)015:2595: rang gi lce h'u las byung ba'i rdo rjer gyur /
NK013(pa)015:2596: ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams ni dga' ldan nas //
NK013(pa)015:2597: sprul pa dam pa tog dkar lha yi bus //
NK013(pa)015:2598: mi pham mgon la rgyab tshab dbang bskur nas //
NK013(pa)015:2599: gzigs pa rnam lngas 'dzam gling kun gzigs shing //
NK013(pa)015:2600: glang chen thal dkar stabs gshegs lhum zhugs ltar //
NK013(pa)015:2601: rdo rje rin chen pad+ma'i rigs mchog dang //
NK013(pa)015:2602: las kyi rigs dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
NK013(pa)015:2603: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams //
NK013(pa)015:2604: dus 'dir bdag gis dad pas spyan 'dren na //
NK013(pa)015:2605: rten mchog 'di la 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:2606: deng sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye
NK013(pa)015:2607: shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i slad du
NK013(pa)015:2608: / dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gnas par bgyi yis /
NK013(pa)015:2609: rgyal ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyis bdag la mthu bstan gsol /
NK013(pa)015:2612: ye shes kyi snang ba thob pas rab tu gnas par mdzad du gsol /
NK013(pa)015:2613: pra t+aits+tsha hoh zhes me tog dor /
NK013(pa)015:2614: rat+na ma le a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:2615: zhes de nyid lhag pa'i lhas rang gis spyi bor bkod par bsam /
NK013(pa)015:2617: dam tshig bskyed dang spyan drangs bstim /
NK013(pa)015:2618: dbang po skyon bsal mnga' gsol 'bul /
NK013(pa)015:2619: dbang bskur mchod bstod bzhugs su gsol /
NK013(pa)015:2620: zhes sa bcad bdun gyi dang po ni /
NK013(pa)015:2624: stong pa'i ngang las snying rje chen po'i ye shes
NK013(pa)015:2625: kyi rang mdangs sems nyid rdo rje mthing ka h+aum
NK013(pa)015:2626: yig mthing kas mtshan par gsal bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:2627: de las e yam bam lam sum ram rnams chad /
NK013(pa)015:2628: yongs su gyur pa las 'byung lnga rim brtsegs ri
NK013(pa)015:2629: rab dang bcas pa'i steng du me ri sna tshogs
NK013(pa)015:2630: pad+ma'i lte ba la rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi
NK013(pa)015:2631: la / gnas pa mdun gyi dkyil 'khor thar pa
NK013(pa)015:2632: chen po'i gzhal med khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta
NK013(pa)015:2633: bab rgyan dang gdugs chos 'khor ri dwags sogs tshad
NK013(pa)015:2634: dang mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa lte
NK013(pa)015:2635: ba 'khor lo rtsib bzhi bar khyams glo bur dang
NK013(pa)015:2637: de dbus rang rig rdo rje h'u mtshan las 'od 'phros 'phags pa mchod /
NK013(pa)015:2639: rang bzhin phyag rgya'i gnas su 'jug /
NK013(pa)015:2644: thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad sogs sgrub thabs nas /
NK013(pa)015:2645: bde gshegs bzhugs shing rnam grol dgyes pa bskyed //
NK013(pa)015:2646: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa la thim /
NK013(pa)015:2647: seng glang rta rma bya mkha' lding ste lnga po'i khri 'bul bas sgrub thabs nas /
NK013(pa)015:2648: rin chen seng ge'i khri la sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:2649: k+aa ya w+aaka tsit+ta tish+tha badz+ra /
NK013(pa)015:2651: mig sman byugs pa'i gser thur thogs pas /
NK013(pa)015:2652: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis /
NK013(pa)015:2654: / 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar //
NK013(pa)015:2655: de bzhin rgyal ba rnams kyis spyan //
NK013(pa)015:2656: sems can don du dbye bar bya //
NK013(pa)015:2657: badz+ra tsak+shu sa man+ta bi shwa d+ha ne s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:2658: gser gyi snyan 'brus la snyan spa ba bsal ba ltar bya zhing /
NK013(pa)015:2659: khyad par rgyu las byung ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:2660: rin po che yis snyan 'bru yis //
NK013(pa)015:2661: snyan gyi dbang po'i skyon bsal bas //
NK013(pa)015:2662: snyan lnga yongs su rdzogs par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2663: srok+shu pra we sha ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:2664: gser gyi rmang tsher gyis shangs bsal tshul bya /
NK013(pa)015:2665: khyad par rgyu las byung ba ni //
NK013(pa)015:2666: rin po che yi rmang gzer gyis //
NK013(pa)015:2667: shangs kyi dbang po'i skyon bsal bas //
NK013(pa)015:2668: sems kyi rnam grangs shes par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2670: gser gyi ljags bzhar gyis ljags kyi dri ma bsal bar ltar bya zhing /
NK013(pa)015:2671: khyad par rgyu las byung ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:2672: rin po che yi ljags gzhar gyis //
NK013(pa)015:2673: ljags kyi dbang po'i skyon bsal nas //
NK013(pa)015:2674: gsung rab ma lus 'chad par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2675: di bya mu kh+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:2676: gser gyi thur mas tshem 'bru bltar bya zhing /
NK013(pa)015:2677: khyad par rgyu las byung ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:2678: rin po che yi tshems shing gis //
NK013(pa)015:2679: tshems kyi dri ma bsal ba yis //
NK013(pa)015:2680: mnyam par bzhag pa thob par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2682: dung gi so mang gis rgyan can rnams kyis dbu skra shad par byas te /
NK013(pa)015:2683: khyad par rgyu las byung ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:2684: rin chen dung gi so mang gis //
NK013(pa)015:2685: dbu skra lcang lo'i skyon bsal bas //
NK013(pa)015:2686: mtshan nyid ma 'dres mkhyen par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2687: ma nu pam so s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:2688: gser gyi spu gris thub drug sogs kyi dbu skra dang zhal spu 'breg tshul gyis /
NK013(pa)015:2689: khyad par rgyu las byung ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:2690: rin po che yi spu gri yis //
NK013(pa)015:2691: dbu dang zhal gyi spu 'breg pas //
NK013(pa)015:2692: nyon mongs rtsad nas gcod par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2695: rgyan dang cod pan khrus phyi dang /
NK013(pa)015:2696: me tog gdugs dang mar me dang //
NK013(pa)015:2697: dri chab dam rdzas gtor ma mchod //
NK013(pa)015:2698: sbyor dang 'dod yon lhab lhub dang //
NK013(pa)015:2699: na bza' man+dala bcu drug go //
NK013(pa)015:2701: rin chen phreng ba dbu brgyan dang //
NK013(pa)015:2702: gdu bu do shal sku rags dag /
NK013(pa)015:2704: gnyis med rgyan du bzhes su gsol //
NK013(pa)015:2706: sna tshogs dar gyi 'phur lce can //
NK013(pa)015:2707: cod pan thabs dang shes rab kyis //
NK013(pa)015:2708: gnyis kyis mtha' la mi gnas pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:2709: gnyis med sku mchog brgyan par bya //
NK013(pa)015:2711: rgyal ba'i sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang //
NK013(pa)015:2712: spos dri sman chab khrus mchog 'di gsol bas /
NK013(pa)015:2714: / 'gro ba kun gyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:2715: dri ma bag chags bcas te dag par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2717: thugs rje lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas gzugs sku la //
NK013(pa)015:2718: sri zhu gus phyir ras kyi sku phyis pas //
NK013(pa)015:2719: las dang nyon mongs bag chags kun bsal nas //
NK013(pa)015:2720: spyod lam rnam par dag pa'i sgo thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:2722: yon tan lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas sku gzugs la //
NK013(pa)015:2723: rin chen mdzes pa'i me tog dor byas pas //
NK013(pa)015:2724: log lta'i nyon mongs tha ba kun bral te //
NK013(pa)015:2725: lta bas mi ngoms mdzes pa sku thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:2727: mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sku mnga' ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:2728: sangs rgyas sku la gdugs mchog 'di phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:2729: dam tshig sdom pa'i nyes skyon kun bral nas //
NK013(pa)015:2730: ye shes thugs rjes ma lus skyob par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2732: rang rig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la //
NK013(pa)015:2733: mun pa snang byed mar me 'di bltams pas //
NK013(pa)015:2734: ma rig 'thib po'i mun pa kun bsal nas //
NK013(pa)015:2735: sangs rgyas la sogs spyan lnga thob par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2737: snyigs ma lnga nyid 'bras bus yongs rdzogs pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:2738: rgyal ba'i sku la dri chab 'di phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:2739: gdung ba zug rngu mya ngan kun bral nas /
NK013(pa)015:2741: / 'od zer mtha' yas 'gyed pa'i sku thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:2743: dug lnga ma spangs sku lngar rnam dag pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:2744: bde chen sku la dam rdzas 'di phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:2745: kun tu bzang po'i spyod lam yongs rdzogs pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:2746: kun nas yongs su smin pa'i sku thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:2748: chos rnams longs spyod yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:2749: rgyal ba'i sku la gtor ma 'di phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:2750: rdzas su spyod pa'i gdung ba kun bral nas //
NK013(pa)015:2751: gsang ba'i longs spyod yongs su rdzogs par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2752: bcu gcig pa sgrub thabs nas 'byung ba'i mchod pa byin rlabs dang sgeg mo brgyad mchod mthar /
NK013(pa)015:2754: ye shes spyod yul yongs su dag pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:2755: rgyal ba'i sku la mchod pa 'di phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:2756: khams gsum dug gsum rtsad nas dag 'gyur te //
NK013(pa)015:2757: sku gsum lhun grub zhing khams dag par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2759: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:2760: bde chen sku la ga na 'di phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:2761: spyod yul byang chub sems su rnam dag nas //
NK013(pa)015:2762: mtha' yas snyoms par 'jug pa thob par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2764: mtha' yas bde dang bral ba med pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:2765: gnyis med sku la 'dod yon lnga phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:2766: mtha' la zhen pa'i gdung ba kun bral nas //
NK013(pa)015:2767: bde ba chen po'i thabs rnams rdzogs par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2769: gzi brjid khyad par 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK013(pa)015:2770: bla re lhab lhub la sogs phul byas pas //
NK013(pa)015:2771: log par lta ba rnams dang yongs bral nas /
NK013(pa)015:2773: / 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub pa shog /
NK013(pa)015:2775: byams mgon sku la snyoms pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK013(pa)015:2776: rin chen ldan pa'i na bza' 'di phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:2777: tha bas rgyags pa'i spyod lam kun bral te //
NK013(pa)015:2778: gzi brjid khyad par 'phags pa'i sku thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:2781: ma tshang ba med pa 'di nyid bla ma dang
NK013(pa)015:2782: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba la
NK013(pa)015:2784: sgrub thabs nas sku gsum man+dala 'bul bar rdzogs par bya /
NK013(pa)015:2785: lnga pa ni dbang bskur ba ste /
NK013(pa)015:2786: thugs ka nas 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis dbang gi
NK013(pa)015:2787: lha nam mkha' gang bar badz+ra sa m+aa dzahphyi nang
NK013(pa)015:2788: gsang bas mchod / de rnams kyis dge mtshan du
NK013(pa)015:2789: ma dang ldan pa'i bum pa rin po ches dbang
NK013(pa)015:2790: gsang bas mchod / bskur bar gyur / slob dpon nas bum pa'i kha rgyan gyis chu 'thor bzhin /
NK013(pa)015:2791: ji ltar bltams pa sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:2792: ma h+aa sh+au ny+aa ta sogs lnga tshan lnga'i sngags brjod /
NK013(pa)015:2793: sarba ta th+aa ga t+aa ma h+aa k+aa ya sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:2794: lha tshogs thams cad kyi dung khang sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:2795: gnas lngar rgyas btab par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:2796: zhes pa'i bar sgrub thabs ltar brjod /
NK013(pa)015:2798: slar yang mchod pa byin rlabs dang /
NK013(pa)015:2799: 'og min zhing gshegs sogs phyag nas /
NK013(pa)015:2800: cir yang sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)015:2801: zhes pa'i bar sgrub thabs nas 'byung ba ltar mchod pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:2804: rten 'brel snying po brgya rtsa bzla zhing /
NK013(pa)015:2806: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)015:2807: dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bden pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:2808: chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i bden pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:2809: chos can rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa'i bden pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:2810: bcom ldan 'das dpal gsang ba sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba
NK013(pa)015:2811: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams
NK013(pa)015:2813: sprul pa yang sprul phyag brnyan dang bcas pa'i bden pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:2814: khyad par rgyal bas gsungs pa'i cho ga'i las rim rnam par dag pa sgrub pa'i bden pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:2815: bden pa chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis /
NK013(pa)015:2816: dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad /
NK013(pa)015:2817: dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid /
NK013(pa)015:2819: 'byung ba bzhi'i gnod pas ma zhig gi bar du /
NK013(pa)015:2822: ji srid gshegs gsol gyi cho ga ma byas kyi bar du /
NK013(pa)015:2824: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don du brtan par bzhugs nas /
NK013(pa)015:2825: dngos grub stsal zhing sems can gyi don mdzad du gsol /
NK013(pa)015:2826: rten snying gi me tog gtor zhing /
NK013(pa)015:2827: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya w+aak+tsit+ta tish+tha badz+ra /
NK013(pa)015:2830: gtor chog bya zhing smon lam gdab /
NK013(pa)015:2833: mkha' 'gro so gnyis kyi lhag chen dang /
NK013(pa)015:2834: bstan ma la gtor ma bskyal /
NK013(pa)015:2835: chos skyong ba'i srung ma mchod /
NK013(pa)015:2836: mthar lha yi nga rgyal brtan pos rdo rje spyi bor bkod la /
NK013(pa)015:2837: badz+ra sa ma ya ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:2838: chos skyong ba'i srung ma'i dbang po rnams kyis sangs
NK013(pa)015:2839: rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas
NK013(pa)015:2840: pa dang / khyad par du'ang rgyud sde chen po
NK013(pa)015:2841: 'di nyid kyi bshad dang sgrub pa'i bstan pa phyogs
NK013(pa)015:2844: phyi rol du 'byung po la gtor ma cha gsum btang bar bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2846: rnam dag rin chen dri ma med pa'i gnas //
NK013(pa)015:2847: bla ma mchog dang dpal ldan mi bskyod pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:2848: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa //
NK013(pa)015:2849: mkhyen brtse'i ngo mtshar grangs med bden pa'i mthus //
NK013(pa)015:2850: sna tshogs khams las grub pa'i gzugs brnyan yi //
NK013(pa)015:2851: dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu gnas pa'i mthus //
NK013(pa)015:2852: kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che /
NK013(pa)015:2854: / 'dzin ma'i 'khor lor rtag tu khyab cing gnas /
NK013(pa)015:2855: de 'dzin bshad dang sgrub pa'i dpal yon can /
NK013(pa)015:2856: sa gsum skye bo kun gyi gnyen gcig pur //
NK013(pa)015:2857: sku tshe'i rgyal mtshan yun du brtan pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:2858: bzhed don lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:2859: 'jig rten kun du srid 'gror nyams nga ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:2860: nad mug 'khrugs rtsod mi mthun phyogs rnams kun //
NK013(pa)015:2861: ngang gis zhi nas 'o rnams bde ba'i rgyu //
NK013(pa)015:2862: yang dag lta ba mchog dang ldan gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:2863: mkha' la phun tshogs bdud rtsi'i bril phreng gis //
NK013(pa)015:2864: sa la 'bras smin chad med rtag 'phel bas //
NK013(pa)015:2865: mi la dus kun 'tsho ba bzang po rgyas /
NK013(pa)015:2867: / 'gro la tshe ring nad med dge gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:2868: ngur smrig rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK013(pa)015:2869: drang srong chen po'i ring lugs gsal mdzad rnams //
NK013(pa)015:2870: g.yeng ba med par 'chad rtsod rtsom pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:2871: nyin mtshan kun tu chos kyis 'da' bar shog /
NK013(pa)015:2872: nags dang ri sul tshang tshing zhi ba na //
NK013(pa)015:2873: bsam bstan sgom pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyang //
NK013(pa)015:2874: log 'tsho spangs pa'i 'tsho bas lus stobs rgyas //
NK013(pa)015:2875: rtag tu rim pa gnyis las mi g.yel shog /
NK013(pa)015:2876: chos ldan yul srung rgyal po'i tshogs rnams kyang /
NK013(pa)015:2878: / 'thab rtsod med par 'tshe ba kun dang bral //
NK013(pa)015:2879: dpal 'byor rgyas shing dkon mchog gsum la gus /
NK013(pa)015:2881: / 'di phyi kun tu bde zhing skyid par shog /
NK013(pa)015:2882: bdag sogs gang du skye ba de dang der //
NK013(pa)015:2883: rdo rje bla ma'i zhabs pad la 'dud cing //
NK013(pa)015:2884: dam tshig mtha' dag gtan du mi nyams par //
NK013(pa)015:2885: rdo rje theg pa'i dngos grub 'grub gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:2886: ces brjod la ston pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i bkra shis dang /
NK013(pa)015:2887: rol mor bcas pas dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor nas shis par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2889: rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg bya ba ste /
NK013(pa)015:2890: de nyid kyi yig cha las gsal bar 'gyur ro //
NK013(pa)015:2891: de yan chod nub gsum pa'i bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2892: dgu pa dkyil 'khor du slob dpon 'jug pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:2893: slob ma 'jug pa gnyis kyi phyi ma dbang gi cho ga las shes shing /
NK013(pa)015:2894: snga ma la'ang dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod dang /
NK013(pa)015:2896: dang po ni 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gis gtsos sgrub
NK013(pa)015:2897: po rnams rang gi lus lhar shes pas yi ge
NK013(pa)015:2900: tshul phyag dang gral phyag gis /
NK013(pa)015:2902: gzhan rnams ji ltar 'os par stan la 'khod nas /
NK013(pa)015:2903: rab gnas sogs dang ma 'brel ba'i sgrub mchod rkyang
NK013(pa)015:2904: pa tsam la nam mkha'i sta gon gyi lha spyan
NK013(pa)015:2905: 'dren dus bstim pa las gzhan sgrub thabs bzhin du
NK013(pa)015:2906: tshogs gnyis bsogs pa'i cho ga sdu ldang gi bar
NK013(pa)015:2907: byas la thun skabs su rdo rje gsum gyi rnal
NK013(pa)015:2908: 'byor gyis sgo gsum 'khrul pa ye shes su sdoms
NK013(pa)015:2909: pa'i rnal 'byor la dran pa nye bar bzhag ste
NK013(pa)015:2910: / bdag mdun dbyer med bskyed nas zhes pa bdag
NK013(pa)015:2911: dang mdun bskyed rdzas so so tha dad pa dmigs
NK013(pa)015:2913: bdag mdun so so ba gnyis gcig tu byas te sgom pa'am /
NK013(pa)015:2914: bdag gcig so sor gnyis sam gsum du 'char ba lta bu tha mal snang zhen sbyong byed kyi /
NK013(pa)015:2915: tha ma la snang zhen gnyis 'dzin du ma song bar /
NK013(pa)015:2916: rang rig pa ye shes nyid dkyil 'khor mtha' dang
NK013(pa)015:2917: mu med pa chos kyi dbyings khyab pa de srid
NK013(pa)015:2918: du khyab cing de yi ngang la snang srid dkyil
NK013(pa)015:2919: 'khor du ma gyur pa med pas slob dpon kahthoga
NK013(pa)015:2920: pa chen pos / de nyid dkyil 'khor rnam bzhi ste //
NK013(pa)015:2921: thams cad 'gag pa med pa ni //
NK013(pa)015:2922: de nyid yi yi dkyil 'khor yin //
NK013(pa)015:2923: ma 'gag pa nyid ma skyes pa //
NK013(pa)015:2924: de nyid nang gis da la yin //
NK013(pa)015:2925: ma skyes mi 'gag dbyer med pa //
NK013(pa)015:2926: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad //
NK013(pa)015:2927: bla dwags sgro 'dogs kun bral ba //
NK013(pa)015:2928: de nyid dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin //
NK013(pa)015:2929: zhes gsungs lta bu'i sgyu 'phrul rang lugs kyi bkod
NK013(pa)015:2930: pa dkyiil 'khor gyi lta don rtogs shing snang ba
NK013(pa)015:2931: ltar shes pa'i gdeng gis zin pas bdag dang mdun
NK013(pa)015:2932: zhes so sor phye ba'i 'dzin pas ma slad par
NK013(pa)015:2933: / snang grags rigs pa thams cad ye shes kyi
NK013(pa)015:2934: 'khor lo 'chang ba'i cho 'phrul ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK013(pa)015:2935: rtsal las gcig dang du ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi spro
NK013(pa)015:2936: bsdu cir yang goms par bya ba ste /
NK013(pa)015:2937: rmad du byung ba'i rgyud rgyal 'di nyid kyi dgongs don yin pas de ltar shes par bya yi /
NK013(pa)015:2938: chos thams cad dag mnyam yul dang yul can bden
NK013(pa)015:2939: pa dbyer med de mtshon byed brda' la so sor
NK013(pa)015:2941: rig pa rang byung gi dkyil 'khor gzhi 'bras dbyer med don dang /
NK013(pa)015:2942: de mtshon byed rtags kyi phyag rgya bris pa gzugs brnyan gnyis snang tshul so sor snang ba ltar /
NK013(pa)015:2943: gnas tshul la 'gal bar 'dzin pa'i blos so sor
NK013(pa)015:2944: zhen pas bdag mdun dbyer med ces pa'i rgyud sde'i
NK013(pa)015:2945: gsang gnad zab mo rna bar ma song ba ni
NK013(pa)015:2946: / rdo rje theg pa'i rgyud don mthar thug pa shes pa'i skal bas re zhig spangs pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:2947: des na lam 'di'i lugs rig 'dzin dam pa gong ma'i man ngag ltar sgrub gzhi bdag dang /
NK013(pa)015:2949: sgrub chos ting 'dzin gsum rtsal so sor 'char yang ye shes rig pa gcig gi rol gar la /
NK013(pa)015:2950: gcig tha dad kyi spros pa bral ba'i gdeng go
NK013(pa)015:2951: bas gdod nas dag cing grub pa'i gsal gdab cing
NK013(pa)015:2953: thun mtshams su 'og min du ston 'khor tshogs pa bzhin /
NK013(pa)015:2954: yul snang phun tshogs ye gnas dang /
NK013(pa)015:2955: rgyud don gang sar gyi chos la tshang pa'i dgongs
NK013(pa)015:2956: pa dang bcas te rgyud bklag cing rang sems don
NK013(pa)015:2957: gyi bla ma rang byung dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po
NK013(pa)015:2958: rang ngo mjal ba las logs su dbang don zur
NK013(pa)015:2959: ba med mod / rnal 'byor pa de lta bu'i
NK013(pa)015:2960: rtogs goms kyi gdengs med pa dag de gsal 'debs
NK013(pa)015:2961: ba med mod / pa'i phyir / rgyud smin byed
NK013(pa)015:2962: kyis bdag nyid 'jug pas sngags sdom gso sbyong dang
NK013(pa)015:2963: ba med mod / pa'i phyir / / ye shes gong nas gong du 'phel ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:2964: de nyid brtan par bya ba'i thabs tshul la brtson par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:2967: kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /
NK013(pa)015:2968: de nas slob ma 'jug par bya //
NK013(pa)015:2969: zhes pas rnal 'byor pa dag mnyam dbyer med kyi
NK013(pa)015:2970: nges shes go ba goms pa mngon du gyur pa'i
NK013(pa)015:2971: slob dpon gyis rig pa'i me tog dor bas cig
NK013(pa)015:2972: char du bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul
NK013(pa)015:2973: dang / de ltar ma go bas rim gyis pa'i
NK013(pa)015:2974: dbang la brten nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug
NK013(pa)015:2976: de ltar rim cig char gang gi skabs su'ang /
NK013(pa)015:2977: sgrub gzhi rang la gnas pa'i sku dang ye shes de /
NK013(pa)015:2978: sgrub byed dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor bdag dang mi
NK013(pa)015:2979: gnyis pa'i dbang lha de dag gi sku gsung thugs
NK013(pa)015:2980: dang dbyer med par mnyam par sbyor bas /
NK013(pa)015:2981: sgrub 'bras dag pa mngon gyur gyi go 'phang gi chos rgyud la 'jogs pa'am /
NK013(pa)015:2982: mngon du byed par nges pas /
NK013(pa)015:2983: dbang ye bskur chen po'i lta bas zin pa zhig dgos so //
NK013(pa)015:2984: de yi phyir lta ba rnal ma de nges pa'iganga zag gis /
NK013(pa)015:2986: bdag dang dkyil 'khor sku gsung thugs ye nas dbyer
NK013(pa)015:2987: med la 'khrul bas sgrib pa de bsal ba'i phyir
NK013(pa)015:2988: dbang po rab shes rab chen po'i blo stobs can
NK013(pa)015:2989: dag gis the tshom chod de spros pa mang po'i
NK013(pa)015:2990: gnas la mi ltos pa slar sngags tsam gyis dbyer
NK013(pa)015:2991: med du byed pa'i brda' thabs kyis /
NK013(pa)015:2992: ye nas dbyer med yin pa la shes pa'i rgyud
NK013(pa)015:2993: smin byed ches khyad par ba'i thabs sbyang zhing mkhas
NK013(pa)015:2994: pa bla med kyi zab pa snying po'i rgyud sde
NK013(pa)015:2995: mthar thug pa 'di rang gi dgongs par sgo bstun
NK013(pa)015:2996: pa dang / bdag dang dkyil 'khor ba'i sku gsung thugs ye nas dbyer med yin par go mod /
NK013(pa)015:2997: dbang dman de tsam gyis yin pa la yin par
NK013(pa)015:2998: nges pa skye mi nus pa'i blo stobs dman pas
NK013(pa)015:2999: dbang lha spyan drangs ba sogs kyis /
NK013(pa)015:3000: dbang gi yul las dbang blang ba'i cho ga thabs
NK013(pa)015:3001: mang pos rim gyis bdag dang dkyil 'khor dbyer med
NK013(pa)015:3002: du bya ba'i tshul bla med kyi rgyud sde 'og
NK013(pa)015:3003: ma spyi tsam gyi sgo ba stun dang gnyis su
NK013(pa)015:3004: gnas pa ni / bskyed rim la sngags tsam brjod pa'am skad cig gis bskyed pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3005: mngon byang lnga sogs kyis rim par bskyed pa gnyis su gnas pa bzhin no /
NK013(pa)015:3007: slob dpon shar sgor bzhengs nas me tog dor bzhin /
NK013(pa)015:3008: rang gtso bo gnyis pa'i rnams pas mar me las
NK013(pa)015:3009: mar me 'phros pa ltar shar sogs sgo bzhir gnas
NK013(pa)015:3010: par gyur // ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs //
NK013(pa)015:3011: yon tan phrin las rmad po che //
NK013(pa)015:3012: de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:3013: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /
NK013(pa)015:3014: h+aum badz+ra sa ma ya h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:3015: mdun gyi lha tshogs in+t+ra n+ai la'i ri la nyi
NK013(pa)015:3016: ma shar ba lta bu'i thugs ka nas 'od zer
NK013(pa)015:3017: bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu byung bas /
NK013(pa)015:3018: lus ngag gi rtog sgrib sbyangs nas rig pa h+aum du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3020: nyon mongs zhe sdang dang rnam par shes pa'i me
NK013(pa)015:3021: long ye shes dang rdo rje sems dpar gnas gyur
NK013(pa)015:3023: ye shes rgyal po sogs sbyor cig /
NK013(pa)015:3025: mdun gyi lha tshogs ga ngas ri la nyi ma
NK013(pa)015:3026: shar ba lta bu'i thugs ka nas 'od zer bskal
NK013(pa)015:3027: pa'i me dpung lta bu byung bas /
NK013(pa)015:3028: lus ngag gi rtog sgrib sbyangs nas rig pa du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3030: nyon mongs pa gti mug dang gzugs kyi phung po
NK013(pa)015:3031: chos dbyings ye shes dang rnam par snang mdzad du
NK013(pa)015:3032: gnas gyur / yang lho sgor phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3033: ye shes rgyal po sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:3035: s+w+aa badz+ra sa ma ya s+w+aa /
NK013(pa)015:3036: mdun gyi lha tshogs gser ri la nyi ma shar
NK013(pa)015:3037: ba lta bu'i thugs ka nas 'od zer bskal pa'i
NK013(pa)015:3038: me dpung lta bu byung bas /
NK013(pa)015:3039: lus ngag gi rtog sgrib sbyangs nas rig pa s+w+aar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3041: nyon mongs pa nga rgyal dang tshor ba'i phung po
NK013(pa)015:3042: mnyam nyid ye shes dang rin chen 'byung ldan du
NK013(pa)015:3043: gnas gyur / yang nub sgor phyin //
NK013(pa)015:3044: ye shes rgyal po sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:3047: mdun gyi lha tshogs rnams pad+ma r+aa ga'i ri bo
NK013(pa)015:3048: la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i thugs ka nas
NK013(pa)015:3049: 'od zer bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu byung bas
NK013(pa)015:3050: / lus ngag gi rtog sgrib sbyangs nas rig pa am du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3055: snang ba mtha' yas su gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3057: ye shes rgyal po sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:3059: h+aa badz+ra sa ma ya h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:3060: mdun gyi lha tshogs thams cad ma rgad kyi ri
NK013(pa)015:3061: bo la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i thugs ka
NK013(pa)015:3062: nas 'od zer bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu byung
NK013(pa)015:3063: bas / lus ngag gi rtog sgrib sbyangs nas rig pa h+aar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3065: nyon mongs pa phrag dog dang 'du byed kyi phung
NK013(pa)015:3066: po bya grub ye shes dang don yod grub par
NK013(pa)015:3067: gnas gyur / slar yang shar sgor phyin nas /
NK013(pa)015:3070: bdag dam tshig dang rang bzhin ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis gdod nas dbye ba med pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:3071: de nas slob ma la 'jug par gnang ba zhu ba ni //
NK013(pa)015:3072: rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa //
NK013(pa)015:3073: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
NK013(pa)015:3075: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
NK013(pa)015:3076: bzod par mdzad de dgongs su gsol //
NK013(pa)015:3077: lan gsum gyis gsol ba btab pas /
NK013(pa)015:3078: badz+ra sa ma ya hoh de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
NK013(pa)015:3079: thugs rjes zhal 'dzum dbang rnams snod dang mtshams par
NK013(pa)015:3080: bskur cig ces gnang ba thob nas gtso bo'i thugs
NK013(pa)015:3081: kar thim pas dbyer med par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3087: bgegs gtor lan chags nag po dang //
NK013(pa)015:3088: rang mdun mig dar me tog dang //
NK013(pa)015:3089: rdo rje gnod sbyin til dang bcas //
NK013(pa)015:3090: man+dala nang mchod dung chos dang //
NK013(pa)015:3091: rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan dbu rgyan dang //
NK013(pa)015:3092: cod pan mthing dmar phreng ba dang //
NK013(pa)015:3093: go cha rgyal mtshan gdugs phyag rgya //
NK013(pa)015:3094: lha tshogs tshang mo'am gtso bo dang //
NK013(pa)015:3095: bza' btung rnams dang glegs bam phreng /
NK013(pa)015:3096: rgya gram 'khor lo dung phyag shing //
NK013(pa)015:3097: rig ma'am yang na dril bus rung //
NK013(pa)015:3098: dbang lhar mchod pa 'bul rgyu ni //
NK013(pa)015:3099: rwa bar chu gnyis bzhi bsnol dang //
NK013(pa)015:3100: zhal zas bcas dang gu gul dang //
NK013(pa)015:3101: khyad par spos sbyor dang bcas bkod //
NK013(pa)015:3102: gnyis pa la dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i chos dang /
NK013(pa)015:3103: zhugs pa la dbang bskur ba'o //
NK013(pa)015:3105: dbang phyug 'jug dang bzod gsol dang //
NK013(pa)015:3106: khrus dgab dri dang lus 'bul dang //
NK013(pa)015:3107: bgegs bskrad lhar brlab dam tshig sbyin //
NK013(pa)015:3108: de nyid dpog dang chu nan dang //
NK013(pa)015:3109: bsgrag dang me tog dor ba dang //
NK013(pa)015:3110: lha dbab pa dang nan tan dang //
NK013(pa)015:3111: mig dbye dkyil 'khor legs bstan dang //
NK013(pa)015:3112: tshogs mchod yon tan rnam bco brgyad //
NK013(pa)015:3113: ces las rim las gsungs pa ltar gyi 'jug pa
NK013(pa)015:3114: bzod gsol gnyis mi brtsi ba'i 'dir chos bcu drug
NK013(pa)015:3116: ji ltar bltam pa sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:3118: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka te sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h+aam /
NK013(pa)015:3120: sbyang gzhi gdod nas dag pa'i rang rig gnyug ma
NK013(pa)015:3121: bla ma dang dbyer med pa'i lhar shar ba nyid
NK013(pa)015:3122: dbang len pa'i yul du byas nas /
NK013(pa)015:3123: sbyang bya phung khams skye mched glo bur ba de
NK013(pa)015:3124: nyid rnam par dag pa mar me las mar me
NK013(pa)015:3125: chad pa bzhin du gtso bo phyag gnyis pa'i rnam
NK013(pa)015:3126: par shar sgor dbang stegs pad+ma 'dab brgyad la 'khod
NK013(pa)015:3127: pa nyid dbang len pa por byas te /
NK013(pa)015:3128: lus longs spyod dus gsum dge ba'i dngos po thams cad man+dala du 'bul bar mos pas /
NK013(pa)015:3130: ma tshang ba med pa 'di nyid bla ma dang
NK013(pa)015:3131: dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' la dkyil 'khor du
NK013(pa)015:3134: snang srid phyogs bcu'i zhing khams sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:3135: tram gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rin chen ldan /
NK013(pa)015:3143: zhes rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad /
NK013(pa)015:3145: h+aum dkar po'i tshogs kyi d+r+wa bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3147: tsak+shu ban+d+ha wa ra m+aa n+aa ya h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:3152: rdor sems gtso bo khyod la 'dud //
NK013(pa)015:3153: thal lam chen po bdag 'dod de //
NK013(pa)015:3154: de nyid dbang dang dam tshig dang //
NK013(pa)015:3155: mgon po dpa' bor skyabs song ste //
NK013(pa)015:3156: theg chen khang par gzhug par dang //
NK013(pa)015:3157: mkhyen rab ye shes bdag la stsol //
NK013(pa)015:3158: lan gsum du gsol ba gdab /
NK013(pa)015:3160: khyod ni dga' ba ci la dga' /
NK013(pa)015:3162: / khyod ni dad pa ci la dad //
NK013(pa)015:3163: khyod ni mos pa ci la mos //
NK013(pa)015:3164: khyod kyi 'dod pa ji lta bar //
NK013(pa)015:3165: da lta nyid du smra bar gyis //
NK013(pa)015:3167: bdag cag skal ldan rigs kyi bu //
NK013(pa)015:3168: rab dgyes sems la bdag cag dga' /
NK013(pa)015:3170: / mchod don nyid la bdag cag dang //
NK013(pa)015:3171: skal ba bzang la bdag dga' 'o //
NK013(pa)015:3173: bu 'dir shog gcig ci bde bar //
NK013(pa)015:3174: las spyod rim par 'gro ba dang //
NK013(pa)015:3175: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung //
NK013(pa)015:3176: rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen la //
NK013(pa)015:3177: dmigs pa med par gnas phyir du //
NK013(pa)015:3178: ser sna spangs pa'i dang yid kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3179: gtor zhing rang sems brtan por zung //
NK013(pa)015:3180: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rdzogs dbang sbyin //
NK013(pa)015:3182: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK013(pa)015:3185: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang //
NK013(pa)015:3186: dbang phyug da ltar sangs rgyas dang //
NK013(pa)015:3187: ma 'ongs rang bzhin sems can la //
NK013(pa)015:3188: dgos pa gcig phyir lus 'brul bya //
NK013(pa)015:3190: sarba bud+d+ha p+au dzo sa s+th+aa na ya +aat+m+aa nam nir+y+aa ta y+aa mi /
NK013(pa)015:3192: +aa tsar+y+aa p+au tso ba s+tha n+aa ya ar+m+aa nam nir+y+aa ta y+aa mi /
NK013(pa)015:3194: ba sha la sa t+wa p+au tso ba s+tha n+aa ya +aar+m+aa na nir+y+aa ta y+aa mi /
NK013(pa)015:3195: lnga pa ni phyi bgegs dang /
NK013(pa)015:3198: b+h+r+aum slob bu'i dung khang gzhal yas khang //
NK013(pa)015:3199: gnam sgo gcig pa zla gam nang //
NK013(pa)015:3200: h+aum las h+aum mdzad bum 'dzin sngo //
NK013(pa)015:3201: ho la gtum chen mi g.yo ljang //
NK013(pa)015:3202: ral gri sdigs mdzub am gtsig bsdam /
NK013(pa)015:3204: / 'jigs par gzigs pas sgo srung gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3205: badz+ra h'u k+aa ra h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:3206: badz+ra kro d+ha ar+y+aa a tsa la h'u phata /
NK013(pa)015:3207: +aa ko ros lan chags nag po rnams bgegs la bsngo /
NK013(pa)015:3208: h+aum bzhi pa dang dz+wa la badz+ra'i sngags brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3210: sa yi phyogs 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid
NK013(pa)015:3211: 'dug cing dbang blang ba la bar du gcod pa
NK013(pa)015:3212: thams cad rgyang ring du song zhig /
NK013(pa)015:3214: gong gi khro bo bcu'i sngags brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3215: thugs ka nas sprul pa'i khro bo bsam gyis mi khyab pas /
NK013(pa)015:3216: mnyam por 'ong ba'i bdud la sogs pa rgyang ring du bkrad par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3217: gnyis pa la sngags dang phyag rgyas bsal ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:3219: gtso bo'i phyag sor nyi zla bcur /
NK013(pa)015:3222: m+aum l+aam m+aam p+aam t+aam mtshan pa /
NK013(pa)015:3223: rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3230: rigs lnga yab yum mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:3231: sbyor mtshams byang sems 'od zer gyis /
NK013(pa)015:3233: / 'khor ba thog med sdig sgrib kun //
NK013(pa)015:3234: bya sgro me la bsreg bzhin sbyangs //
NK013(pa)015:3236: rigs kyi bu rnams kyi rgyud la yod pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3237: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3239: lta ba dman pa'i sgrib pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3240: chos kyis 'phongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3241: bag chags ngan pa'i sgrib pa la sogs te sgrib
NK013(pa)015:3242: pa'i phung po ji snyed cig mchis pa thams cad
NK013(pa)015:3245: zhes brjod de phyag rgya sprugs /
NK013(pa)015:3247: rdo rje gnod sbyin sreg khang ni //
NK013(pa)015:3248: rdza las byas pa'i gnod sbyin sku //
NK013(pa)015:3249: g.yas g.yon phag rgod mche ba 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:3250: gdan ni spos phor dbyibs su ste //
NK013(pa)015:3252: khro bo'i rol pas 'gying bzhin bzhugs //
NK013(pa)015:3253: zhal gdangs lto ba'i nang dag tu //
NK013(pa)015:3254: me sbar de la til phul lam //
NK013(pa)015:3255: yang na mar me bzang por bya //
NK013(pa)015:3256: rang gi snying gar pad+ma nag /
NK013(pa)015:3257: 'dab brgyad lte bar sdig sgrib pam //
NK013(pa)015:3258: lte bar me dkyil gru gsum steng //
NK013(pa)015:3259: yi ge h+aum gzugs mthing nag gsal //
NK013(pa)015:3260: gsang gnas rlung ljang gzhu dbyibs rgyas //
NK013(pa)015:3261: bla ma lha yi thugs ka nas /
NK013(pa)015:3263: / 'od zer phra la myur ba byung //
NK013(pa)015:3264: gsang gnas rlung g.yos me sbar nas //
NK013(pa)015:3265: de nyid dbu rkyang ro mar bzhugs //
NK013(pa)015:3266: sdig sgrib thams cad pam la bstim //
NK013(pa)015:3267: lus rtsa thams cad gsal zhing stong //
NK013(pa)015:3268: dag pa ye shes bdud rtsis gang //
NK013(pa)015:3269: pad ma de yi pam la thim //
NK013(pa)015:3270: de mal ye shes me yis gang //
NK013(pa)015:3271: pam gyur sdig pa rid skam gsal //
NK013(pa)015:3272: lte ba'i h'u de gyen 'phags pas //
NK013(pa)015:3273: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin ni //
NK013(pa)015:3274: zhal gcig 'jigs lta mche ba gtsigs //
NK013(pa)015:3275: phyag gnyis phag rgod mche ba 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:3276: shin tu 'jigs rung cha byad can //
NK013(pa)015:3277: nag la gsus che skra ser bardzesa //
NK013(pa)015:3278: snying gar yar la byon tsa na //
NK013(pa)015:3279: sdig pa de nyid mgrin par bros //
NK013(pa)015:3280: khro de mgrin par byon tsa na //
NK013(pa)015:3281: sdig pa sna sgo g.yas su bud //
NK013(pa)015:3282: de rjes khro bo cher rngams pas //
NK013(pa)015:3283: byon nas sdig pa de nyid zos //
NK013(pa)015:3284: stong nyid ngang du rang bzhin med //
NK013(pa)015:3285: des na khro bo sna g.yon nas //
NK013(pa)015:3286: tshur zhugs lus nang khro bo gang //
NK013(pa)015:3288: sarba p+aa pam da ha na b+ha smim ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:3291: bdag dang mtha' yas sogs kun rdzob sems bskyed dang /
NK013(pa)015:3293: ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos sogs don dam sems bskyed gnyis sgrub thabs bzhin brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3296: stong pa'i nyid dang snying rje sgyu ma'i rang mdangs sems nyid h'u du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3299: 'phro 'dus rdo rje rtse lnga sngon po h'u gis mtshan par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3302: 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las pad nyi zla
NK013(pa)015:3303: ba la bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
NK013(pa)015:3305: rdo rje dang dril bu bsnol thabs su 'dzin pa
NK013(pa)015:3306: longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rgyan thams cad rdzogs shing skyil
NK013(pa)015:3308: so so'i phyag rgya mgo bo'i gnas bzhag ste /
NK013(pa)015:3309: ma h+aa sh+au nya ta sogs rigs lnga'i sngags brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3310: spyi bo'i gnas lngar rigs lnga yab yum gyis mtshan par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3311: gnad lngar rtse lnga'i rgya gtugs te sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra nas /
NK013(pa)015:3313: spyi bor zla ba gnas pa'i dkar po sogs nas mtshan pa rnams kyis rgyal btags par gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3314: dpal ldan sangs rgyas lnga 'chang ba //
NK013(pa)015:3315: rdo rje mi phyed lnga'i rang bzhin //
NK013(pa)015:3316: deng 'dir byin gyis brlab nas ni //
NK013(pa)015:3317: rdo rje lnga ru mdzad du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:3319: badz+ra k+aa w+aa tsi rak+shah mdzub mo g.yas na h+aum nag po /
NK013(pa)015:3321: h+aum a zhes gnas drug tu bsnol /
NK013(pa)015:3322: bdun pa dam tshig sbyin pa'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa /
NK013(pa)015:3323: a la la ste mchod par 'bul //
NK013(pa)015:3324: a la la ste mnyes par mdzod //
NK013(pa)015:3325: a la la ste dam tshig skor //
NK013(pa)015:3326: a la la ste dngos grub stsol //
NK013(pa)015:3327: rdzas sum cu pa sbyar ba'i dam rdzas lce la slob dpon gyis rtsal bar mos te /
NK013(pa)015:3328: rdo rje rtses nang mchod nas blangs pa lce la myang bzhin /
NK013(pa)015:3330: sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+ai th+aah rdo rje lnga yi dam tshig thob par gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3332: rdo rje snying gar bzung la /
NK013(pa)015:3333: de ring phyin chad bu khyod kyi //
NK013(pa)015:3334: rdo rje 'chang chen nga yin pas //
NK013(pa)015:3335: nga yis ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin //
NK013(pa)015:3336: khyed kyis kyang ni bya dgos so //
NK013(pa)015:3337: nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
NK013(pa)015:3338: sdug bsngal kun dang ma bral bar //
NK013(pa)015:3339: tshe yi 'du byed byas nas ni //
NK013(pa)015:3340: sems can dmyal bar chen por ltung //
NK013(pa)015:3341: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'di //
NK013(pa)015:3342: dam nyams ma 'dres med pa la //
NK013(pa)015:3343: nam yang smra bar ma byed cig /
NK013(pa)015:3344: theg pa chen po ston byed pa //
NK013(pa)015:3345: nga la brnyas dang smad mi rung //
NK013(pa)015:3346: sku gsung thugs la rtag gnas shing //
NK013(pa)015:3347: ma lus sems can don gyis shig /
NK013(pa)015:3348: deng khyod de ring gshegs kun gyi //
NK013(pa)015:3349: rigs su zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor che //
NK013(pa)015:3350: ma mthong ba la ma smra zhig /
NK013(pa)015:3351: gsang ba'i dngos sgrub gsang ste sgrubs //
NK013(pa)015:3352: sarba ta th+aa ga t+aa ma h+aa badz+ra sa t+wa sa ma ya h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:3353: dgu pa chu nan la nyes dmigs dang /
NK013(pa)015:3359: dza ti te dri lnga rnams sbyar ba'i dung zhal gyi chu la /
NK013(pa)015:3362: mi dmigs pa stong nyid kyi ngang la h+aum las khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3366: lha 'od du zhu ba chu yi rdul phra rab tu gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3367: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed /
NK013(pa)015:3368: rdo rje khro bo chen por gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3369: rdo rje'i chu 'di btung bar gyis //
NK013(pa)015:3371: gnyis pa slar yang chu de bsang sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:3372: stong pa'i ngang las h'u las rdo rje h'u mtshan
NK013(pa)015:3373: yongs su gyur pa las dpal rdo rje mi bskyod
NK013(pa)015:3374: par gyur / e h+ya his drangs /
NK013(pa)015:3376: badz+ra sa t+wa ah lha 'od du zhu ba las bdud rtsir gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3377: de lta bas na bu khyod kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3378: dam tshig 'di dag srung bar gyis //
NK013(pa)015:3379: de bzhin byas na dngos grub 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:3383: thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3384: rtag tu dgos pa med gyis la /
NK013(pa)015:3386: / 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod //
NK013(pa)015:3387: gzhan yang stong khams thams cad na //
NK013(pa)015:3388: shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon gzhan //
NK013(pa)015:3389: rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod //
NK013(pa)015:3390: gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:3391: skye bo gang zhig dam la gnod //
NK013(pa)015:3392: brtul zhugs can gyis de drongs la //
NK013(pa)015:3393: khrag chen snying las btung bar gyis /
NK013(pa)015:3395: / 'di la mi bya cung zad med //
NK013(pa)015:3396: sems nyid thegs par rab nges na //
NK013(pa)015:3397: nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang //
NK013(pa)015:3399: tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs //
NK013(pa)015:3400: bya dang mi bya cung zad med //
NK013(pa)015:3401: byas la mi sogs tshogs chen rdzogs //
NK013(pa)015:3402: bla med byang sems mi spang zhing //
NK013(pa)015:3403: bla ma snying ltar bsten cing bkur //
NK013(pa)015:3404: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK013(pa)015:3405: yang dag lam du zhugs la byams //
NK013(pa)015:3406: gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya /
NK013(pa)015:3408: / 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te //
NK013(pa)015:3409: bsgrub dang srung ba'i dam tshig mchog /
NK013(pa)015:3410: gti mug chags dang zhe sdang che //
NK013(pa)015:3411: nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo //
NK013(pa)015:3412: dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen //
NK013(pa)015:3413: dag pa'i snod bcud mi 'dor ro //
NK013(pa)015:3414: dam tshig ma lus bzung bar gyis //
NK013(pa)015:3415: zhar byung dam bzung ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:3416: bla ma dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK013(pa)015:3417: bla med mi spang nas bsam pa 'grub gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:3418: ces pa'i bar sgrub thabs las 'byung ba ltar lan gsum brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3419: man ngag gis de yan phyir 'jug tu mdzad nas /
NK013(pa)015:3420: nang 'jug gi dang po sgo dbye bar gsol ba gdab ste /
NK013(pa)015:3421: bde chen lhun grub gzhal yas 'dir //
NK013(pa)015:3422: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi nas //
NK013(pa)015:3423: tsha da med thugs rjes sgo phyes te //
NK013(pa)015:3424: byams pa'i zhal rnams bstan du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:3425: slob dpon gyis gnang ba sbyin pa /
NK013(pa)015:3426: e ma skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs /
NK013(pa)015:3428: / 'khor ba'i lam sgo kun bcad de //
NK013(pa)015:3429: byang chub lam du gzud pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3430: rdo rje'i gsang sgo dbye bar bya //
NK013(pa)015:3432: yang gsol ba btab nas 'jug pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:3434: h+aum sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni /
NK013(pa)015:3437: mchog chen mnyam par sbyar bas na //
NK013(pa)015:3438: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /
NK013(pa)015:3439: sarba t+aa th+aa ga t+aa na mo h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:3444: zhes thal mo spyi mgrin snying ga gsum du bkod /
NK013(pa)015:3445: tshe rabs 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig pa la gnong 'gyod kyi blos /
NK013(pa)015:3446: badz+ra sa t+wa sa ma ya sogs yi ge brgya pa brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3447: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad gangs ri la
NK013(pa)015:3448: nyi ma shar ba lta bu thugs kyis dgongs zhal
NK013(pa)015:3449: gyis phyogs spyan gyis gzigs pa dang zhal mjal bar
NK013(pa)015:3450: gyur / de dag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer dkar po dang /
NK013(pa)015:3451: mthing ka bskal pa'i me dpung lta bus lus ngag
NK013(pa)015:3452: yid gsum gyi rtog sgrib thams cad spyangs nas rig
NK013(pa)015:3453: pa'i ngo bo h+aum dkar po gtso bo'i thugs kar
NK013(pa)015:3454: thim / yang lho sgo nas sngar bzhin gsol 'debs phyag yig brgya brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3455: lha tshogs thams cad gser ri la nyi ma sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:3456: 'od zer ser po bskal pa'i sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:3457: rig pa'i ngo bo s+w+aa ser po sogs bsgyur /
NK013(pa)015:3458: yang nub sgo nas gsol 'debs phyag yig brgya dang /
NK013(pa)015:3459: lha tshogs thams cad pad ma ra ga'i ri bo la nyi ma sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:3461: rig pa'i ngo bo +aam dmar po sogs 'don pa spo /
NK013(pa)015:3462: yang byang sgo nas gsol 'debs phyag /
NK013(pa)015:3463: na mo karma ku ru h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:3466: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mrgad kyi ri bo la sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:3467: 'od zer ljang ku bskal pa'i sogs dang /
NK013(pa)015:3468: rig pa'i ngo bo h+aa ljang gu sogs barje zhing /
NK013(pa)015:3469: dkyil 'khor la dngos su skor de ltar bya ba'am /
NK013(pa)015:3470: de ltar mos pas las kyi rdo rjes de dang
NK013(pa)015:3471: der phyin nas phyag dang bcas te mtha' dkris bsal
NK013(pa)015:3473: b+h+r+aum pra we sha ya phata /
NK013(pa)015:3474: ces pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo phye ste gzhi dus su stong pa nyid dang /
NK013(pa)015:3477: 'od gsal ba ste rnam par thar ba bzhi dang /
NK013(pa)015:3478: lam dus su thabs sbyin pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3481: don spyod pa ste bsdu dngos bzhi dang /
NK013(pa)015:3485: btang snyoms te dmigs pa med pa'i tshad med bzhi yis don rdzogs pa'i phyir du /
NK013(pa)015:3489: rjes su yi rang ba bzhi'i phyag gis /
NK013(pa)015:3490: 'bras dus su zhi rgyas dbang drag gi dngos grub bzhi 'grub pa'i rten 'brel bsgrigs pa yin no //
NK013(pa)015:3492: mthar slob dpon gtso bo gnyis pa'i tshul gyis shar
NK013(pa)015:3493: sgo nas slob ma 'jug pa'i gsol ba btab par
NK013(pa)015:3494: mos pas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
