NK013(pa)015:3496: bdag gis skal ldan bzhugs par bgyi /
NK013(pa)015:3498: / 'dir ni dngos grub ci yod dang //
NK013(pa)015:3499: rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3501: / 'di na bsags pa ci yod dang //
NK013(pa)015:3504: bcu gcig pa rin po che dor ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:3505: tshe rabs sngon nas 'brel pa gang yin pa de
NK013(pa)015:3506: la bab par shog snyams pas dngos su dkyil 'khor
NK013(pa)015:3507: ram / do rwa'i dbus su rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lam mer bzhugs par bsams pas /
NK013(pa)015:3508: me tog la sogs rin chen phreng //
NK013(pa)015:3509: sngon tshe ye shes bsnyen pa'i lha //
NK013(pa)015:3510: thugs rjes bzung bar dgongs nas kyang //
NK013(pa)015:3511: gang yin de la 'bab gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:3512: badz+ra sa ma ya pra tits+tsha hoh zhes 'dor bas dbus su rdo rje /
NK013(pa)015:3516: byang du las rigs rnams ngos zin par bya /
NK013(pa)015:3517: gang la bab pa'i lha des spyi bor me tog bkod par bsam /
NK013(pa)015:3518: pra ti grih+na i mam sa t+wa ma h+aa ba la tish+tha /
NK013(pa)015:3520: yang slob mas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rgya snying gar bkod de /
NK013(pa)015:3521: lha mi spang bar dam bca' ba'i phyir /
NK013(pa)015:3522: srog chags thams cad gal te bdud gyur nas //
NK013(pa)015:3523: dum bu stong du bdag gi lus gtub kyang //
NK013(pa)015:3524: byang chub sems mchog shes rab snying rje dang //
NK013(pa)015:3525: yi dam rgyal ba khyod ni yongs mi spong //
NK013(pa)015:3527: gang la bab pa'i lha'i snying po las /
NK013(pa)015:3531: bcu gnyis pa lha dbab la ni /
NK013(pa)015:3532: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
NK013(pa)015:3533: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po //
NK013(pa)015:3534: de nyid gsang ba dam pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:3535: rdo rje'i ye shes dbab tu gsol //
NK013(pa)015:3537: slob bus lus gnad drangs por bsrangs /
NK013(pa)015:3538: ngag rlung rgyu rang sor bzhag /
NK013(pa)015:3539: snying gi dbus su chu nan gyi ye shes pa
NK013(pa)015:3540: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rgyan dang phyag mtshan thams
NK013(pa)015:3541: cad yongs su rdzogs pa chos sku las gzugs skur
NK013(pa)015:3542: bzhengs / 'og min nas rdo rje sems dpa'i sku
NK013(pa)015:3543: che chung bsam gyis mi khyab pa byon nas bzhugs
NK013(pa)015:3544: bzhengs / / slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug
NK013(pa)015:3545: gi thugs ka nas lha mo lcags kyu ma grangs
NK013(pa)015:3546: bzhengs / / med pa 'phros / ye shes pa'i
NK013(pa)015:3547: lha tshogs bkug ste steng thams cad yam yam shig
NK013(pa)015:3549: slob dpon gyi lcags kyu'i rgya bca' bar mos pas lcags kyu'i rgya dang bcas /
NK013(pa)015:3550: badz+ra sat+wa e h+ya hi b+ha ga w+aana ma h+aa
NK013(pa)015:3551: ka ru ni ka dri sh+ya hoh sa ma ya
NK013(pa)015:3553: dzahh+aum bam hoh 'phags mchog thugs rjes sogs macha sa par mdzod /
NK013(pa)015:3554: h'u h+aum h+aum h+aum bar sgrubs thabs 'byung bar ltar brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3557: rkang mthil du ya las rlung g.yos /
NK013(pa)015:3560: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku las bdud rtsi bab pas bde ba bzod med du 'bar /
NK013(pa)015:3561: bar snang la yam yam bskyod pa la slob dpon
NK013(pa)015:3562: gtso bos phyag spyi bor bkod bden stobs brjod par
NK013(pa)015:3563: gyur / na mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i bde bar
NK013(pa)015:3564: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan
NK013(pa)015:3565: phrin las mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i bden
NK013(pa)015:3566: gyur / pa dang / rgyal ba rgya mtsho /
NK013(pa)015:3568: smin pa rgya mtsho'i bka' ba rgyud kyi bla ma rin po che rnams kyi bden pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3569: chos nyid chos can gdod nas dag cing bslu ba med pa'i bden pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3570: bcom ldan 'das thugs sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba rdo rje
NK013(pa)015:3571: sems dpa' zhi ba rnam par rol pa'i bden pa
NK013(pa)015:3572: dang / bden pa chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis /
NK013(pa)015:3573: rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyi snying la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gnas par gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:3574: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs //
NK013(pa)015:3575: dam tshig rnams las mi 'da' na /
NK013(pa)015:3578: phyi ma rdo rje 'chang thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:3579: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'di //
NK013(pa)015:3580: spong bar byed na ye shes sems //
NK013(pa)015:3581: rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid gyur nas //
NK013(pa)015:3582: srog rtsa'i khrag chen 'jig gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:3583: b+h+r+aum pra we sha ya phata /
NK013(pa)015:3584: ces snying ga'i sgo phyes pa'i nang du nam mkha'
NK013(pa)015:3585: khyab pa'i lha tshogs thams cad sib sib thim nas
NK013(pa)015:3586: brtan par gyur / gtso sngags mthar /
NK013(pa)015:3588: a we sha ya a a ah ra ra ra tsa la ya /
NK013(pa)015:3589: tsa la ya h+aum a stam b+ha ya ha dz+heem /
NK013(pa)015:3590: mang du bzla tish+tha badz+ra sa brtan par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:3591: bcu gsum pa nan tan ni /
NK013(pa)015:3592: rdo rje sems dpa' rigs kyi lha //
NK013(pa)015:3593: skal pa mnyam pa'i ye shes te //
NK013(pa)015:3594: gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba yis //
NK013(pa)015:3595: ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges //
NK013(pa)015:3596: dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3597: lha spang dge spyad don med de //
NK013(pa)015:3598: gang zhig phyag rgya 'di spang na //
NK013(pa)015:3599: nyon mongs ngan song gnas su skye //
NK013(pa)015:3601: bla med 'gro ba'i rgyun yang chad //
NK013(pa)015:3602: rigs chad nyid du gnas par 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3603: de ni lha spang ba'i nyes da mig gi sgo nas nan tan brjod pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:3605: bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor nas //
NK013(pa)015:3607: gcig dang du mar yongs bral ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:3609: de ni 'grol ba'i sgo nas yon tan dang /
NK013(pa)015:3610: gang la thar pa'i lha mi spong bar nan tan brjod pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:3611: bcu bzhi pa mig dbye ba ni /
NK013(pa)015:3612: gser thur sor brgyad pa la /
NK013(pa)015:3614: dbang phyug gi thugs ka nas 'od zer byung /
NK013(pa)015:3615: ma rig ba'i ling thog bsal nas dag pa ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan par bsam /
NK013(pa)015:3616: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3617: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
NK013(pa)015:3618: phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3619: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
NK013(pa)015:3620: badz+ra tsak+shu pra we sha ya phata /
NK013(pa)015:3622: bco lnga pa mthong ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK013(pa)015:3623: slob dpon gyis phyag shing gis bstan par thos pas /
NK013(pa)015:3625: de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni //
NK013(pa)015:3626: dkyil 'khor dam pa blta bar bya //
NK013(pa)015:3627: sangs rgyas gang gi rigs su 'khrung //
NK013(pa)015:3628: dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur bar bya //
NK013(pa)015:3630: da ni dad pa rab skyed cig /
NK013(pa)015:3631: sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs //
NK013(pa)015:3632: dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur ba yis //
NK013(pa)015:3633: rdo rje pad+mo rol mo'i mchog /
NK013(pa)015:3634: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab //
NK013(pa)015:3635: dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs //
NK013(pa)015:3636: gsang sngags rnams ni grub par gyis //
NK013(pa)015:3638: chos rnams thams cad dmigs med pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:3639: dbyings su thim nas 'od zer gsal //
NK013(pa)015:3640: gcig dang bral ba thams cad med //
NK013(pa)015:3641: dkyil 'khor spros med zlum pa'i tshul //
NK013(pa)015:3642: rang rig ye nas mya ngan 'das //
NK013(pa)015:3643: ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul //
NK013(pa)015:3644: chos kyi 'khor lor yongs kyis bskor //
NK013(pa)015:3645: thugs rje'i byin rlabs spros pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:3646: ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro //
NK013(pa)015:3647: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga //
NK013(pa)015:3648: byin rlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab //
NK013(pa)015:3649: rang gsal snang ba'i thabs las byung //
NK013(pa)015:3650: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3651: mtha' dbus med par rgyas par gnas //
NK013(pa)015:3653: de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar //
NK013(pa)015:3654: sa rnams khyad par bkod pas na //
NK013(pa)015:3655: der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan //
NK013(pa)015:3656: rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3657: nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing //
NK013(pa)015:3658: ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3660: zag med ye shes gter gyur pa //
NK013(pa)015:3661: yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan /
NK013(pa)015:3663: / 'bras bu'i chos rnams yongs rdzogs phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3664: seng ge la sogs btegs pa yin //
NK013(pa)015:3665: ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'ad'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3666: t+aa la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas //
NK013(pa)015:3667: re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3668: dpag bsam shing dang rin chen 'bar //
NK013(pa)015:3669: thams cad la ni dbang bsgyur phyir /
NK013(pa)015:3671: / 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor //
NK013(pa)015:3672: thams cad rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3673: sgyu 'phrul bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3674: thams cad lha ni rtag tu sbyor //
NK013(pa)015:3675: thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog /
NK013(pa)015:3678: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te /
NK013(pa)015:3680: lha chen phyogs skyong brgyad kyis bskor /
NK013(pa)015:3682: nga phyir rdo rje thugs chud pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:3686: yang na snga ma'i rjes su /
NK013(pa)015:3687: de dbus bzhugs pa'i lha tshogs ni /
NK013(pa)015:3689: / 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
NK013(pa)015:3690: sogs pa byin rlabs skabs su /
NK013(pa)015:3693: de dang rjes 'brel rten brten pa'i de kho na nyid ni /
NK013(pa)015:3694: thar pa chen po'i pho brang du /
NK013(pa)015:3695: bsdu ba'i dngos po sgo bzhi ste //
NK013(pa)015:3696: tshad med bzhi yi grwa bzhi'o /
NK013(pa)015:3698: / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam bzhi ngos //
NK013(pa)015:3699: ye shes lnga yi kha dog lnga'i //
NK013(pa)015:3700: rtsig pa rim pa lnga pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:3702: rnam thar brgyad po rta babs so //
NK013(pa)015:3705: / 'phags lam yan lag ka ba brgyad //
NK013(pa)015:3706: rnam par thar pa'i sgo logs bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:3708: rnam shes chos dbyings mi bskyod pa //
NK013(pa)015:3709: gzugs phung me long rnam snang mdzad //
NK013(pa)015:3710: tshor ba mnyam nyid rin chen 'byung /
NK013(pa)015:3714: / 'du byed bya grub don yon grub //
NK013(pa)015:3715: sa chu me rlung mkha' yum lnga //
NK013(pa)015:3716: mig sna lce rna shes dbang brgyad //
NK013(pa)015:3718: da lta ma nges dus brgyad bcas //
NK013(pa)015:3719: sems dpa' yab yum bcu drug tshogs //
NK013(pa)015:3720: yid chos bya ba byed pa po //
NK013(pa)015:3721: nga rgyal phrag dog 'dod chags ni //
NK013(pa)015:3722: brgya byin thag bzang sh+aakya thub //
NK013(pa)015:3723: gti mug ser sna zhe sdang rnams //
NK013(pa)015:3724: seng ge kha 'bar chos rgyal te //
NK013(pa)015:3725: shes dbang reg bya lus byung bcas //
NK013(pa)015:3726: rtag chad bdag mtshon sgo ba bzhi //
NK013(pa)015:3727: yum bcas dag pa shar ba'o //
NK013(pa)015:3729: tshogs kyis mchod pa btegs nas sngags 'bul tsam dang yig brgya bzla /
NK013(pa)015:3730: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyi yon tan ni /
NK013(pa)015:3731: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bar legs zhugs pas //
NK013(pa)015:3732: phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:3733: dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin //
NK013(pa)015:3734: de ni dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa thams cad du zhugs pa'i yon tan no //
NK013(pa)015:3735: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i /
NK013(pa)015:3737: / 'khor lor sngon du mthong ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:3738: bsod nams brtag pa gang yin pa //
NK013(pa)015:3739: phyis byas pa yang de bzhin no //
NK013(pa)015:3740: de mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pas rang gi
NK013(pa)015:3741: 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang skal ba
NK013(pa)015:3743: gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa //
NK013(pa)015:3744: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3745: phyogs dus kun nas thams cad kyi //
NK013(pa)015:3746: phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du //
NK013(pa)015:3747: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:3748: nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3749: de ni mos pa'i yon tan no //
NK013(pa)015:3750: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs nges shing //
NK013(pa)015:3751: gdon rnams bzlog cing ngan song spong //
NK013(pa)015:3752: longs spyod 'du ba rnam gnyis dang //
NK013(pa)015:3753: ye shes spyan gyi gzhi ru nges //
NK013(pa)015:3754: de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog /
NK013(pa)015:3755: ces dam tshig ma nyams na dngos grub rab 'byams 'grub pa'i yon tan no //
NK013(pa)015:3756: de dag dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
NK013(pa)015:3757: gnyis pa zhugs pa la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga
NK013(pa)015:3758: la gsum dang po phyi phan dbang bcu la sngon
NK013(pa)015:3762: gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rin chen ldan //
NK013(pa)015:3765: man+dala bkod pa phul byung 'di nyid bla ma dang
NK013(pa)015:3766: 'khor lo'i bdag po la slob ma la phan pa'i
NK013(pa)015:3767: dbang zhu ba'i don dbul bar bagyi'o //
NK013(pa)015:3769: bdag gi lus dang longs spyod dang //
NK013(pa)015:3770: dus gsum dge ba thams cad kyang //
NK013(pa)015:3771: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3772: phongs pa med par 'bul bar bya //
NK013(pa)015:3774: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid //
NK013(pa)015:3775: brtse bar dgongs te bdag la yang //
NK013(pa)015:3776: dbang bskur bdud rtsi chen po nyid //
NK013(pa)015:3777: de ring rab tu gsal bar mdzod //
NK013(pa)015:3779: slob ma dkyil 'khor shar sgo'i nang rol dbang stegs
NK013(pa)015:3780: la rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par 'khod par gyur
NK013(pa)015:3782: sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi //
NK013(pa)015:3783: gsang ba rdo rje gsum las byung //
NK013(pa)015:3784: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
NK013(pa)015:3785: dbang bskur gnang ba chen po sbyin //
NK013(pa)015:3786: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros phyogs
NK013(pa)015:3787: bcu dus bzhi'i bsam yas lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor
NK013(pa)015:3788: thams cad rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rnam
NK013(pa)015:3789: pa gdan gsum tshang ba'i dbang lha nam mkha' gang
NK013(pa)015:3790: ba badz+ra sa m+aa dzah zhes rdo rje bsdu rgya
NK013(pa)015:3791: bcas snyan brnan / e h+ya his drangs /
NK013(pa)015:3797: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
NK013(pa)015:3798: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar /
NK013(pa)015:3800: / 'di yang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:3801: nam mkha'i rdo rjes dbang bskur stsol //
NK013(pa)015:3803: slob dpon bdag gis brtse ba la //
NK013(pa)015:3804: mthu stsol dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs //
NK013(pa)015:3805: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
NK013(pa)015:3807: rdo rje shugs kyis bsgral nas kyang //
NK013(pa)015:3808: byin brlab dam pa nod par bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:3809: zhes lha la gsol ba btab pas lhas dbugs dbyugs zhing slob dpon gyis dam bca' brtan par gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3810: gnyis pa la dang po bum dbang dang /
NK013(pa)015:3811: dang po rgyud dang las rim las snying po lnga sngon du gsungs mod /
NK013(pa)015:3812: man ngag gis bum pa sngon du mdzad pas /
NK013(pa)015:3815: dbang rdzas bum pa stong pa nyid du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3816: stong pa'i ngang las pad nyi gdan lnga la h'u
NK013(pa)015:3817: +amo s+w+aa +aam h+aa rnams las so so'i phyag mtshan
NK013(pa)015:3818: yi ge de dag gis mtshan pa /
NK013(pa)015:3819: 'phro 'dus de yongs su gyur pa las /
NK013(pa)015:3820: mi bskyod pa mthing ka dbyings phyug mar bcas rdo rje /
NK013(pa)015:3821: rnam snang dkar po sangs rgyas spyan bcas 'khor lo //
NK013(pa)015:3822: rin 'byung ser po m+aa ma ki bcas rin po che /
NK013(pa)015:3823: snang mtha' dmar po gos dkar bcas pad+ma /
NK013(pa)015:3824: don grub ljang gu sgrol ma bcas ral gri rnams g.yas dang /
NK013(pa)015:3825: g.yon dril bu bsnol thabs su 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)015:3826: yum rnams g.yas yab la 'khyud cing /
NK013(pa)015:3827: g.yon dril bu 'dzin pas yab la 'khril ba /
NK013(pa)015:3828: yab rnams rdzogs skyil du bzhugs shing longs sku'i rgyan can no //
NK013(pa)015:3836: yab yum mnyam par sbyor ba'i rjes chags kyi zhu ba las byung ba'i dbang rdzas bum par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3837: de yang rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams /
NK013(pa)015:3838: dbang bskur ba'i dgongs pa mdzad /
NK013(pa)015:3839: rigs kyi yum bzhis bum chu mgo bo'i gnas lngar
NK013(pa)015:3840: gtigs shing rtsa gnas thig les gang ba la dbang
NK013(pa)015:3842: sems dpa' rnams kyis bkra shis brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3843: rdo rje'i lha mo rig ma rnams kyis mchod pa 'bul /
NK013(pa)015:3844: khro bo rnams kyis bgegs bskrad de dbang gi bya ba la brtson par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3845: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
NK013(pa)015:3846: kun gyis bdag nyid rigs kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /
NK013(pa)015:3847: sems can ma lus skyed byed bde ba chen po ste //
NK013(pa)015:3848: bkra shis des ni de ring dbang mchog dam pa bskur //
NK013(pa)015:3849: bum pa mang po yod na gtso bo'i nang du bsdu /
NK013(pa)015:3850: las rdor gyis phyag bcas phrag 'geb kyis bum pa thogs te /
NK013(pa)015:3851: til gyi gang bu ltar gang ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:3852: rgyal ba bum pa 'dzin pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:3853: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ba //
NK013(pa)015:3854: de ltar shes nas yid bder byos //
NK013(pa)015:3856: kha brgyan gyi chu gtor zhing /
NK013(pa)015:3857: bum pa zlum po pho brang du //
NK013(pa)015:3858: snod bcud ma lus kun bsdus nas //
NK013(pa)015:3859: thig le chen por rgyas btab pas //
NK013(pa)015:3860: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yin //
NK013(pa)015:3861: h+aum badz+ra k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:3867: h+aa karma mgo'i byang du gtugs te slar khrus dang btung bar bcas /
NK013(pa)015:3868: ji ltar bltams pa sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:3870: phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3871: yang dag dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i bdag /
NK013(pa)015:3872: nyon mongs dri ma kun sel ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:3873: bum pa'i chu yis dag par 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3874: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi shi ka te sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:3875: s+w+aa b+h+aa wa bi sh+aud+d+he sarba d+h+aar+m+aa b+h+aa wa sh+aud+d+ho&a ham /
NK013(pa)015:3877: de ltar bum pas dbang bskur sku gang dri ma
NK013(pa)015:3878: dag chu yi lhag ma gyen du lud mi bskyod
NK013(pa)015:3879: pas dbu brgyan / de la sgeg mo brgyad kyis mchod /
NK013(pa)015:3880: dag pa smon lam bcas bden stobs 'di man 'grel /
NK013(pa)015:3881: na mo dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)015:3882: dkon mchog gsum dang brgyud gsum bla ma dam pa rnams kyis bden pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:3883: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i bde bar gshegs pa mi zad
NK013(pa)015:3884: rgyan gyi 'khor lor 'dus pa dpal rdo rje sems
NK013(pa)015:3885: dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i bden pa chen pos smon
NK013(pa)015:3886: pa'i don 'di yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig
NK013(pa)015:3887: / bkra shis rin chen mdzes pa'i bum pa 'dis //
NK013(pa)015:3888: skal ldan rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:3889: nyon mongs lnga yi dri ma kun dag nas //
NK013(pa)015:3890: ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i dbang thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:3891: gnyis pa la bcu yi dang po rab gnas /
NK013(pa)015:3893: dbang rdzas rnams stong pa nyid du gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3894: stong pa'i ngang las de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan snying po lnga dang /
NK013(pa)015:3895: dbu brgyan rin chen 'byung ldan zhu ba'i rin po
NK013(pa)015:3896: che'i khang bu lnga pa'i nang du re re nas
NK013(pa)015:3897: pad nyi zla gdan lnga lnga la h+aum +amo s+w+aa
NK013(pa)015:3901: dar mthing dmar cod pan h+aum +aam las rdo rje
NK013(pa)015:3902: dang pad+ma yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa
NK013(pa)015:3904: rin po che'i phreng ba s+w+aa dang rin po che las rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum /
NK013(pa)015:3905: go cha h+aa dang ral gri las don grub yab yum /
NK013(pa)015:3906: rgyal mtshan dang gdugs re re nas h+aum dang rdo rje las mi bskyod yab yum /
NK013(pa)015:3907: bza' btung dang 'khor lo las rnam snang yab yum rnams su gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3908: thun mong du lnga tshan lngas bskur brlab /
NK013(pa)015:3914: lha thams cad 'od du zhu bas dbang rdzas so sor gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3915: gnyis pa snying po lnga yi dbang ni /
NK013(pa)015:3917: rdo rje sems dpa' yan lag gi lha bcu bcas bcu gcig gi dbang ste /
NK013(pa)015:3922: mathe'u chung rnams sbyar ba mgo bo'i dbus /
NK013(pa)015:3924: g.yas rgyab g.yon rnams su bkod bzhin /
NK013(pa)015:3926: chos dbyings mnyam pa chen po las //
NK013(pa)015:3927: ye shes gsal bas rnam par dag /
NK013(pa)015:3928: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3929: skye med chos la dbang thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:3930: mi bskyod yab yum sngags dang /
NK013(pa)015:3931: ma h+aa sh+au nya t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra s+w+aa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham //
NK013(pa)015:3932: dag cing gsal ba'i rang bzhin las //
NK013(pa)015:3933: skyon med sems nyid rin po che //
NK013(pa)015:3934: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3935: srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur shog /
NK013(pa)015:3936: rnam snang yab yum sngags dang /
NK013(pa)015:3937: ma h+aa a dar+sha dz+ny+aa na /
NK013(pa)015:3939: khams gsum re skong rgyal po ste //
NK013(pa)015:3940: yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi mchog /
NK013(pa)015:3941: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis /
NK013(pa)015:3943: / 'gro ba'i re skong rgyal por shog /
NK013(pa)015:3945: ma h+aa sa ma t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra +aam /
NK013(pa)015:3946: nyes pa'i skyon bral dri ma med //
NK013(pa)015:3947: skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste //
NK013(pa)015:3948: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3949: srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog /
NK013(pa)015:3951: ma h+aa pra h+ya be k+sha na dz+ny+aa na sogs h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:3952: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing //
NK013(pa)015:3953: grub pa las kyi bye brag las //
NK013(pa)015:3954: bya ba las kyi ye shes kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3955: skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog /
NK013(pa)015:3956: don grub yab yum sngags dang /
NK013(pa)015:3957: ma h+aa kri t+h+aa nush+tha na dz+ny+aa na sogs /
NK013(pa)015:3958: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yab yum sbyor
NK013(pa)015:3959: ba mdzad pa'i byang chub sems kyis 'od lngas dbang
NK013(pa)015:3960: bskur / rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar gnas gyur /
NK013(pa)015:3963: skye 'gag gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong bral ba'i don rtog pa mngon du byas /
NK013(pa)015:3964: zhes nges pa bskyed bden stobs spro na brjod /
NK013(pa)015:3965: rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang mchog 'dis //
NK013(pa)015:3966: skal ldan zab cing rgya che mi zad rgyan 'khor lo //
NK013(pa)015:3967: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i go 'phang thob par shog /
NK013(pa)015:3968: yang phyag mtshan lnga dpral mgrin snying lte gsang bar gtugs la /
NK013(pa)015:3970: bde gshegs sku yi ngo bo las //
NK013(pa)015:3971: mi shigs rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso //
NK013(pa)015:3972: sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:3973: rdo rje sku yi ngo bor shog /
NK013(pa)015:3974: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)015:3976: bde gshegs gsung gi ngo bo la //
NK013(pa)015:3977: mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings //
NK013(pa)015:3978: sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:3979: rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog /
NK013(pa)015:3981: h+aum bde gshegs thugs kyi mi shigs rdo rje rgyal ba'i thugs //
NK013(pa)015:3982: sngags dang rdo rje thugs kyi /
NK013(pa)015:3984: s+w+aa mi 'gyur ba yi zhing khams nas //
NK013(pa)015:3985: ma bskyed pa yi 'bras bu la //
NK013(pa)015:3986: ma bsags pa yi yongs spyod 'byung //
NK013(pa)015:3987: cir yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyis //
NK013(pa)015:3988: rang dbang thabs kyis bsgyur bar shog /
NK013(pa)015:3989: a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra bsgyur /
NK013(pa)015:3991: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i /
NK013(pa)015:3994: las dang dngos grub dbang du gyur //
NK013(pa)015:3995: ma lus nyam pa'i rgyal por shog /
NK013(pa)015:3997: de ltar dbang bskur bas gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs /
NK013(pa)015:3998: dung khang gi nang du zla ba la gnas pa'i sogs nas /
NK013(pa)015:3999: gnas lngar rgyas btab par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4000: zhes pa'i bar sgrub thabs bzhin dang /
NK013(pa)015:4001: sku yi rdo rje 'khor lo dkar po yis //
NK013(pa)015:4002: skal ldan sems can lus dang dri chen khams dag nas //
NK013(pa)015:4003: mtshan dpes spras pa rdo rje'i sku thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4004: gsung gi rdo rje pad+ma dmar po yis //
NK013(pa)015:4005: skal ldan sems can ngag dang dmar cha'i khams dag nas //
NK013(pa)015:4006: yan lag drug cu rdo rje'i gsung thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4007: thugs kyi rdo rje mthing ka yis //
NK013(pa)015:4008: skal ldan sems can yin dang kun+da'i khams dag nas /
NK013(pa)015:4010: / 'bum phrag drug cu rdo rje'i thugs thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4011: tshogs pa'i lha mo rin chen ser po yis //
NK013(pa)015:4012: skal ldan sems can las dang sha chen khams dag pa //
NK013(pa)015:4013: brgya dang bzhi bcu yon tan mchog thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4014: mchod pa'i rdo rje ral gri ljang gu yis //
NK013(pa)015:4015: skal ldan sems can spyod dang dri chu'i khams dag pa //
NK013(pa)015:4016: las bzhi phrin las rdo rjer lhun grub shog /
NK013(pa)015:4017: nyon mongs mtshan ma kun 'joms shing //
NK013(pa)015:4018: rig mchog dngos grub brten byed pa //
NK013(pa)015:4019: rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang //
NK013(pa)015:4020: pad+ma rin chen bla na med //
NK013(pa)015:4021: gsum pa dbu rgyan rnams bcings bzhin du /
NK013(pa)015:4022: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rgyan //
NK013(pa)015:4023: sangs rgyas kun gyis basngagasa pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:4024: rin po che yi dbu brgyan gyis //
NK013(pa)015:4025: khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur ro //
NK013(pa)015:4026: rigs kyi dbu brgyan bla na med //
NK013(pa)015:4027: nyon mongs gnas kun rnam par sbyong //
NK013(pa)015:4028: ye shes byin rlabs stobs rdzogs pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:4029: mtshan ma bzang po khyod kyi brgyan //
NK013(pa)015:4030: rat+na mu ku ta a b+hi shany+tsa tram tram tram tram tram /
NK013(pa)015:4031: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu brgyan khang bu 'dis /
NK013(pa)015:4032: skal ldan glo bur 'khrul pa'i dri ma kun dag nas //
NK013(pa)015:4033: khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po mnga' brnyes shog /
NK013(pa)015:4036: khyung gi gshog pa g.yas g.yon rab brdebs pas //
NK013(pa)015:4037: klu rnams ma lus zil gyis non pa ltar //
NK013(pa)015:4038: srid gsum yon tan rdzogs mdzes cod pan mchog /
NK013(pa)015:4039: che mchog bdud bzhi zil gnon dbang thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4040: badz+ra badz+ra ar+ya lam+b+ho d+ha ra a b+hi shiny+tsa h+r+ai
NK013(pa)015:4041: h+r+aih de lta bus cod pan rtsa ro rkyang gnyis
NK013(pa)015:4042: la thim / mdzes shing yid 'ong mthing dmar cod pan 'dis //
NK013(pa)015:4043: skal ldan log lta gdug pa can kun zil gnon nas //
NK013(pa)015:4044: thabs dang shes rab chos la mnga' 'byor shog /
NK013(pa)015:4045: lnga pa phreng ba ni mgo bor bcings la /
NK013(pa)015:4048: byang chub phyogs rnams shes rab rgyan //
NK013(pa)015:4049: mi 'jigs stobs dang dpe byad mtshan /
NK013(pa)015:4051: / 'bras bu rdzogs par dbang bskur ro //
NK013(pa)015:4052: rat+na m+aa l+yee a b+hi shiny+tsa tram tram /
NK013(pa)015:4053: de lta bu'i phreng ba mgo yi thig le so gnyis la thim /
NK013(pa)015:4054: sna tshogs rin po che yis phreng ba 'dis //
NK013(pa)015:4055: skal ldan gzungs kyi sgo mchog lnga brgya ting nge 'dzin /
NK013(pa)015:4057: / 'bum phrag la sogs 'bras chos mchog brnyes shog /
NK013(pa)015:4060: mi shigs ye shes rdo rje ni //
NK013(pa)015:4061: sangs rgyas kun gyi ya lad de //
NK013(pa)015:4062: khyab pa'i tshul gyis d+r+wa ba yin //
NK013(pa)015:4063: dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya //
NK013(pa)015:4064: go cha bzang po brtan byas pas //
NK013(pa)015:4065: mi mthun rtogs pa'i tshogs las rgyal //
NK013(pa)015:4066: rang gi phyag rgya rdzogs pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:4067: dus rnams kun tu srung ba'i mchog /
NK013(pa)015:4068: badz+ra rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:4069: de lta bu'i go cha lus rtsa yi d+r+wa bas khebs pa la thim /
NK013(pa)015:4070: sra brtan rdo rje'i go cha bzang po 'dis //
NK013(pa)015:4071: skal ldan rigs kyi bdud bzhi phas rgol dpung gis mi tshugs pa //
NK013(pa)015:4072: phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4075: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che //
NK013(pa)015:4076: log par lta ba zil gnon mtshan //
NK013(pa)015:4077: thams cad tshar gcod ye shes rgya //
NK013(pa)015:4078: yon tan mngon 'byung dbang bskur ro //
NK013(pa)015:4079: badz+ra ke tu a b+hi shany+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:4080: de ltar rgyal mtshan lag tu gtad pa gsang ba'i dbang po la thim /
NK013(pa)015:4081: mi nub rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan 'dis //
NK013(pa)015:4082: skal ldan bdud bzhi mtha' gnyis phyogs las rnam rgyal ba //
NK013(pa)015:4083: dpal ldan 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4086: gnyis med ye shes rtog bral ba //
NK013(pa)015:4087: rmongs sogs sems phyir rang bzhin stong //
NK013(pa)015:4089: thugs rjes skyob par dbang bskur ro //
NK013(pa)015:4090: byin rlabs ngo mtshar yul rdzogs pas //
NK013(pa)015:4091: dbyings dang ye shes mnyam pa nyid //
NK013(pa)015:4092: khams gsum chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis //
NK013(pa)015:4093: shes bya'i gnas kun gsal bar mdzad //
NK013(pa)015:4094: badz+ra rat+na tsh+aa tram a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:4095: de ltar gdugs klad pa bde chen gyi 'khor lo la thim /
NK013(pa)015:4096: rin chen gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can //
NK013(pa)015:4097: skal ldan bdag gzhan rgyud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:4098: gdung ba ma lus bsil bar byed gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:4099: dgu pa phyag rgya'i dbang ni /
NK013(pa)015:4100: gtso 'khor gyi sku spyi bo sogs sam /
NK013(pa)015:4101: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku spyi bor bzhag la /
NK013(pa)015:4102: spro na sgrub thabs kyi bsnyen pa'i skabs /
NK013(pa)015:4104: rnam shes nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
NK013(pa)015:4112: mi rtogs rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes ni //
NK013(pa)015:4113: dmigs med shes rab yum gyi ngang du rtogs //
NK013(pa)015:4114: thugs rjes thabs dang bye brag cir yang ston //
NK013(pa)015:4115: rdo rje sems dpa' che des dbang bskur ro //
NK013(pa)015:4116: lha thams cad rang la thim pas lus dkyil 'khor du gyur pa ni /
NK013(pa)015:4118: spyi gtsug bde chen dkyil 'khor na //
NK013(pa)015:4120: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed par byos /
NK013(pa)015:4122: de la lha rnams kyis gsang mtshan gdags par mos pas /
NK013(pa)015:4123: badz+ra sa t+wa n+aa ma a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:4124: sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag rgya 'dis /
NK013(pa)015:4125: skal ldan rtogs tshogs zhe gnyis lha ru dag gyur te /
NK013(pa)015:4126: snang ba rnam 'byed ting 'dzin thob gyur shig /
NK013(pa)015:4127: bcu pa bza' btung gi dbang ni /
NK013(pa)015:4129: bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo //
NK013(pa)015:4130: rang sems rnam dag brgyan pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)015:4131: gnyis med rol pa'i dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4132: bdud rtsi yid bzhin sku thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4133: kun tu bro mchog tshim byed rdzas /
NK013(pa)015:4136: chos dbyings bdud rtsi bla na med //
NK013(pa)015:4137: rnam grol zag pa med pa'i rdzas //
NK013(pa)015:4138: khams gsum 'dod yon rnams rdzogs pas //
NK013(pa)015:4139: deng 'dir khyed la dbang bskur ro //
NK013(pa)015:4140: badz+ra a mri ta a b+hi shany+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:4141: bzang btung lce yi rtsa ro 'bab ma la thim /
NK013(pa)015:4142: bza' bca' btung ba dri med zhal zas 'dis //
NK013(pa)015:4143: skal ldan 'dod yon ma spang chos nyid rgyan du shar /
NK013(pa)015:4144: byed spyod tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i dbang thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4145: de ltar dbang thob pa de mchod pa'i yul du gyur pas sgeg mo brgyad mchod bya /
NK013(pa)015:4146: rnam par snang mdzad ye shes sogs rigs lnga'i bkra shis brjod /
NK013(pa)015:4147: de ltar na skal ldan rig pa 'dzin pa khyed kyis /
NK013(pa)015:4148: rgyal ba rigs lnga la brten nas phan pa'i dbang bcu bskur ba thob /
NK013(pa)015:4150: tshe rabs thams cad du sgyu 'phrul gyi sgor 'jug pa'i bag chags bzhag /
NK013(pa)015:4151: rdo rje 'chang chen por rigs nges /
NK013(pa)015:4152: phyi dkyil mnyan pa la sogs pa'i skal pa can du byas so //
NK013(pa)015:4153: zhes gsungs par bsam la nges shes bskyed do //
NK013(pa)015:4154: gnyis pa nus dbang la sngon 'gro dang dngos so //
NK013(pa)015:4157: gling bzhi sogs mchod pa bzhes /
NK013(pa)015:4158: man+dala bkod pa phul byung 'di nyid bla ma dang
NK013(pa)015:4159: 'khor lo'i bdag po la slob dpon nus pa'i dbang
NK013(pa)015:4160: zhu ba'i don / sogs gong bzhin yon 'bul bcas gsol ba gdab /
NK013(pa)015:4161: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dgongs su gsol //
NK013(pa)015:4162: sems can kun la phan gdags phyir //
NK013(pa)015:4163: rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon bgyid //
NK013(pa)015:4164: nus pa'i dbang mchog bskur du gsol //
NK013(pa)015:4167: dang po gzhan don rgyu rang don nus pa la
NK013(pa)015:4168: nyan sgom de'i 'bras bu gzhan don nus pa la
NK013(pa)015:4169: 'chad phrin / de gnyis ka nus pa la gnyis
NK013(pa)015:4170: ka brtan pa'i rgyu slob dpon gyi dbang rab 'byams
NK013(pa)015:4172: slob dpon drug pa'i sbyor mtshams nas //
NK013(pa)015:4173: b+h+rum gcig rna ba'i 'dom rtsar zhugs //
NK013(pa)015:4174: gzhal med rtsib bzhi lte ba la //
NK013(pa)015:4175: pad nyi zla ba cha lnga dang //
NK013(pa)015:4176: sgo bzhir nyi rkyang re re la //
NK013(pa)015:4177: t+r+aam zung lnga dang h+aum dzahdang //
NK013(pa)015:4178: h'u h'u h'u bam h'u ho rnams /
NK013(pa)015:4182: rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma //
NK013(pa)015:4183: rdo rje gzi brjid me tog ma //
NK013(pa)015:4184: rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhags pa ma //
NK013(pa)015:4185: rdo rje bzhad pa bsil yab ma //
NK013(pa)015:4186: phyogs bzhir bzhugs zhi sku mdog ser //
NK013(pa)015:4187: shar sgo gshin rje lcags kyu smug /
NK013(pa)015:4188: lho sgor stobs chen zhags pa ser //
NK013(pa)015:4189: nub sgor rta mgrin lcags sgrog dmar //
NK013(pa)015:4190: byang sgor 'khyil pa dril bu ljang //
NK013(pa)015:4191: khro chas me dpung dbus na bzhugs //
NK013(pa)015:4192: rgyud kyi glegs bam bsang sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:4194: stong pa'i ngang las pad nyi zlar //
NK013(pa)015:4195: t+r+aam las glegs bam rin 'byung gsal //
NK013(pa)015:4196: sa m+aa ta sa gtso byas bskur brlab /
NK013(pa)015:4199: dzahh+aum bam hoh cha gcig bskur yul la thim /
NK013(pa)015:4200: dzahh+aum bam hoh cha gcig dbang rdzas thim /
NK013(pa)015:4204: slob ma rin chen 'byung ldan gyur //
NK013(pa)015:4205: dbang rdzas lha 'od zhu ba las //
NK013(pa)015:4206: glegs bam rna ba'i thig ler thim //
NK013(pa)015:4207: nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK013(pa)015:4208: gsang ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
NK013(pa)015:4209: t+r+aam gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las //
NK013(pa)015:4210: rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim //
NK013(pa)015:4212: gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog dang //
NK013(pa)015:4213: gsang ba kun la nyan par bya //
NK013(pa)015:4214: gsang ba'i don nyid brtag pa las //
NK013(pa)015:4215: gzhan du smra bar bya ba min //
NK013(pa)015:4216: sarba ta th+aa ga ta d+ha ra dz+ny+aa na a b+hi shiny+tsa /
NK013(pa)015:4219: dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4220: gsung rab rgya mtsho thos pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:4221: gsang sngags kun la nyan pa rnams //
NK013(pa)015:4222: phyin ci ma log rtog par shog /
NK013(pa)015:4223: rgyud kyi rgyal po lag tu byin nas ni //
NK013(pa)015:4224: skal ldan khyod la nyan pa'i dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4225: de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos //
NK013(pa)015:4226: theg pa dgu rnams ma lus thob gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:4227: gnyis pa sgom dbang gi don /
NK013(pa)015:4228: slob dpon b+h+r+aum gcig snying gi 'dom rtsar zhugs //
NK013(pa)015:4229: gzhal pad nyi sgo bzhi h'u zur lnga h+aum h+aum 'phro mi bskyod dbyings phyug yab yum 'khril //
NK013(pa)015:4230: rdo rje sems dpa' sgeg mo bcas //
NK013(pa)015:4231: rdo rje rgyal po bdug pa ma //
NK013(pa)015:4232: rdo rje zhags pa lcags kyu ma //
NK013(pa)015:4233: rdo rje legs pa sgrol ma rnams //
NK013(pa)015:4234: phyogs bzhir bzhugs zhi sku mdog mthing //
NK013(pa)015:4235: shar lho nub byang khro phreng ba bsang sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:4236: stong stong h'u las phreng ba mi bskyod gsal shu nya tas bskur /
NK013(pa)015:4242: dkyil 'khor slob ma mi bskyod rdo rjer gyur //
NK013(pa)015:4243: dbang rdzas phreng ba snying ga'i thig ler thim //
NK013(pa)015:4244: gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK013(pa)015:4245: gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
NK013(pa)015:4246: yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las //
NK013(pa)015:4247: rigs kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim //
NK013(pa)015:4248: dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po //
NK013(pa)015:4249: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bzung //
NK013(pa)015:4250: rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la //
NK013(pa)015:4251: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor //
NK013(pa)015:4252: sarba ta th+aa ga ta gu h+ya a b+hi shiny+tsa /
NK013(pa)015:4254: h'u t+r+aam h+r+ai +aa rnams mjug tu gdags /
NK013(pa)015:4255: dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4256: don dam kun rdzob dbyer med dang //
NK013(pa)015:4257: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du //
NK013(pa)015:4258: rtag tu bsgom zhing bsgrub par shog /
NK013(pa)015:4259: skabs 'dir yi dam gyi sngags tshang ma bzla /
NK013(pa)015:4260: bsnyen pa'i phreng ba lag tu gtad nas ni //
NK013(pa)015:4261: skal ldan khyod la sgom pa'i dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4262: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK013(pa)015:4263: rnam grol lam kun thogs med sgom nus shog /
NK013(pa)015:4264: gsum pa phrin las kyi dbang /
NK013(pa)015:4265: slob b+h+r+aum gnyis lag gnyis 'dom rtsar zhugs //
NK013(pa)015:4266: gzhal pad nyi sgo bzhir h+aa zung lnga h'u h'u 'phro don grub dam tshig sgrol ma 'khril //
NK013(pa)015:4267: rdo rje las dang gar mkhan ma //
NK013(pa)015:4268: rdo rje go cha dri chab ma //
NK013(pa)015:4269: rdo rje gnod sbyin dril bu dang //
NK013(pa)015:4270: rdo rje khu tshur 'bebs ma rnams //
NK013(pa)015:4271: phyogs bzhir bzhugs zhi sku mdog ljang //
NK013(pa)015:4272: shar lho nub byang bro sna tshogs rdo rje bsang sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:4273: stong stong ha las rgya gram don grub gsal /
NK013(pa)015:4274: krit+y+aa nu sh+th+aa nas dbang bskur /
NK013(pa)015:4281: dkyil 'khor 'od slob ma don yod grub par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4282: dbang rdzas rgya gram lag pa'i thig ler thim //
NK013(pa)015:4283: lag pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK013(pa)015:4284: gsang ba'i h+aa yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las //
NK013(pa)015:4285: las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim /
NK013(pa)015:4287: // khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis //
NK013(pa)015:4288: las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig /
NK013(pa)015:4290: khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin //
NK013(pa)015:4291: karma badz+ra a b+hi shany+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:4293: dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4294: phrin las rnam bzhi lhun grub cing //
NK013(pa)015:4295: rgyal ba rgya mtsho mchod pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:4296: rtag tu 'gro don byed par shog /
NK013(pa)015:4297: dgug dang btang dang bcing dang dgrol //
NK013(pa)015:4298: gso dang gsod dang pham dang rgyal //
NK013(pa)015:4300: rdo rje rgya gram lag skal ldan khyod la phrin las dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4301: phrin las rnam bzhi gang la gang 'dul gyis //
NK013(pa)015:4302: gzhan don lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4303: bzhi pa 'chad pa'i dbang la kye re mchog skyong sogs khams lugs pa ltar /
NK013(pa)015:4304: thun mong yo ga dang mthun pa dang /
NK013(pa)015:4307: 'chad pa'i rjes gnas bya ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:4308: 'gro don sgyu ma ltar ngo sprad /
NK013(pa)015:4309: thur ma'i brda' las gdams pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:4312: rigs lnga'i skur gnas gyur pas chos 'chad par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4313: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
NK013(pa)015:4314: ji ltar ji ltar 'dul ba ltar //
NK013(pa)015:4315: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
NK013(pa)015:4316: de ltar rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor //
NK013(pa)015:4318: de ltar rin chen 'khor lo bskor /
NK013(pa)015:4320: de ltar ral gri'i de ltar 'khor lo'i 'khor lo /
NK013(pa)015:4322: srid par las dang rkyen gyis dbang gyur te //
NK013(pa)015:4323: gang dang gang du dam chos 'jigs pa der //
NK013(pa)015:4324: me tshogs spu gri'i so yang brgal nas ni //
NK013(pa)015:4325: phyi mthar thug gi bar du dam chos zung //
NK013(pa)015:4327: stong pa'i ngang las me long h+aum las rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
NK013(pa)015:4328: mig thur shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gnyis dkar po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)015:4329: de zhu bas dbang rdzas so sor gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4330: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
NK013(pa)015:4331: dag cing gsal la rnyogs pa med //
NK013(pa)015:4332: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
NK013(pa)015:4333: rgyu dang las las kun tu byung //
NK013(pa)015:4334: de kho na nyid las byung ba /
NK013(pa)015:4335: de ltar don de shes nas su //
NK013(pa)015:4336: gzugs brnyan gsal bar sems can gyis //
NK013(pa)015:4337: dri med thams cad mthong bar gyis //
NK013(pa)015:4338: brjod dang gzung 'dzin rnam par spangs //
NK013(pa)015:4339: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
NK013(pa)015:4340: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin //
NK013(pa)015:4341: rab lha'i gzugs ni shes par bya //
NK013(pa)015:4343: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
NK013(pa)015:4344: ling tog nad rnams bsal ba ltar //
NK013(pa)015:4345: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:4346: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
NK013(pa)015:4349: slob dpon drug b+h+r+aum gcig lce yi 'dom rtsar 'phros /
NK013(pa)015:4350: gzhal pad nyi sgo h+r+aihzunga lnga h+aum h+aum 'phro 'dus snang mtha' gos dkar yab yum 'khril //
NK013(pa)015:4351: rdo rje chos dang dpyangs mkhan ma //
NK013(pa)015:4352: rdo rje rnon po mar me ma //
NK013(pa)015:4354: rdo rje smra ba gsal bkra ma //
NK013(pa)015:4355: phyogs bzhir bzhugs zhi sku mdog dmar //
NK013(pa)015:4356: shar lho nub byang khro 'khor lo dung phyag shing rnams bsang sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:4357: stong stong h+r+aihls rdzas rnams snang mthar gsal /
NK013(pa)015:4358: pri t+ya bek+sha nas dbang bskur /
NK013(pa)015:4365: dkyil 'khor slob ma snang ba mtha' yas gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4366: dbang rdzas lha 'od zhu ba las /
NK013(pa)015:4367: so sor gyur pa lce la thim //
NK013(pa)015:4368: smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK013(pa)015:4369: gsal h+r+ai yi phyag rgya'i chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim /
NK013(pa)015:4371: chos kyi sku bdud rtsi bla med kyis //
NK013(pa)015:4372: dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par gyis //
NK013(pa)015:4373: rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la //
NK013(pa)015:4374: mthun par gsang bsgrags gzhan du min //
NK013(pa)015:4375: badz+ra pa sha d+h+aarma ts+aaka a b+hi shiny+tsa +aa /
NK013(pa)015:4381: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
NK013(pa)015:4382: ji lta ji ltar 'dul gyur pa //
NK013(pa)015:4383: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
NK013(pa)015:4384: khyod kyis chos kyi dung 'di bus //
NK013(pa)015:4385: dbang mchog chos rnams ma lus sgrogs pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:4386: snod ldan ngang tshul bzang ba la //
NK013(pa)015:4387: mthun par gsang rgyud ston par shog /
NK013(pa)015:4388: 'khor lo dung dang phyag shing lag gtad nas //
NK013(pa)015:4389: skal ldan khyod la 'chad pa'i dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4390: sems can rgyud la theg pa mtha' dag gi //
NK013(pa)015:4391: chos kyi 'khor lo phyogs med bskor nus shog /
NK013(pa)015:4392: lnga pa rdo rje rgyal po bka' rab 'byams la /
NK013(pa)015:4396: slob ma seng ge'i khri la mchod pa'i bkod pa du ma bcas 'khod par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4397: slob dpon b+h+r+aum lnga mgo lag rkang lngar chad /
NK013(pa)015:4398: gzhal med pad nyi sgo bzhir nyi rkyang ldan pa lnga //
NK013(pa)015:4399: lus gnas bcu la nyi gdan re //
NK013(pa)015:4400: lag g.yas h+aum dang mgo dbus //
NK013(pa)015:4401: lag g.yon s+w+aa dang rkang g.yon +aam //
NK013(pa)015:4402: rkang g.yas h+aa bcas zung re lnga //
NK013(pa)015:4403: lus kyi gnas la h+aum bcu gsal //
NK013(pa)015:4404: lag pa g.yas kyi dbus rtsibs bzhir //
NK013(pa)015:4406: sogs nas gong gi sgom pa'i dbang ltar /
NK013(pa)015:4408: mgo ba'i dbus kyi dbus rtsib bzhir //
NK013(pa)015:4409: rnam snang sangs rgyas spyan ma 'khril //
NK013(pa)015:4410: sems dpa' rdo rje brtan rdo rje //
NK013(pa)015:4411: rin chen 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang //
NK013(pa)015:4412: chos kyi rdo rje sdud ma yum //
NK013(pa)015:4413: las kyi rdo rje bskyod ma rnams //
NK013(pa)015:4414: zhi rgyan mdzes shing sku mdog dkar //
NK013(pa)015:4415: lag pa g.yon gyi dbus rtsib bzhir //
NK013(pa)015:4416: rin 'byung sogs nas nyan dbang ltar //
NK013(pa)015:4418: rkang pa g.yon gyi snang mtha' sogs nas 'chad dbang ltar /
NK013(pa)015:4419: sku mdog dmar rkang pa g.yas kyi /
NK013(pa)015:4421: gong gi phrin las dbang ltar /
NK013(pa)015:4423: spyi gtsug h+aum mdzad mda' gzhu sngo //
NK013(pa)015:4424: snying gar rnam rgyal tri shul dkar //
NK013(pa)015:4425: nu g.yas dbyug sngon dbyug me dpung //
NK013(pa)015:4426: dpung g.yas gshed mthing be con s+t+wa //
NK013(pa)015:4427: sog g.yas mi g.yo gri zhags ljang //
NK013(pa)015:4428: sog dbrag rta dmar gri sbrul zhags //
NK013(pa)015:4429: sog g.yon gzhan gyis mi thub sngo //
NK013(pa)015:4430: b+hany+dza rnga yab thog pa brjid //
NK013(pa)015:4431: dpung g.yon 'khyil ljang rgya gram dril //
NK013(pa)015:4432: nu g.yon rnam rgyal 'khor lo dang //
NK013(pa)015:4433: mche ba thogs pa ser zhing rngam //
NK013(pa)015:4434: bshang khar stobs po che dud kha //
NK013(pa)015:4435: tho ba dang ni gtun shing 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:4436: zhal gsum phyag drug dang po gnyis //
NK013(pa)015:4437: rdo rje dung dmar bar rang rtags //
NK013(pa)015:4438: tha gnyis phur 'dril zhabs bzhi po //
NK013(pa)015:4439: dor stabs bgrad pa gar dgus sgeg /
NK013(pa)015:4440: dur khrod chas brgyad yum dang sbyor //
NK013(pa)015:4441: dung dmar yab stobs me dbus bzhugs //
NK013(pa)015:4443: stong stong a kun bzang yab yum mthing //
NK013(pa)015:4444: gnyis ka zhi rgyan mdzes shing brjid //
NK013(pa)015:4451: dkyil 'khor slob ma kun tu bzang po gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4452: dbang rdzas rdor dril yan lag lnga la thim /
NK013(pa)015:4453: rdo rje thugs kar brten pa sku'i dam tshig gis /
NK013(pa)015:4454: thog mtha' med sogs gong sta gon gyi skabs ltar /
NK013(pa)015:4456: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK013(pa)015:4457: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na bsnams //
NK013(pa)015:4458: he ru kahdapala brtul zhugs brtan //
NK013(pa)015:4461: dril bu dkur bstan pa gsung gi dam tshig gis /
NK013(pa)015:4466: shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror brjod //
NK013(pa)015:4467: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu chong //
NK013(pa)015:4468: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhes //
NK013(pa)015:4471: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang /
NK013(pa)015:4473: / 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
NK013(pa)015:4474: phyag rgya'i tshig gis rjes su grags //
NK013(pa)015:4475: nyid kyi 'dus ni brten phyir ro //
NK013(pa)015:4476: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa
NK013(pa)015:4477: ga na sogs lag thugs kar bsnol bas 'khyud rgya
NK013(pa)015:4478: bya ba brtul zhugs dbang ngo //
NK013(pa)015:4481: phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyis //
NK013(pa)015:4482: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che //
NK013(pa)015:4483: dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po //
NK013(pa)015:4484: dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod //
NK013(pa)015:4486: sarba ta th+aa ga ta badz+ra ra dz+ra d+h+aarma ts+aaka /
NK013(pa)015:4488: sarba h+r+ai h+r+ai h+r+aih tram tram tram /
NK013(pa)015:4490: dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4491: chos rnams thams cad lhun grub cing //
NK013(pa)015:4492: ma lus kun la dbang bsgyur pas //
NK013(pa)015:4493: chos kyi rgyal po chen por shog /
NK013(pa)015:4494: rdo rje dril bu lag tu skal ldan bu la slob dpon dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4495: dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed po bka' rab 'byams //
NK013(pa)015:4496: rdo rje rgyal po'i sa mchog thob par shog /
NK013(pa)015:4497: gnyis pa la lung bstan cing sems can gyi don byed pa'i rjes su gnang ba dang /
NK013(pa)015:4499: mchod pa'i rjes su gnang ba'o /
NK013(pa)015:4501: / 'di dag kyang khams lugs te yo ga dang 'brel ba'o //
NK013(pa)015:4503: slob dpon sprul pa'i sku sh+aakya seng ge'i cha byad kyis lung bstan par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4505: g.yon snam sbyar g+r+aa nas bzung ste /
NK013(pa)015:4506: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
NK013(pa)015:4507: bdag gis khyod ni lung bstan to //
NK013(pa)015:4508: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
NK013(pa)015:4509: phyin chad 'chi ba yod ma yin //
NK013(pa)015:4510: de ring bdud las rnam rgyal ba'i //
NK013(pa)015:4511: grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin //
NK013(pa)015:4512: da ni khyod nyid rdo rje 'chang //
NK013(pa)015:4515: / 'og min stug po bkod par mi bskyod rdo rje zhes su sangs rgya bar nges pa'o //
NK013(pa)015:4516: slob ma dam pa khyod kyis kyang //
NK013(pa)015:4517: slob dpon las rnams ci rigs par //
NK013(pa)015:4518: de ring phyin chad ma lus pa //
NK013(pa)015:4519: sangs rgyas mdzad pa bzhin du gyis //
NK013(pa)015:4521: chos kyi dbyings kyi byin rlabs dang //
NK013(pa)015:4522: dam tshig dag ni ma nyams shing //
NK013(pa)015:4523: khyod rtag bla ma la gus na //
NK013(pa)015:4526: rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos phul bas //
NK013(pa)015:4527: brtul zhugs drag pos legs tshim zhing //
NK013(pa)015:4528: lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su //
NK013(pa)015:4529: byang chub kyis ni tshim par byos //
NK013(pa)015:4530: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au sh+pe d+h+au /
NK013(pa)015:4532: rgyal ba rnams la me tog 'thor //
NK013(pa)015:4533: byang chub yan lag tshim gyur nas //
NK013(pa)015:4534: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:4535: sangs rgyas sku ni thob par byos /
NK013(pa)015:4536: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga push+pe pu //
NK013(pa)015:4537: chos kyi mar me legs sbar bas //
NK013(pa)015:4538: pad+ma gar dbang mtshan nyid ni //
NK013(pa)015:4539: sems can ma rig mdongs pa las //
NK013(pa)015:4540: ye shes sgron mas gsal bar byos //
NK013(pa)015:4541: sh+r+ai badz+ra ra ga a lo ke h+r+aih tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
NK013(pa)015:4542: rnam grol ye shes 'thor ba yi //
NK013(pa)015:4543: dri med rgyal ba rnams kyi dri //
NK013(pa)015:4544: lus can kun la khyab gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:4545: sh+r+ai badz+ra ra ga gan+d+he gan //
NK013(pa)015:4546: deng nas brtsam ste rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK013(pa)015:4547: rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje spyan //
NK013(pa)015:4548: shin tu sgegs pa'i gzi brjid 'bar //
NK013(pa)015:4549: rdo rje l+aa s+ye'i mchod pas mchod //
NK013(pa)015:4551: deng rdo rje phreng ba rdo rje'i rgyan //
NK013(pa)015:4552: shin tu rdo rje m+aa l+ye'i mchod badz+ra ma l+ye tram /
NK013(pa)015:4553: deng nas rdo rje dbyangs mkhan rdo rje'i mgrin //
NK013(pa)015:4554: shin tu rdo rje grti'i badz+ra grti h+r+aih deng nas rdo rje gar ma rdo rje 'gying //
NK013(pa)015:4555: shin tu rdo rje nirti'i badz+ra nirti +aah de ltar
NK013(pa)015:4556: skal ldan rig pa 'dzin pa khyod kyis bdag gzhan
NK013(pa)015:4557: don gnyis la brten nas nus pa'i dbang lnga bskur
NK013(pa)015:4558: ba thob / don gnyis nus pa'i sa bon 'jog /
NK013(pa)015:4559: gsang sngags kyi bya ba thams cad la dbang /
NK013(pa)015:4560: drug pa kun tu bzang po'i phrin las bsgrub rung byas /
NK013(pa)015:4561: nang gi rdzogs rim sogs mnyan pa'i skal ba can du byas so //
NK013(pa)015:4563: de ltar de dag gis don nang lus dkyil dang /
NK013(pa)015:4564: rtags phyi mtshan ma gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du bum dbang 'khor bcas thob /
NK013(pa)015:4566: lus rtsa ye shes d+r+wa ba brten nas sgyu ma
NK013(pa)015:4567: chu zla lta bu bskyed rim sgom pa la dbang
NK013(pa)015:4569: sku rdo rje sprul pa'i sku'i gnas skabs dang /
NK013(pa)015:4571: gsum pa zab pa'i dbang gong ma la gsum /
NK013(pa)015:4574: 'khor lo'i bdag po la gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhu ba'i sogs /
NK013(pa)015:4576: rdor sems gtso bo sogs lan gsum /
NK013(pa)015:4578: slob dpon gtso bo bcom ldan 'das dpal ldan rdo
NK013(pa)015:4579: rje sems dpa'i gnas lngar rgyal ba rigs lnga dang
NK013(pa)015:4580: / lag g.yas g.yon kha dang gsang ba'i phyi rnams su khro bo bzhi /
NK013(pa)015:4581: phyag rgya rdo rje dbyings phyug ma gnas lngar rigs kyi yum lnga /
NK013(pa)015:4582: yan lag la khro mo bzhi rnams gsal bar gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4590: yab kyi gsang gnas h+aum las rdo rje rtse lnga la dkar chag dang phata kyis bkag pa /
NK013(pa)015:4591: rwa lnga la h'u s+w+aa am h+aa rnams dang /
NK013(pa)015:4592: yum mkha' pam las pad+ma dmar po 'dab bzhi lte bar rak+ta am nyid es bkag pa /
NK013(pa)015:4593: m+aum l+aam m+aam p+aam t+aam rnams kyis mtshan par gyur sa ma ya stam /
NK013(pa)015:4597: dzahh+aum bam h+aoh zhes snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde chen
NK013(pa)015:4598: byang chub sems gnyis ro gcig 'dres pa lce la
NK013(pa)015:4599: stsal bar gyur // mi bskyod yab yum rol pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:4600: bde ba gsal zhing mi dmigs pa //
NK013(pa)015:4601: shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK013(pa)015:4602: rdo rje ye shes h'u tshogs kyis //
NK013(pa)015:4604: yungs dkar tshad tsam rdo rje sems //
NK013(pa)015:4605: rtse nas rtse ru bstim pa yis //
NK013(pa)015:4606: rang bzhin chos khams dkyil 'khor gyi //
NK013(pa)015:4607: sa bon zung gsum gnyid dang bcas //
NK013(pa)015:4608: gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te //
NK013(pa)015:4609: dmigs med sems kyi ye shes lnga //
NK013(pa)015:4610: gsal bas sa bon tshig pa bzhin //
NK013(pa)015:4611: mi skye thabs kyi dbug dbyung ngo //
NK013(pa)015:4612: sh+r+ai ma h+aa su kha badz+ra b+ho d+hi h+aum ho am /
NK013(pa)015:4613: yang sngags de brjod la nang mchod myang /
NK013(pa)015:4614: de yung 'bru tsam gyi rdo rje sems dpa' sha stag tu gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4615: gnyid srab mo rmi lam dang /
NK013(pa)015:4616: snying ga la gnas pa'i rigs drug gi sa bon sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:4617: gsal stong zung 'jug gi ye shes skyes //
NK013(pa)015:4618: kun+d+aa lta bu'i bde chen byang sems kyis //
NK013(pa)015:4619: skal ldan bu la gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4620: gnas ngan len pa'i bag chags kun dag pa //
NK013(pa)015:4621: gtum mo gsal stong ye shes skye gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:4624: mi 'gyur ba yi ye shes gnas //
NK013(pa)015:4625: ma btsal phyin pa'i bde ba'i mchog /
NK013(pa)015:4626: ma bltas gsal ba'i ye shes spyan //
NK013(pa)015:4627: gong na med pa kun gyi rje //
NK013(pa)015:4628: ye shes rang gnas brdal ba la //
NK013(pa)015:4629: mi 'gyur g.yung drung sa thob shog /
NK013(pa)015:4630: ma h+aa gu h+ya b+h+r+aum dz+ny+aa na man+dala dz+ny+aa na gu h+ya sid+d+hi s+w+aa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)015:4631: sh+au ny+aa ta bdag por byas pa'i dbu rgyan /
NK013(pa)015:4632: ta th+aa ga to ma h+aa gu h+ya m+aa la a b+hi shiny+tsa hoh zhes cod pan dang /
NK013(pa)015:4634: bu khyod mtshan ma'i rtogs bral zhing //
NK013(pa)015:4635: tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs //
NK013(pa)015:4636: kun la spyod pa'i dbang thob nas //
NK013(pa)015:4637: slob ma bde la 'god byed pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:4638: dbang phyug chen po khyod gyur to //
NK013(pa)015:4640: gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni //
NK013(pa)015:4641: lta ba dman la bstan byas na //
NK013(pa)015:4642: dus min par ni srog zad nas //
NK013(pa)015:4644: khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar //
NK013(pa)015:4645: mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par //
NK013(pa)015:4646: bskal bar ngan song myong bar 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:4647: de bas shin tu gsang bar bya //
NK013(pa)015:4649: de ltar na skal ldan rig pa 'dzin pa khyod kyis b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor du gsang dbang thob /
NK013(pa)015:4651: rlung rin chen 'od 'phro la brten nas /
NK013(pa)015:4652: a shad steng sgo bsgom pa la dbang tshe dbang
NK013(pa)015:4653: rig 'dzin dang gsung rdo rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
NK013(pa)015:4654: sku'i gnas skabs dang mthar 'bras thob pa'i rten 'brel
NK013(pa)015:4655: bsgrigs / gnyis pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni /
NK013(pa)015:4656: phyag rgya bcu drug ma dang bcas pa'i /
NK013(pa)015:4658: 'khor lo'i bdag po la shes rab ye shes kyi sogs /
NK013(pa)015:4660: rdor sems ye shes gtso bo sogs lan gsum /
NK013(pa)015:4662: dkyil 'khor ba'i thugs ka nas gzugs dang lang tshos
NK013(pa)015:4663: brgyan pa'i rig ma spros te dbang phyug gis rat+na'i
NK013(pa)015:4665: bde ba chen po chos kyi sku //
NK013(pa)015:4666: shes rab thabs kyis rdzogs par 'gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4668: / 'di dang skye ba thams cad du //
NK013(pa)015:4669: dngos grub bde 'di ma spong zhig /
NK013(pa)015:4670: rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK013(pa)015:4671: rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya khyod las byung //
NK013(pa)015:4672: spangs nas rdo rje dbyings phyug rtsa //
NK013(pa)015:4673: dgug dang bsdam pa ma shes na //
NK013(pa)015:4674: rdo rje'i bskal pa mtha' klas par //
NK013(pa)015:4675: chos sku thob par mi 'gyur ro //
NK013(pa)015:4677: slob ma gtso bo bcom ldan 'das //
NK013(pa)015:4679: dzahh+aum bam hoh zhes pa'i bar dang /
NK013(pa)015:4680: de ltar snyoms par zhugs nas /
NK013(pa)015:4681: rjes su chags pa'i rlung bskyod /
NK013(pa)015:4682: gtum mo 'bar bas byang chub sems kyi zla ba zhu /
NK013(pa)015:4683: rtsa gnas thams cad du thig le mgo ldang ba g.yo ldang byang chub sems /
NK013(pa)015:4685: snga ma 'gag pa 'jig 'jug byang chub sems /
NK013(pa)015:4686: rten can bde ba rang sa na gnas pa la der 'dzin bral ba gnas pa byang chub sems /
NK013(pa)015:4687: snga ma'i bde bas mtshon nas phyi ma la 'dun pa smon pa byang sems dang /
NK013(pa)015:4688: de'ang spyi bo nas mgrin par bzod med kyi bde
NK013(pa)015:4689: ba las lus stan la mi tshugs pa lta bu
NK013(pa)015:4690: dga' ba / de'ang shin tu bde bas brgyal thabs lta bur mgrin pa nas snying gar mchog dga' /
NK013(pa)015:4691: zag bcas kyi zhen pa rags pa dang bral ba'i
NK013(pa)015:4692: bde ba snying ga nas lte bar son pas dga'
NK013(pa)015:4693: bral / zag zhen thams cad bral ba 'i smra
NK013(pa)015:4694: brjod mi btub pa'i bde nyams khyad 'phags lhan skyes
NK013(pa)015:4695: kyi dga' ba dang zung 'brel lte ba nas gsang
NK013(pa)015:4696: bral / ba dang / de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i rtser nyi zla zhal mjal /
NK013(pa)015:4697: thabs shes rab tu sbyor ba /
NK013(pa)015:4698: shes rab thabs su sbyor ba sbyor ba gsum gyis yas 'bab /
NK013(pa)015:4699: mthar phyin pa mthar phyin byang chub sems /
NK013(pa)015:4700: dpe yi ye shes la cung zad mnyam par bzhag /
NK013(pa)015:4701: slar yang h+aum zhes drangs pas mas brtan dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes rgyud la skyes /
NK013(pa)015:4702: de 'dra'i dga' ba re re la'ang thabs dang /
NK013(pa)015:4703: shes rab kyi cha gnyis gnyis bcu drug gis /
NK013(pa)015:4705: de nas ga nyis sbyor mthong /
NK013(pa)015:4706: de nas dgus sgom lam sa dgu /
NK013(pa)015:4707: dga' ba bcu drug gi mtha' ma dpe'i 'od gsal lhan skyes bde la 'dzin med shar ba'i dus /
NK013(pa)015:4709: yi ge 'khor lo rnams kyang rdzogs par gyur /
NK013(pa)015:4710: h+aumh rjes su 'jug pa'i phyag rgya nyid //
NK013(pa)015:4711: zil ba'i thig le smon lam bzhin //
NK013(pa)015:4712: bcu drug phyed phye thig le gcig /
NK013(pa)015:4713: phan tshun 'god pa'i stobs kyis bstim //
NK013(pa)015:4714: bde ba gnyis pa'i ngo bo nyid //
NK013(pa)015:4715: gsum pa'i ye shes dkyil 'khor du //
NK013(pa)015:4716: gsal bar shar bas gyur pa'i sgra //
NK013(pa)015:4718: rdo rje nyi ma thabs kyi rgya //
NK013(pa)015:4719: phung sogs phyag rgya'i tshogs dang ldan //
NK013(pa)015:4720: do zla bsil byed shes rab dngos //
NK013(pa)015:4721: dus gcig ro mnyam thig le che //
NK013(pa)015:4722: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs shing //
NK013(pa)015:4723: zla ba'i ye shes lnga bcu drug /
NK013(pa)015:4724: dpe byad la sogs dpag tu med //
NK013(pa)015:4725: sems shes mngon par shes dang ldan //
NK013(pa)015:4727: gnas nas log pa thim pa'i spras //
NK013(pa)015:4728: mtha' gnyis ma gos pad+ma can //
NK013(pa)015:4729: sprul pa'i gnas nas bkye ba yis //
NK013(pa)015:4730: bzhi bcu lnga sogs mtha' yas kun //
NK013(pa)015:4731: rang bzhin nyid las rang gsal ba //
NK013(pa)015:4732: bcu gsum yi ge 'khor lo brjod //
NK013(pa)015:4733: d+harma k+aa ya a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK013(pa)015:4735: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i phyag rgya rig ma 'dis //
NK013(pa)015:4736: skal ldan bu la shes rab dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4737: ye shes rang gnas bde chen don rtogs te //
NK013(pa)015:4738: bde stong thig le 'gag med thob par shog /
NK013(pa)015:4742: +aat+ma ko&a ham bar dbugs dbyung ba /
NK013(pa)015:4743: de ring phan khyod bu khyod ni //
NK013(pa)015:4744: rang rig bde la gnas pas na //
NK013(pa)015:4745: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste //
NK013(pa)015:4746: yum dang 'jo ma thams cad la /
NK013(pa)015:4749: rigs su gyur rnams thabs 'di ru //
NK013(pa)015:4751: dbang phyug rgyal po nyid du nges //
NK013(pa)015:4753: de ltar na skal ldan rig pa 'dzin pa khyod
NK013(pa)015:4754: kyis mkha' gsang gi dkyil 'khor du shes rab ye
NK013(pa)015:4755: shes kyi dbang thob yid sgrib sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:4756: khams bde chen rgyal po la brten nas bde stong sgo thig le sgom pa la dbang /
NK013(pa)015:4758: thugs rdo rje chos sku'i gnas skabs dang mthar 'bras thob pa'i rten 'brel bsgrigs /
NK013(pa)015:4760: gsum pa tshig dbang rin po che ni /
NK013(pa)015:4762: 'khor lo'i bdag po la tshig gi dbang bskur zhu /
NK013(pa)015:4764: sgrub thabs las 'byung ba'i chos sku'i man+dala te /
NK013(pa)015:4766: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
NK013(pa)015:4768: shin tu grol ba rgya chen po mdzad du gsol /
NK013(pa)015:4770: chos rnams thams cad nam mkha'i khams //
NK013(pa)015:4771: dngos po mtshan ma kun las 'das //
NK013(pa)015:4772: de la mkhas pas bcos su med //
NK013(pa)015:4773: de bzhin sems kyi rnam pa kun //
NK013(pa)015:4774: de bzhin nyid de bcos las 'das /
NK013(pa)015:4776: / 'di ltar ye nas yin shes na //
NK013(pa)015:4777: dbang rnams bskur yang ga la dgos //
NK013(pa)015:4779: ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos sogs sgrub thabs nas 'byung ba ltar /
NK013(pa)015:4781: ces sngar gyi dbang gsum pas mtshon te dpe dang /
NK013(pa)015:4783: tshig gi rtogs par bya ba /
NK013(pa)015:4784: blo dang spros pa las 'das pa /
NK013(pa)015:4785: sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po rang byung gi rig pa dgag sgrub dang bral ba /
NK013(pa)015:4786: gang shar rang grol gyi ngang la dus gsum gyi
NK013(pa)015:4787: yid byed thams cad rang sar zhi ba'i tshul du
NK013(pa)015:4788: mnyam par bzhag / lus phyi sdom /
NK013(pa)015:4790: ma yeng tsam du rnam par mi rtog pa'i rig stong gi nyams bskyang /
NK013(pa)015:4791: smra bsam brjod 'das gsang ba snying po'i don //
NK013(pa)015:4792: skal ldan khyod la tshig gis dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4793: chos nyid bsal bzhag med pa'i don rtogs nas //
NK013(pa)015:4794: rdzogs pa chen po mngon du 'gyur bar shog /
NK013(pa)015:4795: dag drag de ltar na skal ldan rig pa 'dzin
NK013(pa)015:4796: pa khyod kyis de kho na nyid sems kyi dkyil
NK013(pa)015:4798: sgo gsum cha mnyam gyi dri ma sbyangs /
NK013(pa)015:4799: brjod bral gnyug ma'i rig pa la brten nas rdzogs pa chen po sgom pa la dbang /
NK013(pa)015:4801: ye shes rdo rje ngo bo nyid sku'i gnas skabs dang mthar 'bras thob pa'i rten 'brel bsgrigs /
NK013(pa)015:4802: gnyis pa dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur thob pa'i yon tan dang /
NK013(pa)015:4803: ma thob pa'i nyes dmigs bcas /
NK013(pa)015:4804: dbu brgyan cod pan phreng ba dang //
NK013(pa)015:4805: go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang //
NK013(pa)015:4806: gdug dang bum pa bza' btung dang //
NK013(pa)015:4807: snying po lnga yi dbang bskur bas //
NK013(pa)015:4808: dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras //
NK013(pa)015:4809: ngan song thams cad med pa dang //
NK013(pa)015:4810: tshe ring nad med phun sum tshogs //
NK013(pa)015:4811: mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur //
NK013(pa)015:4812: slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //
NK013(pa)015:4813: dbang rnams thob par ma byas na //
NK013(pa)015:4814: nyan pa la sogs rtsam pa rnams /
NK013(pa)015:4817: rjes su slob dpon gyi zhabs spyi bor blang /
NK013(pa)015:4818: snying gar gtugs par mos pas /
NK013(pa)015:4819: slob dpon gyi dam tshig dang bka' spyi bor gnas par gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:4820: dbang gi rgyal rtags dang ma 'bral bar gyur cig /
NK013(pa)015:4822: gtso bos ji ltar sogs lan gsum man+dala so bdun ma longs sprul man+dala bcas /
NK013(pa)015:4823: ma tshang ba med pa 'di nyid 'jug pa legs par thob pa'i btang rag gi yon du /
NK013(pa)015:4827: mthar mjug gi bkra shis ni kahthoga pa chen po
NK013(pa)015:4828: rtsa sde ba'i gsungs 'di nyid gtsigs che bar gnas
NK013(pa)015:4829: pas / bkra shis gang zhig bde chen 'chang byed cing //
NK013(pa)015:4830: mchog gsum 'phags pa'i bkra shis kun gyi gzhi //
NK013(pa)015:4831: bkra shis don grub yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter //
NK013(pa)015:4832: rje btsun mtshungs med bla ma'i bkra shis shog /
NK013(pa)015:4833: bkra shis gang zhig lha dang mnyam sbyor bas //
NK013(pa)015:4834: lha yi bkra shis mngon par nyer thob cing //
NK013(pa)015:4835: bkra shis don gnyis legs par 'grub byed pa //
NK013(pa)015:4836: yi dam lha rnams kun gyi //
NK013(pa)015:4837: bkra shis dpal ldan sku gsum rab brnyes shing //
NK013(pa)015:4838: ye shes rgya mtsho bkra shis mtha' yas pa //
NK013(pa)015:4839: bkra shis dbyings su 'gro rnams 'dren mdzad pa //
NK013(pa)015:4840: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bkra shis shog /
NK013(pa)015:4841: bkra shis gsung rab dri med rtogs pa yi //
NK013(pa)015:4842: don ldan chags bral bkra shis don dam chos //
NK013(pa)015:4843: bkra shis mchog gis sems can skyabs gyur pa //
NK013(pa)015:4844: dam chos rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyi bkra shis sdom gsum rnam dag rgyan gyis mdzes //
NK013(pa)015:4845: thos btsun ting 'dzin bkra shis dbang 'byor bas //
NK013(pa)015:4846: bkra shis yid skyed dgu'i dpal gyur pa //
NK013(pa)015:4847: dge 'dun dam pa rnams kyi bkra shis mthar phyin dpal chen spyan snga ru //
NK013(pa)015:4848: bstan pa srung bar khas blang bkra shis gang //
NK013(pa)015:4849: bkra shis mthu yis log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i //
NK013(pa)015:4850: chos skyong srung ma rnams kyi bkra shis shog /
NK013(pa)015:4851: bkra shis don gyis nyon mongs rnam dag cing //
NK013(pa)015:4852: nad rnams bkra shis stobs kyis zhi gyur nas //
NK013(pa)015:4853: bkra shis bden pas bgegs dpung 'joms byed de //
NK013(pa)015:4854: rnam pa kun tu legs pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK013(pa)015:4855: bkra shis snyan pa'i ba dan kun khyab cing //
NK013(pa)015:4856: bsod nams chen po'i bkra shis rgyun chags nas //
NK013(pa)015:4857: bkra shis tshe dbang mi 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin //
NK013(pa)015:4858: dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK013(pa)015:4859: bkra shis mngon gyur rgyal ba'i bkra shis kyis //
NK013(pa)015:4860: bkra shis mchog tu sngags pa'i bkra shis gang //
NK013(pa)015:4861: bkra shis rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyis bkra shis shing //
NK013(pa)015:4862: bkra shis lhun gyis grub pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK013(pa)015:4863: 'di dag gi mjug tu slob ma 'jug par gnang ba nod pa ni gong bzhin no //
NK013(pa)015:4864: bcu pa zhugs pa'i yon tan ni gong gsung pa sogs so //
NK013(pa)015:4865: rjes kyi tshe ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor la ni
NK013(pa)015:4866: sgrub mchod kyi tshe 'ang thig tshon lhag gnas sogs
NK013(pa)015:4867: dor zhing zor yang du bya ba'i gnad shes pas
NK013(pa)015:4868: / ji srid 'byung bzhi'i gnod pas ma zhig gi bar du /
NK013(pa)015:4870: rdul tshon gyi phyogs nyin bdun lta bu la grol nyin bar du /
NK013(pa)015:4871: ji srid 'dod don ma rdzogs pa de srid du /
NK013(pa)015:4873: tshar nyin beg+aa kra ma yam /
NK013(pa)015:4874: zhes pas mkha' la btegs slar yang btang rag gi mchod bstod /
NK013(pa)015:4876: khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad //
NK013(pa)015:4878: dz+ny+aa na man+dala badz+ra muh zhes gshegs gsol dang /
NK013(pa)015:4879: dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsdu ldang go bgo lus srung gi rjes /
NK013(pa)015:4880: chos thams cad stong nyid du mos te rol mo'i sgra bcas /
NK013(pa)015:4883: rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag pas lha mtshan bsdus la /
NK013(pa)015:4885: dbang ldan nas gtso bo'i bar du bsdus te gser
NK013(pa)015:4886: dngul gyi bum par blugs pa bkur bsti chen pos
NK013(pa)015:4887: rgyun 'babs kyi chu klung du bskyal /
NK013(pa)015:4888: slar yang snod de chus bkang nas nang du 'ong ste dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa bsangs gtor byed /
NK013(pa)015:4889: h+aum mdzad phyag rgyas mdzub mo bsnol ba kam pa'i rgyas 'og nas yar phur bu rnams phyung /
NK013(pa)015:4890: badz+ra k+ai la ya ut+ki la ya sarba big+h+nana badz+ra
NK013(pa)015:4891: d+ha ra +aa dz+ny+aa pa ya h+aum h+aum h+aum phata
NK013(pa)015:4892: hoh snod du bzhag pa'i rtse mor 'o chab gtor
NK013(pa)015:4893: / ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tish+tha sid+d+hi lo tsa sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi so s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)015:4895: 'o chab phur khung du'ang gtor bas /
NK013(pa)015:4896: bgegs rnams la smas pa bos te /
NK013(pa)015:4897: bde stong gi ye shes su sangs rgyas /
NK013(pa)015:4898: phur bu'i ye shes pa rnams lag gi rdo rje la thim /
NK013(pa)015:4899: chad lhag yi ge brgya ba'i kha stong bzla /
NK013(pa)015:4900: phyogs skyong 'byung po la gtor ma bsngo /
NK013(pa)015:4901: dge ba bsngo zhing smon lam dang /
NK013(pa)015:4902: bkra shis kyi mthar rgyas su bya'o //
NK013(pa)015:4903: mos slob sgrub mchod skyang pa ba'i lugs tsam las /
NK013(pa)015:4904: gzhan tshogs sgrub dang 'brel ba ni sgrub chen gyi yi ge las nges par bya'o //
